(I – ḷ.) teyvattaṉmaiyaiyuṭaiya periya potiyiṉ malaikkaṇ tirumuṉiyākiya Akattiyaṉ muṉpāliṭṭa |†2 Intiraṉavaikkaḷattu Oruvaraiyoruvar viḻaintu Akattiyamuṉivarāṟ cāpam peṟṟa cayantaṉum Uruppaciyum muṟaiyē vintamalaiyil mūṅkilāyum, kāñci nakarattut tēvakaṇikaiyāyum piṟantaṉareṉṟu, “vāṉavar kōmāṉ vāṉiṭai yiruntu” Eṉṉum Āciriyappāvāṟ cuttāṉantap pirakācapparata nūlāciriyar kūṟiṉar.cāpam Intiraciṟuvaṉōṭē Ammuṉiyaruḷat talaikkōṟṟāṉattu nīṅkiya māṟupaṭutalariyaciṟappiṉaiyuṭaiya Arampaiyaril varicaiyiṟ kuṟaivaṟṟa nāṭakattoḻiloṭu poruntiya Uruppaciyākiya Ammātavi marapil vanta piṟappiṟkuṉṟutalillāta periya tōḷiṉaiyum tātukaḷ Aviḻum pūkkaḷaiyuṭaiya kaṭaikuḻaṉṟu curuṇṭa kuḻaliṉaiyumuṭaiya mātaviyākiyamaṭantaitaṉṉai yeṉka.

peruntōḷeṉṟār, makaḷirtōḷ peruttal marapātaliṉ;Eṉṉai?

“Akalalku ṟōḷkaṇṇeṉa mūvaḻip peruki” (kalit. 108: 2)Eṉṟā rākaliṉ.

8 - 9. Āṭalum pāṭalum......kuṟai paṭāmal

(I – ḷ.) kūttum pāṭṭum Aḻakumeṉṟu collappaṭṭa Immūṉṟiṉuḷḷum Oṉṟuṅ kuṟaivu paṭāmal,

Ivai kuṟaivupaṭāmaikkuk kāraṇamuṭaiyaḷākaliṉeṉka.

10 - 11. Ēḻāṇ ṭiyaṟṟi......vēṇṭi

(I – ḷ.) Aiyāṇṭil taṇṭiyam piṭippittu Ēḻāṇṭu Iyaṟṟuvittup paṉṉīrāṇṭil vīrakkaḻal cūḻnta kāliṉaiyuṭaiya cōḻaṉ karikāṟ peruvaḷattāṉukku Avaṉavaiyaraṅkēṟikkāṭṭalai virumpiyeṉka.

Eṉṉai? “paṇṇiyamvait tāṉaimukaṉ pātam paṇintunāṭ,puṇṇiya vōrai pukaṉṟaṉakoṇ——ṭeṇṇiyē, vaṇṭirukkuṅkūntaṉ maṭavaralai yaiyāṇṭil, taṇṭiyañcēr vippatē cālpu” Eṉavum, “vaṭṭaṇaiyun tūciyu maṇṭalamummaṇṭalamum †paṇṇamaiya veṇmaiyāṇ, ṭiṭṭuṭa ṉīrāṟāṇṭeytiyapiṉ – vaṭṭaṇaiyuṅ, kītak paṇṇamaiya, Eṭṭuṭaṉīriraṇṭāṇ ṭeytiyapiṉ——kaṭṭaḷaiya, kītak kuṟippu malaṅkāra muṅkiḷarac,cōtit taraṅkēṟac cūḻ” (cīvaka. 673, na. mēṟ.) Eṉavum, “naṉṉarviruppuṭaiyō ṇaṟkuṇamu mikkuyarntōḷ, coṉṉakulat tālamainta toṉmaiyaḷāyp——paṉṉiraṇṭāṇ, ṭēyntataṟpi ṉāṭaluṭaṉ pāṭalaḻa kimmūṉṟum, vāyntavaraṅ kēṟṟal vaḻakku” Eṉavumkūṟiṉār paratacēṉāpatiyār.

[Āṭalāciriyaṉ Amaiti]

12 - 25. Iruvakaik kūttiṉ......Ācāṉ ṟaṉṉoṭum

(I – ḷ.) Iruvakaittākiya Akakkūttiṉ Ilakkaṇaṅkaḷai yaṟintupalavakaippaṭṭa puṟanaṭaṅkaḷaiyum vilakkuṟuppukkaḷaic cērappuṇarkkavumvallaṉāki Alliyamutaṟ koṭukoṭṭiyīṟākakkiṭanta patiṉoru kūttukkaḷum Akkūttukkaḷukkuriya pāṭṭukkaḷum Avaṟṟukku Aṭaittavācciyaṅkaḷiṉ kūṟukaḷum nūlkaḷil vitittavaḻiyē terintu kūttumpāṭṭum tāḷaṅkaḷum tāḷaṅkaḷiṉ vaḻivanta tūkkukkaḷum tammiṟkūṭiṉa neṟiyaiyuṭaiya Akakkūttum puṟakkūttumutalāyiṉa nikaḻttumiṭattup piṇṭi piṇaiyal Eḻiṟkai toḻiṟkaiyeṉṟu collappaṭṭanāṉkiṉaiyum nūliṉakattukkoṇṭa kūṟupāṭṭaiyaṟintu Akakkūttunikaḻumiṭattuk kūṭaikkatiyākac ceyta kai vārakkatiyuṭpukāmalum,vārakkatiyākac ceyta kai kūṭaikkatiyuṭpukāmalum, puṟakkūttiṉiṭattu Āṭaṉikaḻumiṭattu Avinayam nikaḻāmalum, Avinayam nikaḻumiṭattu Āṭaṉikaḻāmalum, kuravaikkūttum varikkūttum tammilviravātapaṭiyum celutti Amainta Āṭalāciriyaṉumeṉka.

Itu poḻippurai.

12. Iruvakaik kūttāvaṉa:——vacaikkūttu, pukaḻkkūttu; vēttiyal, potuviyal; varikkūttu, variccāntikkūttu; cāntik kūttu,vinōtakkūttu; Āriyam, tamiḻ; Iyalpukkūttu, tēcikkūtteṉappala vakaiya. Ivai virintanūlkaḷiṟ kāṇka.

12. Īṇṭu Iruvakaikkūttāvaṉa:——cāntiyum, vinōtamum;Eṉṉai? |†1 cīvaka. 672, na. mēṟ.“Avaitām, cāntik kūttum vinōtak kūttumeṉ,ṟāyntuṟa vakuttaṉa ṉakattiyaṉ ṟāṉē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

†1 cīvaka. 672, na. mēṟ.“cāntik kūttē talaiva |ṉiṉpam,ṉiṉpam, †ṉavinayam Ēntiniṉ ṟāṭiya vīrirunaṭamavai, cokka meyyē yavinaya nāṭakam, Eṉṟip pāṟpaṭūu meṉmaṉār pulavar” Eṉpataṉāl nāyakaṉ cāntamāka Āṭiya kūttuc cāntikkūtteṉappaṭum. Ivaṟṟuḷ,——

cokkameṉṟatu – cuttaniruttam. Atu nūṟṟeṭṭukkaraṇamuṭaittu.

meykkūttāvatu:——tēci vaṭuku ciṅkaḷameṉa mūvakaippaṭum.Ivai meyttoḻiṟkūttākaliṉ, meykkūttāyiṉa. Ivai Akaccuvaipaṟṟi yeṭuttaliṉ, Akamārkkameṉa nikaḻttappaṭum.

Akaccuvaiyāvaṉa:——Irācatam, tāmatam, cāttuvikameṉpaṉa.“kuṇattiṉ vaḻiyatakak kūtteṉap paṭumē” Eṉṟār kuṇanūluṭaiyār; |†1 cīvaka. 672, na. mēṟ.“Akatteḻu cuvaiyā ṉakameṉap paṭumē” Eṉṟār cayantanūluṭaiyāru meṉakkoḷka.

Avinayakkūttāvatu:—— kataikatai ‡niruttakkai taḻuvātu pāṭṭiṉatu poruḷukkukkaikāṭṭi vallapañ ceyyum palavakaikkūttu.

nāṭakam:——kataitaḻuvi varum kūttu.

vinōtakkūttāvatu:——kuravai, kalinaṭam, kuṭakkūttu,karaṇam, nōkku, tōṟpāvai Eṉpar. Ivaṟṟuḷ.——

kuravaiyeṉṟatu:——kāmamum veṉṟiyum poruḷākak kuravaicceyyuḷ pāṭṭāka Eḻuvarēṉum Eṇmarēṉum Oṉpatiṉmarēṉumkaipiṇaintāṭuvatu: |“kuravaiyeṉpatu......Iyalpiṟ ṟeṉpa” (pati.77, Urai) Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

kuravai – varikkūttiṉ Ōr Uṟuppu; Avai vantavaḻikkaṇṭukoḷka.

†2 kampa. pampai. 22.kalinaṭameṉṟatu – kaḻāykkūttu.

kuṭakkūtteṉṟatu – mēṟpatiṉorāṭaluṭ kāṭṭappaṭum.

karaṇamāvatu – paṭinta Āṭal.

nōkkeṉṟatu – pāramum nuṇmaiyum māyamumutalāyiṉavaṟṟaiUṭaiyatu.

tōṟpāvaiyeṉṟatu – tōlāṟ pāvai ceytu Āṭṭuvippatu.

Iṉṉum nakaittiṟaccuvaiyeṉpataṉōṭu kūṭṭi Ēḻeṉpārumuḷar; Aḵtāvatu vitūṭakakkūttu. Itaṉai vacaikkūtteṉpārumuḷar.

vacai – vēttiyal, potuviyaleṉa Iraṇṭuvakaippaṭum; Avaimuntunūlkaḷiṟ kaṇṭukoḷka.

veṟiyāṭṭumutalākat teyvamēṟiyāṭukiṉṟa Attiṟakkūttukkaḷum kūṭṭi Ēḻeṉpārumuḷar.

Eṉṉai? “Eḻuvakaik kūttu miḻikulat tōrai, Āṭa vakuttaṉaṉakattiyaṉ ṟāṉē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivaṟṟiṉ Ilakkaṇaṅkaḷāvaṉa:——“ |†1 Aṟuvakai nilaiyāvaṉa:——(1) vaiṇavam, (2) camanilai, (3) vaicākam, (4) maṇṭalam, (5) Ālīṭam, (6) pirattiyālīṭameṉpaṉa.Aṟuvakai nilaiyu |†2 Aivakaippātamāvaṉa:——(1) camanilai, (2) Uṟkaṭitam, (3) cañcāram, (4) kāñcitam, (5) kuñcitameṉpaṉa.maivakaippātamum, |†3 Aṅkakkiriyai patiṉāṟāvaṉa:——(1) carikai, (2) purikai, (3) camakali,(4) tirikai, (5) Ūrttuvakalikai, (6) piruṭṭakam, (7) Arttapiruṭṭakam,(8) cuvattikam, (9) Ullōlam, (10) kurttaṉam, (11) vēṭṭaṉam,(12) Upavēṭṭaṉam, (13) tāṉapatappirāya viruttam, (14) Ukṣēpaṇam, (15) Avakṣēpaṇam, (16) nikuñcaṉameṉpaṉa.Īreṇ vakaiya vaṅkak kiriyaiyum, |†4 varuttaṉaināṉkāvaṉa:——(1) Apavēṭṭitam, (2) Upavēṭṭitam,(3) viyāvarttitam, (4) parāvarttitameṉpaṉa.varuttaṉai nāṉku |†5 niruttakkai muppatāvaṉa:——(1) caturacciram, (2) Uttuvītam,(3) talamukam, (4) cuvattikam, (5) vippirakīrṇam, (6) Aruttarēcitam,(7) Arāḷakaṭakāmukam, (8) Āvittavattiram, (9) cūcīmukam, (10) Irēcitam, (11) Uttāṉavañcitam, (12) pallavam, (13) nitampam, (14) kacatantam, (15) Ilatai, (16) karikkai, (17) pakkavañcitam, (18) pakkappiratiyōkam, (19) karuṭapakkam, (20) taṇṭapakkam, (21) Ūrttuvamaṇṭali, (22) pakkamaṇṭali, (23) Urōmaṇṭali, (24) Urappārcuvārtta maṇṭali, (25) muṭṭikaccuvattikam, (26) naḷiṉīpatumakōcam,(27) Alapatumam, (28) Uṟpaṇam, (29) Ilaḷitai, (30) valitaiyeṉpaṉa. Ivai cuttāṉantappirakācameṉṉum paḻaiya tamiḻpparatanūliṟ kāṇappaṭṭaṉa.niruttakkai muppatum, Attaku toḻila vāku meṉpa.” Ivaivirippiṟ perukum.

13. palvakaikkūttāvaṉa:——veṉṟikkūttu, vacaikkūttu,vinōtakkūttu mutaliyaṉa; Eṉṉai? |“palvakai yeṉpatu pakaruṅkālai, veṉṟi vacaiyē vinōta mākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

“Avaṟṟuḷ, māṟṟā ṉoṭukkamu maṉṉa ṉuyarcciyu, mēṟpaṭakkūṟum veṉṟik kūttē.”

“palvakai yuruvamum paḻittuk kāṭṭa, vallava ṉātal vacaiyeṉappaṭumē.”

†6 veṉṟikkūttum vacaikkūttum tāḷa Iyalpuṭaiyaṉaveṉṟapaṭi.“Eṉavivai tāḷatti ṉiyalpiṉa vākum.”

“vinōtak kūttu vēṟupā ṭuṭaittu, veṉṟi vinōtak kūtteṉa viḷampuvar.” Itaṉkaruttu: koṭittērvēntarum kuṟunilamaṉṉarumutalāka Uṭaiyōr pakaiveṉṟiruntaviṭattu vinōtaṅkāṇuṅ kūtteṉpatām.

vilakkiṉiṟpuṇarttu – vilakkuṟuppiṉōṭu poruntuvittu;

Iṉ: cāriyai; mūṉṟaṉurupu Aintaṉoṭu mayaṅkiṟṟu.

veṉṟikkūttumutalākiya palavakaippaṭṭa puṟanaṭaṅkaḷaiyum vēntuvilakkup paṭaivilakku Ūrvilakkeṉṟu collappaṭṭa vilakkukkaḷākiyapāṭṭukkaḷukku Uṟuppāy varuvaṉavaṟṟuṭaṉē poruntappuṇartti.

poruntap puṇarttal – Īṇṭuppāṭṭukkaḷukku varavu vakuttal.

vilakkuṟuppāvaṉa:——patiṉāṉkuvakaippaṭum; Avai |†1 pati. 1-2, Urai.poruḷ,yōṉi, virutti, canti, cuvai, cāti, kuṟippu, cattuvam, Avinayam,col, colvakai, vaṇṇam, vari, cētameṉavivai;

Eṉṉai? “vilakkuṟup peṉpatu virikkuṅ kālaip, poruḷumyōṉiyum viruttiyuñ cantiyum, cuvaiyuñ cātiyuṅ kuṟippuñcattuvamum, Avinayañ collē colvakai vaṇṇamum, variyuñ cētamumuḷappaṭat tokaiI, Icaiya veṇṇi ṉīrē ḻuṟuppē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Avaṟṟuḷ,——poruḷ nāṉkuvakaippaṭum; Eṉṉai? “Aṟamporu ḷiṉpam vīṭeṉa nāṉkum, tiṟampaṭu poruḷeṉac ceppiṉarpulavar” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivai nāṭakattiṟ pirintum kūṭiyum varuṅkāṟ peyar vēṟupaṭum.Avai nāṭakam, pirakaraṇappirakaraṇam, pirakaraṇam, Aṅkameṉappeyaravām;

Eṉṉai? “Avaitām, nāṭakam pirakara ṇappira karaṇam, Āṭiyapirakaraṇa maṅka meṉṟē, Ōtupa naṉṉū luṇarntici ṉōrē” Eṉṟārmativāṇaṉārum. “Aṟamuta ṉāṉku moṉpāṉ cuvaiyu, muṟaimuṉṉāṭaka muṉṉō ṉākum” Eṉavum, |“Aṟamporuḷiṉpa maracar cāti”Eṉavum, “Aṟamporuḷ vāṇikar cātiyeṉ ṟaṟaipa” Eṉavum,“Aṟamēṟ cūttira raṅka mākum” Eṉavum coṉṉār ceyiṟṟiyaṉār.Ivai nāṉkum nāṭakameṉṟaṟika.

yōṉi nāṉku vakaippaṭum:——Uḷḷōṉ talaivaṉāka Uḷḷatōrporuṇmēṟ ceytalum, Illōṉ talaivaṉāka Uḷḷatōr poruṇmēṟceytalum, Uḷḷōṉ talaivaṉāka Illatōr poruṇmēṟceytalum, Illōṉ talaivaṉāka Illatōr poruṇmēṟ ceytalumeṉa Ivai;

Eṉṉai? “Uḷḷōṟ kuḷḷatu millōṟ kuḷḷatum, Uḷḷōṟkillatu millōṟ killatum, Eḷḷā turaittal yōṉi yākum”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

virutti nāṉkuvakaippaṭum:——Avai cāttuvati, Ārapaṭi,kaiciki, pāratiyeṉavivai.

Ivaṟṟuḷ,——cāttuvatiyāvatu Aṟam poruḷākat teyvamāṉiṭartalaivarāka varuvatu.

Ārapaṭiyāvatu:——poruḷ poruḷāka vīrarākiya māṉiṭar talaivarāka varuvatu;

kaicikiyāvatu:——kāmam poruḷākak kāmukarākiya makkaḷ talaivarāka varuvatu.

pāratiyāvatu:——kūttaṉ talaivaṉāka naṭaṉ naṭi poruḷākak kāṭṭiyum Uraittum varuvatu.

Iccollappaṭṭa nālvakai viruttiyuḷḷum pārativirutti, Antamūṉṟu viruttiyumpōlap piṟitiṉtalaivar piṟituporuḷpaṟṟi viruttikūṟātu poruḷālē virutti kūṟumeṉakkoḷka.

canti Aintuvakaippaṭum:——Avai mukam, piratimukam, karuppam,viḷaivu, tuyttaleṉa Ivai.

Ivaṟṟuḷ mukamāvatu:—— |†1 Ārampattiṟku Ēḻaṅkamuṇṭeṉṟu vaṭanūlāriṟ cilar kūṟuvarātaliṉ Ataṟkupporunta Eḻuvakaippaṭṭa Uḻaveṉṟār.Eḻuvakaippaṭṭa Uḻaviṉāṟ camaikkappaṭṭa pūḻiyuḷ Iṭṭa vittup paruvañceytu muḷaittu muṭivatupōlvatu;

piratimukamāvatu:——Aṅṅaṉam muḷaittal mutalāy Ilaitōṉṟināṟṟāy muṭivatupōlvatu;

karuppamāvatu——Annāṟṟu mutalāyk karuviruntu perukit taṉṉuṭ poruḷpotintu karuppamuṟṟi niṟpatu pōlvatu;

viḷaivāvatu:——karuppamutalāy virintu katir tiraṇṭiṭṭuk kāytāḻntu muṟṟi viḷaintu muṭivatu pōlvatu;

tuyttalāvatu:——viḷaiyappaṭṭa poruḷai Aṟuttup pōriṭṭukkaṭāviṭṭut tūṟṟip policeytu koṇṭupōy Uṇṭu makiḻvatupōlvatu.

Ivai Aintucantiyum nāṭṭiyak kaṭṭurai.

cuvai Oṉpatuvakaippaṭum:——Avai vīraccuvaiyavinayam, payaccuvaiyavinayam, Iḻippuccuvaiyavinayam, Aṟputaccuvaiyavinayam, Iṉpaccuvaiyavinayam, Avalaccuvaiyavinayam, nakaiccuvaiyavinayam, naṭuvunilaiccuvaiyavinayam, Uruttiraccuvaiyavinayameṉa; Avaṟṟuḷ,——

“vīraccuvai yavinayam viḷampuṅ kālai, murinta puruvamum civantakaṇṇum, piṭitta vāḷuṅ kaṭitta veyiṟum, maṭitta vutaṭuñ curuṭṭiyanutalum, tiṇṇeṉa vuṟṟa collum pakaivarai, Eṇṇal cellāvikaḻcciyum piṟavum, naṇṇu meṉpa naṉkuṇarn tōrē”;

“Acca vavinaya māyuṅ kālai, Oṭuṅkiya vuṭampu naṭuṅkiya nilaiyum,malaṅkiya kaṇṇum kalaṅkiya vuḷaṉum, karantuvara luṭaimaiyuṅkaiyetir maṟuttalum, paranta nōkkamu micaipaṇ piṉavē”;

“Iḻippi ṉavinaya miyampuṅ kālai, Iṭuṅkiya kaṇṇu meyiṟupuṟampōtalum, Oṭuṅkiya mukamu muñaṟṟāk kālum, cōrnta yākkaiyuñcoṉṉiram pāmaiyum, nērntaṉa veṉpa neṟiyaṟin tōrē”;

“Aṟputa vavinaya maṟivarak kiḷappiṟ, coṟcōr vuṭaiyatu cōrntakaiyatu, meymmayir kuḷirppatu viyattaka vuṭaiya, teytiya timaittalum viḻittalu mikavāteṉ, ṟaiyamil pulava raṟaintaṉa reṉpa”;

“kāma vavinayaṅ karutuṅ kālait, tūvuḷ ḷuṟutta vaṭivun toḻilum, kārikai kalanta kaṭaikkaṇuṅ kaviṉpeṟu, mūraṉ muṟuval ciṟu nilā varumpalu, malarnta mukaṉu mirantameṉ kiḷaviyum, kalantaṉapiṟavuṅ kaṭaippiṭit taṉarē”;

“Avalat tavinaya maṟivarak kiḷappiṟ, kavalaiyoṭu puṇarnta kaṇṇīr māriyum, vāṭiya nīrmaiyum varuntiya celavum, pīṭaḻi yiṭumpaiyumpitaṟṟiya collum, niṟaikai yaḻitalu nīrmaiyil kiḷaviyum, poṟaiyiṉ ṟākalum puṇarttiṉar pulavar”;

“nakaiyi ṉavinaya nāṭṭuṅ kālai, mikaipaṭu nakaiyatu piṟarnakaiyuṭaiyatu, kōṭṭiya mukattatu......, viṭṭumuri puruvamoṭu vilāviṟuppuṭaiyatu, ceyvatu piṟitāy vēṟucē tippateṉ, ṟaiyamil pulavarāyntaṉa reṉpa”;

“nāṭṭuṅ kālai naṭuvunilai yavinayam, kōṭpā ṭaṟiyāk koḷkaiyumāṭciyu, maṟantaru neñcamu māṟiya viḻiyum, piṟaḻnta kāṭci nīṅkiyanilaiyum, kuṟippiṉ ṟākalun tuṇukka millāt, takaimika vuṭaimaiyuntaṇṇeṉa vuṭaimaiyum, Aḷattaṟ karumaiyu maṉpoṭu puṇartalum,kalakkamoṭu puṇarnta nōkkuṅ katirppum, vilakkā reṉpa vēṇṭumoḻip pulavar”;

†1 Uruttiraccuvaiyavinayac cūttiram Orupiratiyilum Illai. Accuvaiyiṉ meyppāṭukaḷai, “kaipicaiyā vāymaṭiyāk kaṇcivavāveytuyirā, meykulaiyā vērā vekuṇṭeḻuntāṉ” (taṇṭi. 70,mēṟ.) Eṉpataṉāluṇarka.“Uruttiraccuvai yavinayam..........”

†2 Aḵteṉṟatu Accuvaiyuṇarvu Uḷḷattu nikaḻntavaḻittōṉṟum mēṟkūṟiya Uṭampiṉ vēṟupāṭṭai.Aḵtāvatu viṟaleṉpatu; cattuvameṉpārumuḷar. Accattuvantāṉ |†3 Ittokaiyum Itaṉvakaiyum vaṭanūl vitikku māṟāka Uḷḷaṉa.pattuvakaippaṭum; Eṉṉai? meymmayircilirttal, kaṇṇīrvārtal, naṭukkamaṭuttal, viyarttal, tēṟṟam, kaḷittal, viḻittal,vetumpal, cākkāṭu, kuraṟcitaivu Eṉavivai.

cattuvamāvatu – kuṟippuvaraiyaṟai; Āvatu, cuttaccuvaiyākiṉṟaOṉpatiṉum pāvikkum Attuṇaiyē meymmaittāy varuvateṉakkoḷka.

Eṉṉai? vēmpeṉṟu kāṭṭappukkāl Avvēmpiṉ Irataṅkāṭṭātē Atutāṉ tiṉṟavaṉukku meyyiṉkaṇ varuvatu.

karuṇaiyeṉṟāṟ pāvittukkāṭṭumataṉṟi meyyākak kaṇṇīrvantaḻuvatu.

Allāta cuvaikaḷum vanta cattuvamum Ippaṭi Oṭṭikkaṇṭukoḷka.

Avaitām Accuvaikaḷil Eṇṇam vantāl tōṟṟu muṭampil;Uṭampiṉ mikattōṟṟum mukattu; mukattiṉ mikattōṟṟum kaṇṇil; kaṇṇiṉ mikattōṟṟum kaṇṇiṉ kaṭaiyakatteṉṟavāṟu.

†1 niṟuttamuṟaiyē cuvaiyiṉpiṉṉar vakaikāṭṭutaṟkuriya cātipattuvakaippaṭum; Avai nāṭakam, pirakaraṇam, pāṇam, pirakacaṉam,ṭimam, viyāyōkam, camavākāram, vīti, Aṅkam, Īkāmirukam Eṉavivai.cātiyāvatu..........

kuṟippāvatu – cuvaiyataṉkaṭṭōṉṟuvatu.

cattuvamāvatu – Akkuṟippiṉkaṇ nikaḻkiṉṟa nikaḻcci.

Avinayameṉṟatu – pāvakam; Aḵtu Irupattunāṉku vakaittu;varalāṟu:——vekuṇṭōṉavinayam, Aiyamuṟṟōṉavinayam, cōmpiṉōṉavinayam, kaḷittōṉavinayam, Uvantōṉavinayam, Aḻukkāṟuṭaiyōṉavinayam, Iṉpamuṟṟōṉavinayam, teyvamuṟṟōṉavinayam,ñaññaiyuṟṟōṉavinayam, Uṭaṉpaṭṭōṉavinayam, Uṟaṅkiṉōṉavinayam, tuyiluṇarntōṉavinayam, cettōṉavinayam, maḻaipeyyappaṭṭōṉavinayam, paṉittalaippaṭṭōṉavinayam, veyiṟṟalaippaṭṭōṉavinayam nāṇamuṟṟōṉavinayam, varuttamuṟṟōṉavinayam, kaṇṇōvuṟṟōṉavinayam, talainōvuṟṟōṉavinayam, Aḻaṟṟiṟampaṭṭōṉavinayam,cītamuṟṟōṉavinayam, veppamuṟṟōṉavinayam, nañcuṇṭōṉavinayameṉavivai. Avaṟṟuḷ,——

“vekuṇṭō ṉavinayam viḷampuṅ kālai, maṭitta vāyu malarntamārpum, tuṭitta puruvamuñ cuṭṭiya viralum, kaṉṟiṉa vuḷḷamoṭu kaipuṭait tiṭutalum, Aṉṉanōkkamō ṭāyntaṉar koḷalē”;

“poyyil kāṭcip pulavō rāynta, Aiya muṟṟō ṉavinaya muraippiṉ, vāṭiya vuṟuppu mayaṅkiya nōkkamum, pīṭaḻi pulaṉum pēcā tiruttalum, piṟaḻnta ceykaiyum vāṉṟicai nōkkalum, Aṟaintaṉar piṟavumaṟintici ṉōrē”;

“maṭiyi ṉavinayam vakukkuṅ kālai, noṭiyoṭu palakoṭ ṭāvimikavuṭaimaiyu, mūri nimirttalu muṉivoṭu puṇartalum, kāraṇa miṉṟiyāḻntumaṭin tiruttalum, piṇiyu miṉṟic cōrnta celavō, ṭaṇitarupulava rāyntaṉa reṉpa”;

“kaḷittō ṉavinayaṅ kaḻaṟuṅ kālai, Oḷittavai yoḷiyāṉuraitta liṉmaiyum, kaviḻntuñ cōrntun tāḻntun taḷarntum,vīḻnta colloṭu miḻaṟṟic cāytalum, kaḷikaik kavarnta kaṭaikkaṇōk kuṭaimaiyum, pēricai yāḷar pēṇiṉar koḷalē”;

“Uvantō ṉavinaya muraikkuṅ kālai, nivantiṉi tākiya kaṇmalaruṭaimaiyum, Iṉiti ṉiyaṉṟa vuḷḷa muṭaimaiyum, muṉivi ṉakaṉṟamuṟuvaṉakai yuṭaimaiyum, Irukkaiyuñ cēṟaluṅ kāṉamum piṟavum,Oruṅkuṭa ṉamainta kuṟippiṟ ṟaṉṟē”;

“Aḻukkā ṟuṭaiyō ṉavinaya muraippiṉ, Iḻukkoṭu puṇarntavicaipporu ḷuṭaimaiyum, kūmpiya vāyuṅ kōṭiya vuraiyum, Ōmpātuvitirkkuṅ kaivakai yuṭaimaiyum, Āraṇaṅ kākiya vekuḷi yuṭaimaiyum, kāraṇa miṉṟi melintamuka muṭaimaiyu, melivoṭu puṇarntaviṭumpaiyu mēvarap, poliyu meṉpa poruntumoḻip pulavar”;

“Iṉpamoṭu puṇarntō ṉavinaya miyampil, tuṉpa nīṅkittuvartta yākkaiyum, tayaṅkit tāḻnta perumakiḻ vuṭaimaiyu, mayaṅkivanta celavunaṉi yuṭaimaiyum, Aḻakuḷ ḷuṟutta coṟpoli vuṭaimaiyum, Eḻiloṭu puṇarnta naṟumala ruṭaimaiyum, kalaṅkaḷcērn takaṉṟatōṇmār puṭaimaiyum, nalaṅkeḻu pulavar nāṭiṉa reṉpa”;

†1 30: 38 mutaliyavaṟṟaippārkka.“teyva muṟṟō ṉavinayañ ceppiṟ, kaiviṭ ṭeṟinta kalakkamuṭaimaiyu, maṭitteyiṟu keḷaviya vāyttoḻi luṭaimaiyum, tuṭittapuruvamun tuḷaṅkiya nilaiyum, ceyya mukamuñ cērnta cerukkum, Eytumeṉpa viyalpuṇarn tōrē”;

“ñaññai yuṟṟō ṉavinaya nāṭiṟ, paṉmeṉ ṟiṟukiya |nāvaḻināvaḻi †nāvaḷi vuṭaimaiyum, nuraicērntu kūmpum vāyu nōkkiṉark, kuraippōṉpōla vuṇarvi lāmaiyum, viḻippōṉ pōla viḻiyā tiruttalum,viḻuttaka vuṭaimaiyu moḻukki lāmaiyum, vayaṅkiya tirumuka maḻuṅkalum piṟavum, mēviya teṉpa viḷaṅkumoḻip pulavar”; Iḵtu Ēmuṟumākkaḷavinayam;

“cintaiyuṭam paṭṭō ṉavinayan teriyiṉ, muntai yāyiṉumuṇarā nilaimaiyum, piṭitta kaimē laṭaitta kaviṉu, muṭitta luṟātakaruma nilaimaiyum, colluvatu yātu muṇarā nilaimaiyum, pullumeṉpa poruntumoḻip pulavar”;

“tuñcā niṉṟō ṉavinayan tuṇiyiṉ, Eñcuta liṉṟi yirupuṭaimaruṅku, malarntuṅ kaviḻntum varupaṭai yiyaṟṟiyum, Alarntuyirppuṭaiya vāṟṟalu mākum”;

“Iṉṟuyi luṇarntō ṉavinaya miyampiṉ, Oṉṟiya kuṟuṅkoṭṭāviyu muyirppum, tūṅkiya mukamun tuḷaṅkiya vuṭampum, Ōṅkiya tiripumoḻintavuṅ koḷalē”;

“cettō ṉavinayañ ceppuṅ kālai, Attaka vaccamu maḻippu mākkalum, kaṭitta niraippaliṉ veṭittup poṭittup, pōntatuṇi vuṭaimaiyum valitta vuṟuppu, melinta vakaṭu meṉmaimika vuṭaimaiyum,veṇmaṇi tōṉṟak karumaṇi karattalum, Uṇmaiyiṟ pulava ruṇarntavāṟē”;

“maḻaipeyyap paṭṭō ṉavinayam vakukkiṉ, Iḻitaka vuṭaiyaviyalpunaṉi yuṭaimaiyum, meykūr naṭukkamum piṇittalum paṭāttai,meypūṇ ṭoṭukkiya mukattoṭu puṇarttalum, Oḷippaṭu maṉaṉi lulaṟiya kaṇṇum, viḷiyiṉun tuḷiyiṉu maṭintacevi yuṭaimaiyum, koṭukiviṭ ṭeṟinta kuḷirmika vuṭaimaiyum, naṭuṅku palloli yuṭaimaiyumuṭiyak, kaṉavukaṇ ṭāṟṟā ṉeḻutalu muṇṭē”;

“paṉittalaip paṭṭō ṉavinayam pakari, ṉaṭukka muṭaimaiyu nakaipaṭu nilaimaiyum, coṟṟaḷarn ticaittalu maṟṟami lavatiyum, pōrvaiviḻaitalum puntinō vuṭaimaiyum, |nīṟāmnīṟām ‡nīrām viḻiyuñ cēṟu muṉitalum,Iṉṉavai piṟavu micaintaṉar koḷalē”;

“Uccip poḻutiṉ vantō ṉavinayam, Ecca miṉṟi yiyampuṅkālaic, coriyā niṉṟa peruntuya ruḻantu, teriyā niṉṟa vuṭamperi

yeṉṉac, civanta kaṇṇu mayarnta nōkkamum, payanta teṉpa paṇpuṇarn tōrē”;

“nāṇa muṟṟō ṉavinaya nāṭiṉ, Iṟaiñciyu talaiyu maṟaintaceykaiyum, vāṭiya mukamuṅ kōṭiya vuṭampum, keṭṭa voḷiyuṅ kīḻkkaṇōkkamum, Oṭṭiṉa reṉpa vuṇarntici ṉōrē”;

“varutta muṟṟō ṉavinayam vakuppiṟ, porutta millāp puṉkaṇuṭaimaiyum, cōrnta yākkaiyuñ cōrnta muṭiyum, kūrnta viyarvuṅ kuṟumpal luyāvum, vaṟṟiya vāyum vaṇaṅkiya vuṟuppum, Uṟṟateṉpa vuṇarntici ṉōrē”;

“kaṇṇō vuṟṟō ṉavinayaṅ kāṭṭi, ṉaṇṇiya kaṇṇīrt tuḷiviraṟ ṟeṟittalum, vaḷaintapuru vattoṭu vāṭiya mukamum, veḷḷiṭainōkkiṉ viḻitaru maccamum, teḷḷitiṟ pulavar teḷintaṉarkoḷalē”;

“talainō vuṟṟō ṉavinayañ cāṟṟi, ṉilaimai yiṉṟit talaiyāṭṭuṭaimaiyum, kōṭiya virukkaiyun taḷarnta vēroṭu, peruvira liṭukkiya nutalum varunti, Oṭuṅkiya kaṇṇoṭu piṟavum, tiruntu meṉpacenneṟip pulavar”;

“Aḻaṟṟiṟam paṭṭō ṉavinaya muraippiṉ, niḻaṟṟiṟam vēṇṭuneṟimaiyiṉ viruppum, Aḻalum veyiluñ cuṭaru mañcalum, niḻalunīruñ cēṟu muvattalum, paṉinī ruvappum pātirit toṭaiyalum, nuṉivira līra maruneṟi yākkalum, pukka tuṉpamoṭu pularnta yākkaiyum,tokka teṉpa tuṇivaṟin tōrē”;

“cīta muṟṟō ṉavinayañ ceppi, ṉōtiya paruvara luḷḷamō ṭuḻattalum, Īra mākiya pōrvai yuṟuttalum, Āra veyiluḻan taḻalum vēṇṭalum, Uraciyu muraṉṟu muyirttu muraittalum, takkaṉa piṟavuñ cāṟṟiṉar pulavar”;

“veppi ṉavinayam virikkuṅ kālait, tappil kaṭaippiṭit taṉmaiyun tākamum, Eriyi ṉaṉṉa vemmaiyō ṭiyaivum, veruvaru miyakkamum vempiya viḻiyum, nīruṇ vēṭkaiyu nirampā valiyum, Ōruṅ kālaiyuṇarntaṉar koḷalē”;

“koñciya moḻiyiṟ kūreyiṟu maṭittalum, pañciyiṉ vāyiṟpaṉinurai kūmpalum, tañca māntar tammuka nōkkiyōr, Iṉcoliyampuvāṉ pōliyam pāmaiyum, nañcuṇ ṭōṉṟa ṉavinaya meṉpa”;

“colliya vaṉṟiyum varuvaṉa vuḷaveṉiṟ, pulluvaḻic cērttipporuntuvaḻip puṇarppa” Eṉa varum.

Iṉi, col varumāṟu:——Atu mūṉṟu vakaippaṭum; |†1 pa. 92.Uṭcol,puṟaccol, Ākāyaccolleṉa.

Avai neñcoṭu kūṟal, kēṭpōrk kuraittal, tāṉē kūṟaleṉpaṉa; Eṉṉai? |“neñcoṭu kūṟal kēṭpōrk kuraittal, tañcam

varavaṟivu tāṉē kūṟaleṉ, ṟammūṉ ṟeṉpa cemmaic collē”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

colvakai nāṉku vakaippaṭum:——cuṇṇam, curitakam, vaṇṇam, varitakameṉa.

cuṇṇam – nāṉkaṭiyāṉ varuvatu;

curitakam – Eṭṭaṭiyāṉ varuvatu;

vaṇṇam – nāṉāṉkaṭiyāṉ varuvatu;

varitakam – muppattiraṇṭaṭiyāṉ varuvatu.

Eṉṉai? “cuṇṇa nāṉkaṭi curitaka meṭṭaṭi, vaṇṇa nāṉāṉkuvaritaka meṇṇāṉkeṉ, ṟeṇṇiya vaṭittokai yeytavum peṟumē”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

vaṇṇam Oruvakaiyāṉ mūṉṟu vakaippaṭum:——peru vaṇṇam,Iṭai vaṇṇam, vaṉappu vaṇṇameṉa. Avaṟṟuḷ, peru vaṇṇamĀṟāy varum; Iṭai vaṇṇam Irupattoṉṟāy varum; vaṉappuvaṇṇam |nāṟpattoṉṟāynāṟpattoṉṟāy †nāṟpattoṉpatāy varum.

†1 8: 74-7 Aṭikaḷiṉ Uraiyaip pārkka.vari Eṭṭu vakaippaṭum:——kaṇkūṭuvari, kāṇvari, Uḷvari, puṟavari, kiḷarvari, tērccivari, kāṭcivari, Eṭuttukkōḷvari yeṉa.Eṉṉai? |“kaṇkūṭu kāṇvari yuḷvari puṟavari, kiḷarvari, yaintōṭoṉṟa vuraippiṟ, kāṭci tērcci yeṭuttuk kōḷeṉa, māṭciyiṉvarūu meṇvakai neṟittē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. Avaṟṟiṉ pakutiyellām |†2 Itaṟku Aṭiyārkku nallār Iyaṟṟiya Urai kiṭaittilatu;Āṉālum Innūl, 8: 74 mutaliyavaṟṟālum Avaṟṟiṉ Uraiyiṟkaṇṭamēṟkōḷkaḷālum kaṇkūṭuvari mutaliya Eṭṭaṉ pakutikaḷ naṉkuviḷaṅkum.kāṉal variyiṟ kūṟutum.

Ivvariyeṉpataṉaip palvarikkūtteṉpārumuḷar; Eṉṉai? “cintup piḻukkai yuṭaṉcanti yōrmulai, konti kavuci kuṭappiḻukkai kantaṉ pāṭkantaṉ pāṭ ‡kantiyiṉ pāṭṭu , ṭālaṅkāṭ ṭāṇṭi parumaṇa ṉellicciparumaṇa ṉellicci §paṭuñamaṉaṉellicci , cūlan tarunaṭṭan tūṇṭiluṭaṉ – cīlamikum, Āṇṭi yamaṇpuṉavē ṭāḷatti kōppāḷi, pāṇṭip piḻukkaiyuṭaṉ pāmpāṭṭi – mīṇṭa, kaṭavuṭ caṭaivīramākēcaṅ kāmaṉ, makiḻcintu vāmaṉa rūpam – vikaṭaneṭum, pattiraṅkoṟṟi palakaivāḷ papparappeṇ, ṭattacam pāran takuṇiccaṅ – kattu,muṟaiyīṇ ṭiruñcittu muṇṭita maṉṉap, paṟaipaṇ ṭitaṉpuṭpapāṇam – Iṟaiparavu, pattaṉ kuravaiyē pappaṟai kāvataṉ, pittaṉoṭumāṇi perumpiḻukkai, Ettuṟaiyum, Ēttivaruṅ kaṭkaḷi yāṇṭuviḷaiyāṭṭuk, kōtta paṟaikkuṭumpu kōṟkūttu – mūtta, kiḻavaṉkiḻaviyē kiḷḷup piṟāṇṭi, Aḻakuṭaiya paṇṇivika ṭāṅkampaṇṇivika ṭāṅkam ¶paḷḷivikkaṭṭāṅkan – tikaḻcempo, ṉammaṉai pantu kaḻaṅkāṭa lālikkum, viṇṇakak kāḷi viṟaṟkonti – Allāta, vāynta taṉivaṇṭu vāricci picciyuṭaṉ, cāntamuṭaiya caṭātāri – Ēyntaviṭai, takkapiṭār nirttan taḷippāṭṭuccāturaṅkam, tokka toḻilpuṉainta cōṇāṇṭucōṇāṇṭu $coṉṉāṇṭu – mikka, malaiyāḷivētāḷi vāṇi kutirai, cilaiyāṭu vēṭu civapput – talaiyil, tiruviḷak

kup picci tirukkuṉ ṟayiṟpeṇ, ṭiruṇmukattup pētai yiruḷaṉ-porumukattup, pallāṅ kuḻiyē pakaṭi pakavatiyāḷ, nallārtan tōḷvīccu naṟcāḻal – Allāta, Unti yavaliṭi yūrāḷi yōkiṉicci, kuntivarum pāraṉ kuṇalaikkūt – tantiyampō, “tāṭuṅ kaḷikoyyu muḷḷippū vaiyaṉukkup, pāṭumpāṭ ṭāṭum paṭupaḷḷi – nāṭaṟiyum, kumpīṭunāṭṭaṅ kuṇāṭṭaṅ kuṇālaiyē, tuñcāta cummaippūc cōṉaka-mañcari, Ēṟṟavuḻaimai paṟaimaimuta leṉṟeṇṇik, kōttavarikkūttiṉ kulam” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

cētam.——Āriyam tamiḻeṉa Iruvakaittu; Eṉṉai? “Āriyantamiḻeṉuñ cīrnaṭa miraṇṭiṉum, Ātik kataiyai yavaṟṟiṟ koppac,cētit tiṭuvatu cētameṉ ṟākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Iṉi, vilakkuṟuppeṉṟa coṟkupporuḷ yātōveṉiṉ:——talaivaṉ celuttukiṉṟa kataiyai vilakkiyum Akkataiyai naṭāttiyummuṉpu ceyta kataikkē Uṟuppākuvateṉka.

14 - 5. patiṉōrāṭalum..........Aṟintāṅkeṉṟatu, Alliya mutaṟkoṭukoṭṭi Īṟāykkiṭantaṉavum, Avaṟṟukkuriya pāṭṭukkaḷum, Akkūttukkaḷiṉ vikaṟpaṅkaḷukkellām Amainta vācciyakkūṟukaḷum,māṭcimaippaṭṭa nūlkaḷil vititta muṟaimaiyālē viḷaṅka Aṟinteṉka.

14. patiṉōrāṭalāvaṉa:——“kaṭaiyamayi rāṇimarak kālvintaikantaṉ, kuṭaituṭimā lalliyamal kumpam——cuṭarviḻiyāṟ, paṭṭamataṉpēṭutirup pāvaiyaraṉ pāṇṭaraṅkam, koṭṭiyivai kāṇpatiṉōrkūttu.”

Ivai teyva virutti.

Ivai Iraṇṭu kūṟupaṭum; Eṉṉai? “Alliyaṅ koṭṭi kuṭaikuṭam pāṇṭaraṅka, malluṭaṉiṉṟāṭalāṟu”, “tuṭikaṭaiyam pēṭu marakkālē pāvai, vaṭivuṭaṉ vīḻntāṭa laintu.”

Ivai Acuraraik kolla Amararāṭiṉa.

“Alliya māyava ṉāṭiṟ ṟataṟkuṟuppuc, collupa vāṟā meṉal”;

“koṭṭi koṭuviṭaiyō ṉāṭiṟ ṟataṟkuṟup, poṭṭiya nāṉkāmeṉal”;

“Aṟumukattō ṉāṭal kuṭaimaṟ ṟataṟkup, peṟumuṟuppu nāṉkāmeṉal”;

“kuṭattāṭal kuṉṟeṭuttō ṉāṭa lataṉuk, kaṭaikkupa vaintuṟuppāyntu”;

“pāṇṭaraṅka mukkaṇā ṉāṭiṟ ṟataṟkuṟup, pāyntaṉa vāṟāmeṉal”;

“neṭiyava ṉāṭiṟṟu mallāṭaṉ malliṟ, koṭiyā vuṟuppōraintām”;

“tuṭiyāṭal“tuṭiyāṭal †tuṭiyāṭa ṉaṅkai yeḻuvaratāṭal vēṉmuruka ṉāṭa lataṉuk, koṭiyā vuṟuppōraintām”;

“kaṭaiya mayirāṇi yāṭiṟ ṟataṉuk, kaṭaiya vuṟuppukka ḷāṟu”;

“kāmaṉa tāṭalpē ṭāṭa lataṟkuṟuppu, vāymaiyi ṉārāyi ṉāṉku”;

“māyava ḷāṭaṉ marakkā lataṟkuṟuppu, nāmavakai yiṟcoluṅkāṉāṉku”;

“pāvai tirumaka ḷāṭiṟ ṟataṟkuṟup, pōvāma loṉṟuṭaṉēyoṉṟu”;

“puramerittal cūrmāt tuḷaipaṭuttal kañca, ṉuraṉerittalvāṇaṉaivā ṉuyttal – periya, Araṉmuta lākavē laṉmutaṉ māyōṉ,Amarmuta lāṭiya vāṟu” Eṉak..........kaṇṭukoḷka.

pāṭṭumeṉṟatu – Akanāṭakaṅkaḷukkum puṟanāṭakaṅkaḷukkum UriyaUrukkaḷumeṉka.

Akanāṭakaṅkaḷukkuriya Uruvāvaṉa:——kanta mutalākap pirapantavuruĪṟāvuḷḷa Irupatteṭṭum. Ivaṟṟuḷ,——

kantameṉṟatu – Aṭivaraiyaṟaiyuṭaittāy Oru tāḷattāṟpuṇarppatu..........pirapantameṉṟatu – Aṭivaraiyaṟaiyiṉṟip palatāḷattāṟpuṇarppatu.

puṟanāṭakaṅkaḷukkuriya Uruvāvaṉa:——tēvapāṇimutalāka Araṅkoḻi ceyyuḷīṟākavuḷḷa centuṟai vikaṟpaṅkaḷellāmeṉka.

koṭṭumeṉṟatu – kūttuvikaṟpaṅkaḷukku Amainta vācciyak kūṟukaḷumeṉṟavāṟu.

Avai kītāṅkam, niruttāṅkam, Upayāṅkameṉpaṉa. Avaṟṟuḷ,——

kītāṅkam – kītattukku vācippatu;

niruttāṅkam – niruttattiṟku vācippatu;

Upayāṅkam – Iraṇṭiṟkum vācippatu.

15. Āṅku: Acainilai.

16. Āṭalum – muṟkūṟiya Akakkūttiṉum puṟakkūttiṉumuḷḷaĀṭalumeṉṟavāṟu.

kīṟṟu kaṭicarimutalākiya |†1 tēcikkuriya kālkaḷ 24:——(1) kīṟṟu, (2) kaṭicari, (3) maṇṭalam,(4) varttaṉai, (5) karaṇam, (6) Ālīṭam, (7) kuñcippu, (8) kaṭṭuppuriyam,(9) kaḷiyam, (10) Uḷḷāḷam, (11) kaṭṭutal, (12) kampittal, (13) Ūrtal, (14) naṭukkal, (15) vāṅkutal, (16) Apputal, (17) Aṉukkutal,(18) vācippu, (19) kuttutal, (20) neḷital, (21) māṟukāl, (22) Iṭṭuppukutal, (23) cuṟṟi vāṅkutal, (24) Uṭaṟpurivu.tēcikkuriya kālkaḷum, cuṟṟutal EṟitalUṭaittal mutalākiya |†2 vaṭukiṟkuriya kālkaḷ 14:——(1) cuṟṟutal, (2) Eṟital, (3) Uṭaittal, (4) Oṭṭutal, (5) kaṭṭutal, (6) veṭṭutal, (7) pōkkal, (8) nīkkal,(9) muṟukkal, (10) Aṉukkal, (11) vīcal, (12) kuṭuppukkāl, (13) kattarikaikkāl, (14) kūṭṭutal.vaṭukiṟkuriya kālkaḷum, Uṭaṟṟūkku mutalākiya |†3 Uṭalavarttaṉai 9:——(1) meycāyttal, (2) Iṭainerittal, (3)cuḻittal, (4) Aṇaittal, (5) tūkkutal, (6) Acaittal, (7) paṟṟal,(8) virittal, (9) kuvittaleṉavivai; |“meycāy viṭainerivu mēṟcuḻivōṭāṅkaṇaittal, kaitūk kacaittal kalaipaṟṟal – kaikaḷ, virittal kuvittalivai ciṅkaḷamā meṉṟu, terittaṉar taṇṭamiḻōrtērntu” (cuttāṉantap pirakācam.)Uṭalavarttaṉaiyum Akakkūttukkuriyaṉa.

Īṇṭuc ciṅkaḷameṉṟu vaḻaṅkivarukiṉṟa kūttuc colliṟṟilarāleṉiṉ, |“ciṅkaḷa miruvakai nilaiyiṉu meytum” Eṉṉum cūttirattāṉ Itaṟku vēṟu kālkaḷ Iṉmaiyiṉeṉka; |†1 pālaikku nilamiṉmaiyai, tol. Akat. 2, Uraiyiṟ kāṇka.pālaikku nilamillātatupōla.

puṟakkūttukkuriya Āṭalkaḷāvaṉa:——perunaṭai, cāriyai, piramariIvai mutalāyiṉavum, patiṉōrāṭaliṟ kūttukkaḷumām.

Ivvakaiyāl Akakkūttukkaḷukkum, puṟakkūttukkaḷukkumuriyaĀṭalumeṉṟavāṟu.

16. pāṭalumeṉṟatu - |†2 7: 1.paṇṇal mutaliya Eṭṭuvakaippaṭṭa kuṟikkōḷum, |“Iṉpan teḷivē niṟaiyō ṭoḷiyē, vaṉco liṟutimanta muccameṉa, vanta veṭṭum pāṭaliṉ payaṉē” Eṉṟu collappaṭṭa Eṇvakaippayaṉumuṭaiya pāṭalum.

pāṇiyumeṉṟatu – tāḷaṅkaḷumeṉṟavāṟu; |†3 14: 150, Urai.“koṭṭu macaiyuntūkku maḷavum, Oṭṭap puṇarppatu pāṇi yākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivai māttiraippeyarkaḷ; koṭṭu Araimāttirai; Ataṟkuvaṭivu, ka; Acai Orumāttirai; Ataṟku vaṭivu, E; tūkku Iraṇṭumāttirai; Ataṟku vaṭivu, U; Aḷavu mūṉṟumāttirai: Ataṟkuvaṭivu.ḵ Eṉakkoḷka.

Eṉṉai? “kakaraṅ koṭṭē yekara macaiyē, UkaranUkaran †ṅakaran tūkkēyaḷavē yāytam” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivaṟṟiṉ toḻil varumāṟu:——koṭṭāvatu – Amukkutal; Acaiyāvatu – tākkiyeḻutal; tūkkāvatu——tākkit tūkkutal; Aḷavāvatu-tākkiṉavōcai nērē mūṉṟumāttirai peṟumaḷavum varutaleṉakkoḷka.

Araimāttiraiyuṭaiya Ēkatāḷamutalākappatiṉāṟumāttiraiyuṭaiyapārvatilōcaṉamīṟākac coṉṉa nāṟpattoru tāḷamum puṟakkūttiṟkuriya; Āṟaṉmaṭṭameṉpaṉavum, Eṭṭaṉmaṭṭameṉpaṉavum, tāḷavoriyaleṉpaṉavum, taṉinilaiyoriyaleṉpaṉavum, Oṉṟaṉpāṇimutalāka Eṇkūttup pāṇiyīṟākak kiṭanta patiṉorupāṇivikaṟpaṅkaḷum, mutaṉaṭaivāramutalāyiṉavum Akakkūttiṟkuriyaveṉka.

16. tūkkumeṉṟatu – Ittāḷaṅkaḷiṉ vaḻivarum centūkku, matalait tūkku, tuṇiputtūkku, kōyiṟṟūkku, nivapputtūkku, kaḻāṟṟūkku, neṭuntūkkeṉappaṭṭa Ēḻu tūkkukkaḷumeṉka; Eṉṉai ?“Orucīr centūk kirucīr matalai, muccīr tuṇipu nāṟcīr kōyil,Aiñcīr nivappā maṟucīr kaḻāalē, Eḻucīr neṭuntūk keṉmaṉārpulavar” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

17. kūṭiya neṟiyiṉaveṉṟatu – muṟcollappaṭṭa kūttumpāṭṭum tāḷamum tūkkum tammiṟkūṭiṉa neṟiyaiyuṭaiya Akakkūttumpuṟakkūttum mutalāyiṉaveṉka.

koḷuttuṅkālai – Āṭṭuvikkumiṭatteṉka.

18. piṇṭiyumeṉṟatu – Oṟṟaikkaiyumeṉṟavāṟu.

muṟkūṟiya colvikaṟpamākiya Uṭcol, puṟaccol, Ākāyaccoleṉṉu mūṉṟiṉaiyum, Avinayattōṭē nāṭṭicceyyumiṭattucceyyumuṟaimaitāṉ nāṉkuvakaippaṭum; kaiyum karuttum miṭaṟum carīramumeṉa. Eṉṉai? “Avaitām, kaiyē karuttē miṭaṟē carīrameṉ,ṟeytamuṉ pamaitta vivaiyeṉa moḻipa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Avaṟṟuṭ kaitāṉ Iraṇṭuvakaippaṭum; IṇaiyāviṉaikkaiyumIṇaikkaiyumeṉa. Ivai Oṟṟaikkai Iraṭṭaikkaiyeṉṟum vaḻaṅkappaṭum.

Iṉṉum [Oru cārār] Oṟṟaikkai Iraṭṭaikkaiyeṉṉumivaṟṟai, Ivvakaiyōṭum†

1 Āṇkai mutaliya nāṉkaṉvakaiyiṉai varum veṇpākkaḷālUṇarka:——

(1) “muṭṭi cikara malarpatumañ cantañcam, viṭṭa cilanti mikucūci-Oṭṭum, caturam patākan tarutiripa tākam, Atikamuṟu māṇkainava mām”;

(2) “kaṭakañ cukatuṇṭaṅ kāṅkūla maṉṉum, Aṭaivām piṟaikkai yarāḷam – taṭamaruvu, maṉṉapakkan tāmpira cūṭamoṭu māṉṟalaiyē,Iṉṉaveṭṭum peṇṇāku mē”;

(3) “carppaciram vaṇṭu taṉimukuḷaṅ kattarikai, viṟpaṉañcērkōcaṅka vittamuṭaṉ – Aṟputamē, Āku malikkaika ḷāṟeṉ ṟuraipparē, pākaṉaiya collāy parintu”;

(4) “Uṉṉamā maṇṭala......valampuriyē, meynnilaiyāñ caṅkilatai mēmpaṭavē – maṉṉivaru, tūmamoṭu piṇṭiyāyc coṉṉārpotukkaiyeṉat, tāma muṟuṅkuḻalāy tāṉ.” Ivai cuttāṉantappirakācattiluḷḷaṉa.

Āṇkai, peṇkai, Alikkai,potukkai yeṉṉum nāṉkiṉaiyuṅkūṭṭi Āṟeṉpārumuḷar. Eṉṉai?“meypeṟat terintu mēlō rāynta, kaivakai taṉṉaik karutuṅkālai, Iṇaiyā viṉaikkai yiṇaikkai yeṉṉa, Aṇaiyu meṉpa vaṟintici ṉōrē”, |“......moḻinaru muḷarē”, “Iṇaiyā tiyalva tiṇaiyāviṉaikkai, Iṇaintuṭaṉ varuva tiṇaikkai yākum” Eṉṟu piṟarumkūṟiṉārātaliṉ.

Iṉi Avaṟṟuḷ Iṇaiyā viṉaikkai muppattumūṉṟu vakaippaṭum;Avai:——1. patākai, 2. tiripatākai, 3. kattarikai, 4. tūpam, 5. Arāḷam,6. Iḷampiṟai, 7. cukatuṇṭam, 8. muṭṭi, 9. kaṭakam, 10, cūci,11. patumakōcikam, 12. kāṅkūlam, 13. kapittam, 14. viṟpiṭi, 15. kuṭaṅkai, 16. Alāpattiram, 17. piramaram, 18. tāmpiracūṭam, 19. picācam,20. mukuḷam, 21. piṇṭi, 22. terinilai, 23. meynnilai, 24. Uṉṉam,25. maṇṭalam, 26. caturam, 27. māṉṟalai, 28. caṅku, 29. vaṇṭu, 30.Ilatai, 31. kapōtam, 32. makaramukam, 33. valampuri Eṉa. Eṉṉai ?“Iṇaiyā viṉaikkai yiyampuṅ kālai, Aṇaivuṟu patākai tiripatākaiyē, kattarikai tūpa marāḷa miḷampiṟai, cukatuṇ ṭammē muṭṭikaṭakam, cūci patuma kōcikan tuṇinta, mācilkāṅ kūlam vaḻuvaṟu kapittam, viṟpiṭi kuṭaṅkai yalāpat tiramē, piramaran taṉṉoṭu tāmpira

cūṭam, picāca mukuḷam piṇṭi terinilai, pēciya meynnilai yuṉṉamaṇṭalam, catura māṉṟalai caṅkē vaṇṭē, Atirvi lilatai kapōtamakaramukam, valampuri taṉṉoṭu muppattu mūṉṟeṉ, ṟilaṅkumoḻippulava ricaittaṉa reṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivaṟṟuḷ, piṇṭiyeṉṟatu Oṉṟāy Ākupeyarāṉ Oṟṟaikkaikkup peyarāyiṟṟu.

piṇaiyal – Iṇaitalātalāl Iṇaikkaiyāyiṟṟu. Ātalāṟ piṇṭiyum piṇaiyalumeṉṟāreṉakkoḷka.

Ivaṟṟuṭ piṇṭikkukkāṭṭiya muppattu mūṉṟu vakaiyiṉuḷ,——

patākaikkaiyāvatu – nāṉkuviralum tammuḷ Oṭṭinimirap peruviral kuñcittuniṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“patākaiyeṉpatu pakaruṅ kālaip,peruviral kuñcit talāvira ṉāṉku, maruvi nimiru marapiṟ ṟeṉpa”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ikkaikaḷiṉ toḻil mutaliya virippiṉ Uraiperukumātaliṉ,viṭukkappaṭṭaṉa; virintanūlkaḷiṟ kaṇṭukoḷka. (1)

tiripatākaiyāvatu – patākaikkaiyiṉ |†1 Aṇiviral – pavittira viral.Aṇiviral muṭakkuvatu;Eṉṉai? |“tiripa tākai teriyuṅ kālai, Aṟaipa tākaiyi ṉaṇiviraṉmuṭakkiṉaḵ, tāmeṉa moḻipa vaṟintici ṉōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (2)

kattarikaiyāvatu – tiripatākaiyiṉ muṭaṅkiya Aṇiviraṟpuṟattatākiya naṭuviralaiccuṭṭuviralōṭu porunta nimirppatu; Eṉṉai?“kattarikaiyē kāṇṭaka virippiṉ, Attiri patākaiyi ṉaṇiyiṉpuṟattaic, cuṭṭaka moṭṭa viṭṭunimirp patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (3)

tūpameṉṟatu – nimirnta naṭuviralum cuṭṭuviralum pātippaṭavaḷaiya niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“tūpa meṉpatu tuṇiyuṅ kālai, viḷaṅkukattarikai viralakam vaḷaintu, tuḷaṅku meṉpa tuṇipaṟin tōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (4)

Arāḷamāvatu – peruviral kuñcittuc cuṭṭuviral muṭakki Oḻintaviraṉmūṉṟum nimirntu vaḷaivatu; Eṉṉai? “Arāḷa māva taṟivarakkiḷappiṟ, peruviral kuñcittuc cuṭṭuviraṉ muṭakki, viralkaṇ mūṉṟunimirttakam vaḷaittaṟ, kuriya teṉpa vuṇarntici ṉōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (5)

Iḷampiṟai:——“cuṭṭum |†2 pēṭu – naṭuviral; Itu pēṭiyeṉavum vaḻaṅkappaṭum.pēṭu |†3 Anāmikai – pavittira viral.manāmikai ciṟuviral, Oṭṭi yakamvaḷaiya vocitta peruviral, viṭṭu nīṅkum vitiyiṟ ṟeṉpa.” (6)

cukatuṇṭam:——“cukatuṇṭameṉpatu toḻilpeṟak kiḷappiṟ,cuṭṭuviralum peruvira ṟāṉum, Oṭṭi yukirnuṉai kauvi muṉvaḷain,tanāmikai muṭaṅkap pēṭṭoṭu ciṟuviral, tāṉmika nimirnta takutitteṉpa.” (7)

muṭṭi:——“muṭṭi yeṉpatu moḻiyuṅ kālaic, cuṭṭu naṭuvira lanāmikai ciṟuviral, Iṟuka muṭakki yivaṟṟiṉmicaip peruviral, muṟukappiṭitta muṟaimait teṉpa” (8)

kaṭakam:——“kaṭaka mukamē karutuṅ kālaip, peruvira ṉuṉiyuñ cuṭṭuvira ṉuṉiyu, maruva vaḷaintav vukirnuṉi keḷavi, Oḻinta mūṉṟum vaḻivaḻi nimira, moḻintaṉa reṉpa muṭipaṟin tōrē.” (9)

cūci:——“cūci yeṉpatu tuṇiyuṅ kālai, naṭuviral peruvira leṉṟivai tammil, Aṭaivuṭa ṉoṟṟic cuṭṭuvira ṉimira, Oḻintaṉa vaḻivaḻimuṭaṅki niṟpa, moḻintaṉar mātō muṭipaṟin tōrē.” (10)

patuma kōcikam:——“patuma kōcikam pakaruṅ kālai, Oppakkaivaḷait taintu viralu, meyppaṭa vakaṉṟa vitiyiṟ ṟākum.” (11)

kāṅkūlamāvatu – mūṉṟu vakaippaṭum; kuvikāṅkūlam, mukiḻkāṅkūlam, virikāṅkūlameṉa. Eṉṉai ?“ |†1 kāṅkūlameṉṟatu kuvikāṅkūlattai.kāṅkū lammē karutuṅ kālaic,cuṭṭum pēṭum peruviraṉ mūṉṟum, Oṭṭimuṉ kuviya vanāmikai muṭaṅkic, ciṟuvira ṉimirnta ceykait tākum”, |“mukiḻkāṅ kūla muntuṟamoḻinta, kuvikāṅ kūlaṅ kuviviḻan tatuvē”, |“malarkāṅ kūla matumalarn tatuvē.” (12)

kapittamāvatu – cuṭṭuviraṉuṉiyum peruviraṉuṉiyum Ukirnuṉaikauvippiṭittu Oḻinta mūṉṟuviralum melleṉap piṭippatu; Eṉṉai?“kapitta meṉpatu kāṇuṅ kālaic, cuṭṭup peruvira loṭṭinuṉikauvi, Alla mūṉṟu mellappiṭip patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (13)

viṟpiṭi:——“viṟpiṭi yeṉpatu virikkuṅ kālaic, cuṭṭoṭu pēṭiyanāmikai ciṟuviral, Oṭṭi yakappāl vaḷaiyap peruviral, viṭṭu nimirumvitiyiṟ ṟākum.” Itaṟkuc cikarameṉṟum peyar. (14)

kuṭaṅkaiyāvatu – Ellāviraluṅkūṭṭi Uṭkuḻippatu; Eṉṉai?“kuṭaṅkai yeṉpatu kūṟuṅ kālai, Uṭaṅkuviraṟ kūṭṭi yuṭkuḻippatuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (15)

Alāpattiramāvatu – ciṟuviraṉ mutalākiyavaintum vaḷaintumaṟivatu; Eṉṉai? |“Alāpat tiramē yāyuṅ kālaip, puraimaiyiṉ mikuttaciṟuviraṉ mutalā, varumuṟai yaintum vaḷaintumaṟi vatuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (16)

piramaramāvatu – Anāmikaiviralum naṭuviralum tammiṟporuntivalañcāyap peruviral naṭuviraliṉuḷḷē cērac cuṭṭuviralum ciṟuviralum piṉpē vaḷaintuniṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“piramara meṉpatu pēṇuṅkālai, Anāmikai naṭuvira laṟavuṟap poruntit, tāmvalañ cāyat takaicāl peruviral, Oṭṭiya naṭuvuṭ cērac ciṟuviral, cuṭṭu vaḷaintupiṉṟōṉṟiya nilaiyē” Eṉṟā rākaliṉ. (17)

tāmpiracūṭamāvatu – naṭuviralum cuṭṭuviralum peruviralum tammilnuṉiyottuk kūṭi vaḷaintu ciṟuviralum Aṇiviralum muṭaṅki

nimirvatu; Eṉṉai? “tāmpira cūṭamē cāṟṟuṅ kālaip, pēṭē cuṭṭupperuvira ṉuṉiyottuk, kūṭi vaḷaintu ciṟuvira laṇiviral, Uṭaṉatiṉmuṭaṅki nimiraniṟ patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (18)

pacācamāvatu – peruviralum cuṭṭuviralumaṉṟi Oḻinta mūṉṟuviralum tammiṟpolintu niṟpateṉakoḷka.

Appacācantāṉ mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum; Akanilaippacācam, mukanilaippacācam, Ukirnilaippacācameṉa. Avaṟṟuḷ,

Akanilaippacācam – cuṭṭuviral nuṉiyiṟ peruviral Akappaṭuvatu;

mukanilaippacācam – Avviraṉmukaṅkūṭi Ukirviṭṭu niṟpatu;

Ukirnilaippacācam – cuṭṭuviralum peruviralum Ukirnilai kauviniṟpatu.

Eṉṉai? “pacāca meṉpatu pāṟpaṭak kiḷappiṉ, Akanilai mukanilaiyukirnilai yeṉṉat, tokanilai peṟṟa mūṉṟumeṉa moḻipa”; “Avaitām, cuṭṭuvira ṉuṉiyiṟ peruvira lakappaṭa, Oṭṭivaḷaitta takanilai mukanilai, Avvira ṉuṉikaḷ kauvip piṭittal, cevvi tākuñ ciṟanta vukirnilai, Ukirnuṉai kauviya toḻinta mūṉṟum, takaimaiyi ṉimirttalammūṉṟaṟkun takumē” Eṉṟā rākaliṉ. (19)

mukuḷamāvatu – Aintuviralum tammil talaikuvintu Uyarntuniṟpatu; Eṉṉai; “mukuḷa meṉpatu moḻiyuṅ kālai, Aintu viralumtalaikuvin tēṟpa, vantu nikaḻu māṭcit tākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (20)

piṇṭiyeṉṟatu – cuṭṭuviral pēṭiviral Anāmikai ciṟuviral,Oṭṭi nekiḻamuṭaṅka Avaṟṟiṉmēlē kuṟukkiṭapperuviral kaṭṭi vilaṅkiviral vaḻi muṟaiyoṟṟal; Eṉṉai? |“piṇṭi yeṉpatu pēcuṅkālaic, cuṭṭup pēṭi yanāmikai ciṟuviral, Oṭṭi nekiḻa muṭaṅka vavaṟṟiṉmicai, vilaṅkuṟap peruviral viṭṭuṅ kaṭṭiyum, Ilaṅkuviral vaḻimuṟai yoṟṟalu miyalpē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (21)

terinilaiyāvatu – Ellāviralum virintu kuñcittu niṟpatu;Eṉṉai? “terinilai yeṉpatu ceppuṅ kālai, Aintu viralu malarntukuñcitta, kaivakai yeṉpa kaṟṟaṟin tōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (22)

meynnilaiyāvatu – ciṟuviralum Aṇiviralum naṭuviralum cuṭṭuviralum viṭṭunimirac cuṭṭuviraṉmēṟ peruviral cēravaippatu; Eṉṉai?“meynnilai yeṉpatu viḷampuṅ kālaic, ciṟuvira lanāmikai pēṭoṭucuṭṭivai, Uṟuta liṉṟi nimirac cuṭṭiṉmicaip, peruviral cērum peṟṟit teṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (23)

Uṉṉamāvatu – ciṟuviralum peruviralum tammuṭkūṭa Oḻintamūṉṟu viralum viṭṭu nimirvatu; Eṉṉai? “Uṉṉa nilaiyē yuṇaruṅkālaip, peruviral ciṟuvira leṉṟivai yiṇaiya, varumuṟai mūṉṟumalarntunimir vatuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (24)

maṇṭalam:——“maṇṭala meṉpatu mācaṟak kiḷappiṟ, pēṭu nuṉiyumperuvira ṉuṉiyum, kūṭi vaḷaintutam mukirnuṉai kauvi, Oḻinta mūṉṟu

mokka vaḷaivateṉa, moḻintaṉa reṉpa muḻutuṇarn tōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (25)

caturamāvatu – cuṭṭuviralum naṭuviralum Aṇiviralum tammuṭcērntu Iṟaiñcap peruviral Akamvaravaittuc ciṟuviral piṉpēnimirntu niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? “catura meṉpatu cāṟṟuṅ kālai, maruviyamūṉṟu nimirntakam vaḷaiyap, peruvira lakamuṟap poṟpac cērttic,ciṟuviral piṉpē nimirnta cevviyiṉ, Iṟumuṟait teṉpa viyalpuṇarn tōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (26)

māṉṟalaiyāvatu – peruviralum ciṟuviralumoḻinta mūṉṟum tammil Ottu Oṉṟi muṉṉē Iṟaiñciniṟpatu; Eṉṉai? “māṉṟalaiyeṉpatu vakukkuṅ kālai, mūṉṟiṭai viralu nimirntaka miṟaiñcip,peruviral ciṟuvira leṉṟivai nimirntu, varuva teṉpa vaḻakkaṟintōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (27)

caṅkamāvatu – peruviral nimira Oḻinta nāṉkuviralum vaḷaintuniṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“caṅkeṉap paṭuvatu cāṟṟuṅ kālaic, ciṟuviraṉmutalāc ceṟivira ṉāṉkum, peṟumuṟai vaḷaiyap peruvira ṉimirntāṅ,kiṟumuṟait teṉpa viyalpuṇarn tōrē” Eṉṟā rākaliṉ. (28)

vaṇṭāvatu – peruviralum Aṇiviralum vaḷaintu nuṉiyoṉṟicciṟuviral nimirntu cuṭṭuviralum naṭuviralum nekiḻa vaḷaintu niṟpatu;Eṉṉai? “vaṇṭeṉ patuvē vakukkuṅ kālai, Anāmikai peruviraṉaṉimika vaḷaintu, tānuṉi yoṉṟit takaicāl ciṟuviral, vālitiṉimira maṟṟaiya vaḷainta, pāliṉa teṉpa payaṉṟerin tōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (29)

Ilataiyāvatu – naṭuviralum cuṭṭuviralum kūṭinimirap peruviralAvaṟṟiṉ kīḻvaraicēra Oḻinta Iraṇṭuviralum vaḻimuṟai piṉṉēnimirntu niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“Ilatai yeṉpa tiyampuṅ kālaip, pēṭiyuñ cuṭṭum piṇaintuṭa ṉimirntu, kūṭiya peruviral kīḻvarai kuṟukak,kaṭaiyiru viralum piṉṉar nimirnta, naṭaiyiṉa teṉpa naṉṉeṟippulavar” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (30)

kapōta meṉṟatu – patākaikkaiyiṟ peruviral viṭṭu nimirvatu;Eṉṉai? “kāṇuṅ kālaik kapōta meṉpatu, pēṇiya patākaiyiṟperuvira ṉimirum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (31)

makaramukamāvatu – peruviralum cuṭṭuviralum nimirntukūṭa Oḻintamūṉṟuviralum tammuḷoṉṟi Ataṟku vēṟāy niṟpatu; Eṉṉai?“makaramuka meṉpatu vakukkuṅ kālaic, cuṭṭoṭu peruviral kūṭavoḻintavai, Oṭṭi nimirntāṅ koṉṟā vākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (32)

valampuriyāvatu – ciṟuviralum peruviralu nimirntu cuṭṭuviraliṉAkam vaḷaintu Oḻintaviraṇṭum nimirntu Iṟaiñciniṟpatu: Eṉṉai?valampurik kaiyē vāynta kaṉiṭṭaṉ, nalantikaḻ peruvira ṉayamuṟa

nimirntu, cuṭṭuviraṉ muṭaṅkic ciṟuvira ṉaṭuviral, viṭṭunimirntiṟaiñcum vitiyiṟ ṟeṉṟu, kūṟuvar toṉṉūṟ kuṟippuṇarntōrē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (33)

Iccollappaṭṭa muppattumūṉṟum piṇṭikkaiyeṉakkoḷka.

IṇaiyāviṉaikkaiyeṉiṉumIṇaiyāviṉaikkaiyeṉiṉum †Iṇaiyāviṇaikkai Oṟṟaikkaiyeṉiṉum piṇṭikkaiyeṉiṉumokkum.

Ittaṉmaiyavākiya piṇṭikkaiyumeṉka.

18. piṇaiyalumeṉṟatu – Iraṭṭaikkaiyumeṉṟavāṟu.

Aḵtāvatu Iṇaikkai. Atu patiṉaintu vakaippaṭum.

Avaiyāvaṉa:——Añcali, puṭpāñcali, patumāñcali, kapōtam,kaṟkaṭakam, cuvattikam, kaṭakāvaruttam, niṭatam, tōram, Uṟcaṅkam,puṭpapuṭam, makaram, cayantam, Apayavattam, varuttamāṉameṉṟivai;Eṉṉai? “Eñcuta lillā viṇaikkai yiyampil, Añcali taṉṉoṭupuṭpāñ caliyē, patumāñ caliyē kapōtaṅ kaṟkaṭakam, nalamāñcuvattikaṅ kaṭakā varuttam, niṭatan tōramuṟ caṅka mēmpaṭa, Uṟupuṭpapuṭa makarañ cayantam, Antamil kāṭci yapaya vattam, Eṇṇiya varuttamāṉan taṉṉoṭu, paṇṇuṅ kālaip patiṉain teṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.Avaṟṟuḷ,——

Añcaliyeṉṟatu – Iraṇṭu kaiyum patākaiyāy Akamoṉṟuvatu;Eṉṉai? “Añcali yeṉpa taṟivuṟak kiḷappiṉ, Eñca liṉṟi yirukaiyum patākaiyāy, vantakam poruntu māṭcit teṉṟaṉar, Antamilkāṭci yaṟintici ṉōrē.” (1)

puṭpāñcaliyāvatu – Iraṇṭu kaiyum kuṭaṅkaiyāy vantuOṉṟuvatu; Eṉṉai? |“puṭpāñ caliyē poruntaviru kuṭaṅkaiyum,kaṭṭi niṟkuṅ kāṭciya teṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (2)

patumāñcaliyāvatu – Irukaiyum patumakōcikamākak kūṭṭuvatu;Eṉṉai? “patumāñ caliyē patuma kōcikam, Eṉaviru kaiyu miyaintuniṟpatuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (3)

kapōtameṉṟatu Iraṇṭu kaiyum kapōtamākak kūṭṭuvatu;Eṉṉai? “karutuṅ kālaik kapōta viṇaikkai, Irukaiyuṅ kapōtamicaintuniṟ patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (4)

kaṟkaṭakameṉṟatu – terinilaikkaiyiraṇṭum Aṅkulipiṇaintuvaruvateṉakkoḷka; Eṉṉai? |“karutuṅ kālaik kaṟkaṭa kammē, terinilaiyaṅkuli yirukaiyum piṇaiyum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (5)

cuvattikameṉṟatu – maṇikkaṭṭiṟporuntiya patākai yiraṇṭaiyum maṇikkaṭṭi lēṟṟivaippatu; Eṉṉai? “cuvattika meṉpatucolluṅ kālai, maṇikkaṭ ṭamainta patākai yiraṇṭaiyu, maṇikkaṭṭēṟṟi vaippa tākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (6)

kaṭakāvaruttamāvatu – Iraṇṭu kaiyum kaṭakamāy maṇikkaṭṭukkuĒṟa Iyaintu niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“karutiya kaṭakā varuttak kaiyē,Irukaiyuṅ kaṭaka maṇikkaṭ ṭiyaivatu” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (7)

niṭatamāvatu – muṭṭiyāka Iraṇṭukaiyum camañceyvatu; Eṉṉai?“niṭata meṉpatu neṟippaṭak kiḷappiṉ, muṭṭi yiraṇṭukai yuñcamamākak, kaṭṭi niṟkuṅ kāṭcit teṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (8)

†1 Uṭōḷameṉavum Itu kūṟappaṭum.tōramāvatu – Iraṇṭu kaiyum patākaiyākki Akampuṟamoṉṟimuṉ tāḻntu niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? “tōra meṉpatu tuṇiyuṅ kālai,Irukaiyum patākai yakampuṟa moṉṟa, maruvimuṉ ṟāḻum vaḻakkiṟṟeṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (9)

Uṟcaṅkamāvatu – Orukai piṟaikkaiyākakkoṇṭu Orukai Arāḷamākki Iraṇṭu kaiyum maṇikkaṭṭil Ēṟṟivaippatu; Eṉṉai?“Uṟcaṅka meṉpa tuṇaruṅ kālai, Orukai piṟaikkai yorukaiyarāḷam, teriya maṇikkaṭṭi lēṟṟivaip patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (10)

puṭpapuṭamāvatu – kuṭaṅkaiyiraṇṭum tammiṟ pakkaṅkāṭṭi niṟpatu;Eṉṉai? |“puṭpapuṭa meṉpatu pukaluṅ kālai, Otta viraṇṭu kuṭaṅkaiyumiyaintu, pakkaṅ kāṭṭum pāṉmait teṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (11)

makarameṉṟatu – kapōtamiraṇṭu kaiyum Akampuṟamoṉṟavaippatu;Eṉṉai? “makara meṉpatu vāymaiyi ṉuraippiṟ, kapōta miraṇṭukaiyu makampuṟam, Oṉṟa vaippateṉ ṟuraittaṉar pulavar” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. Uccittameṉpatum Itaṉatu peyar. (12)

cayantameṉṟatu.......... (13)

Apayavattamāvatu – Irukaiyum cukatuṇṭamāka neñcuṟa nōkkinekiḻntu niṟpatu; Eṉṉai? |“Apayavat tammē yaṟivuṟak kiḷappiṉ,vañcamil cukatuṇṭa mirukaiyu māṭciyil, neñcuṟa nōkki nekiḻntuniṟ patuvē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (14)

varuttamāṉamāvatu – mukuḷakkaiyiṟ kapōtakkaiyai Etiriṭṭuccērppatu; Eṉṉai? |“varutta māṉam vakukkuṅ kālai, mukuḷakkaiyiṟ kapōtak kaiyai, nikaḻac cērttu neṟiyiṟ ṟeṉpa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ. (15)

Iccollappaṭṭa patiṉaintum piṇaiyaṟkaiyeṉak koḷka.

Iṇaikkaiyeṉiṉum Iraṭṭaikkaiyeṉiṉum piṇaiyaleṉiṉumokkum.

Ittaṉmaiyavākiya piṇaiyalumeṉka.

18. Eḻiṟkaiyun toḻiṟkaiyumeṉṟatu; Eḻiṟkai – Aḻakupeṟakkāṭṭuṅkai. toḻiṟkai – toḻilpeṟak kāṭṭuṅkai.

Ummaiyāṟ poruṭkaiyum kūṟappaṭṭatu.

poruṭkai – poruḷuṟakkāṭṭuṅkai; Eṉṉai? “Avaitām,Eḻiṟkai yaḻakē toḻiṟkai toḻilē, poruṭkai kaviyiṟ poruḷākummē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

19. koṇṭa vakaiyaṟintu: koṇṭavakaiyaṟitalāvatu – piṇṭi

yum piṇaiyalum puṟakkūttukkuriya kaiyeṉṟum, Eḻiṟkaiyum toḻiṟkaiyum Akakkūttukkuriya kaiyeṉṟumaṟital.

kūttuvarukālaiyeṉṟatu – kūttukkaḷiṉ varavu nikaḻumiṭatteṉka.

20 - 21. kūṭai ceytakai..........kaḷaitalumeṉṟatu – Akakkūttu nikaḻumiṭattu Oṟṟaiyiṟceyta kaittoḻil Iraṭṭaiyiṟ pukāmalum Iraṭṭaiyiṟ ceyta kaittoḻil Oṟṟaiyiṟpukāmalumkaḷaital. Iṉṉum tēciyiṟ kaittoḻil mārkkattup pukāmalum mārkkattukkaittoḻil tēciyiṟpukāmalum kaḷaitaleṉṟumām; OṟṟaiyumIraṭṭaiyum tēcikkūṟākalāṉum Iraṭṭaiyum Iraṭṭaikkiraṭṭaiyumvaṭukiṟ kūṟākalāṉumeṉka.

22 - 3. piṇṭi ceytakai..........kaḷaitalumeṉṟatu:——puṟakkūttiṉiṭattu. piṇṭiyeṉṟatu – poruṭkaiyeṉṟum, piṇaiyaleṉṟatu – toḻiṟkaiyeṉṟumām.

Itaṉ karuttu: Āṭal nikaḻumiṭattu Avinayam nikaḻāmalum Avinayam nikaḻumiṭattu Āṭal nikaḻāmalum kaḷaital.

24. kuravaiyum..........celuttiyeṉṟatu – kuravaik kūttiṟkuriyakālkaḷum varikkūttiṟkuriya kālkaḷum tammil viravātapaṭiyē kūttainaṭattiyeṉka.

†1 pati: 77, 3: 24 -Ām Aṭikaḷiṉ Uraiyaippārkka.“kuravai..........Iyalpiṟ ṟeṉpa.”

“variyeṉap paṭuvatu vakukkuṅ kālaip, piṟanta nilaṉuñ ciṟantatoḻilum, Aṟiyak kūṟi yāṟṟuḻi vaḻaṅkal.”

25. Āṭaṟku..........taṉṉoṭu meṉṟatu – Ikkūttukkaḷai Ippaṭiyāl Avaṟṟuṭaṉē porunta Āṭavum Āṭuvikkavum valla Āṭalāciriyaṉōṭu meṉṟavāṟu.

Aṟintu puṇarttu viḷaṅkavaṟintu Aṟintu celutti AmaintaĀcāṉeṉka.

[Icaiyāciriyaṉ Amaiti]

26 - 36. yāḻuṅkuḻaluñ..........Icaiyōṉ ṟāṉum

(I – ḷ.) yāḻppāṭalum vaṅkiyappāṭalum Iruvakaittāḷak kūṟupāṭukaḷum miṭaṟṟuppāṭalum mantamākiya curattiṉaiyuṭaiya taṇṇumaiyum Akakkūttup puṟakkūttup patiṉōrāṭaleṉṉum kūttukkaḷum vallaṉāy Ivaṟṟuṭaṉē cēracceyta Urukkaḷai IcaikoḷḷumpaṭiyumIratam poruntumpaṭiyum puṇarkkavum vallaṉāy Iruvakaippaṭṭapāṭalkaḷukkum poruḷāṉa Iyakkam nāṉkiṉaiyum Amaittut tēcāntaraṅkaḷiṟ pāṭaikaḷaiyum Aṟintu Antappāṭaikaḷ Icaipūṇumpaṭiyaiyum Aṟintu Iyaṟpulavaṉ niṉaivum nāṭakappulavaṉ ĪṭuvaravukaḷumIvaṟṟukku Aṭaitta pāṭalkaḷum tammiṟ cantippikkumiṭattuk kuṟṟantīrnta nūlvaḻakkālē vakukkavum virikkavum vallaṉāyuḷḷa Icaippulavaṉumeṉṟavāṟu.

Itu poḻippurai.

26. yāḻumeṉṟatu – yāḻppāṭalumeṉṟavāṟu.

yāḻ nālvakaippaṭum; Avai:——pēriyāḻ, makarayāḻ, cakōṭayāḻ,ceṅkōṭṭiyāḻeṉpaṉa. Ivai nālum perumpāṉmaiya; ciṟupāṉmaiyāṉ varuvaṉa piṟavumuḷa; Eṉṉai? “pēriyāḻ piṉṉu makarañcakōṭamuṭaṉ, cīrpoliyuñ ceṅkōṭu ceppiṉār – tārpolintu,maṉṉun tirumārpa vaṇkūṭaṟ kōmāṉē, piṉṉu muḷavē piṟa” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

†1 puṟanā. 152, Uraiyaippārkka.Innālvakai yāḻiṟkum narampukoḷḷumiṭattup pēriyāḻiṟkuIrupattoṉṟum, makarayāḻiṟkup pattoṉpatum, cakōṭayāḻiṟkuppatiṉālum, ceṅkōṭṭiyāḻiṟku Ēḻum koḷḷappaṭum; Eṉṉai?“Oṉṟu mirupatu moṉpatummoṉpatum †mōrēḻmēṟ pattuṭaṉē, niṉṟapati ṉāṟēḻu nēṭuṅkāṟ pattuṭaṉē, niṉṟapati ṉāṉkum piṉṉēḻum – kuṉṟāta, nālvakai yāḻiṟku naṉṉarampu coṉmuṟaiyē,mēlvakai nūlōr viti” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Iṉi Ivviyāḻeṉṉum Oṉṟiṟku Amainta palavuṟuppākiya“kōṭṭiṉa tamaitiyuṅ koḷuviya vāṇiyum, Āṭṭiya pattariṉ vakaiyumāṭakamum, tantiri yamaitiyuñ cāṟṟiya piṟavu, muntiya nūliṉ muṭintavakaiyē” vakukkappaṭṭaṉavellām kāṉalvariyil, |“kuṟṟanīṅkiyayāḻ” Eṉpataṉkaṇ viriyak kūṟutum.

26. kuḻalumeṉṟatu – vaṅkiyappāṭalumeṉṟavāṟu.

kuḻal – vaṅkiyam; Ataṟku mūṅkil, cantaṉam, veṇkalam, ceṅkāli, karuṅkāliyeṉa Aintumām; Eṉṉai? “Ōṅkiya mūṅki luyarcantuveṇkalamē, pāṅkuṟuceṅ kāli karuṅkāli – pūṅkuḻalāy, kaṇṇaṉuvanta kaḻaikkivaika ḷāmeṉṟār, paṇṇamainta nūlvallōrpārttu” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivaṟṟuḷ mūṅkiliṟceyvatu Uttamam; veṇkalam mattimam;Ēṉaiya Atamamām. mūṅkil poḻutuceyyum; veṇkalam valitu; maramEppoḻutum Ottuniṟkum.

Ikkālattuk karuṅkāli ceṅkāli cantaṉam Ivaṟṟāṟ koḷḷappaṭum; karuṅkāli vēṇṭumeṉpatu peruvaḻakku. Ivai koḷḷuṅkālUyarnta Otta nilattiṟ perukavaḷarntu nālukāṟṟu mayaṅkiṉ nātamillaiyāmātalāṉ mayaṅkānilattiṉkaṇ Iḷamaiyum neṭumpirāyamumiṉṟi Oru puruṭāyuppukka periya marattaiveṭṭi Oru puruṭākāramākacceytu Ataṉai niḻalilē Āṟa Iṭṭuvaittut tirukutal piḷattalpōḻntupaṭutaliṉmaiyai Aṟintu Ōr yāṇṭu ceṉṟapiṉ Ilakkaṇavakaiyāṉ vaṅkiyam ceyyappaṭum; Eṉṉai? “Uyarnta camatalatcamatalat ‡camanilat tōṅkikkā ṉāṉkiṉ, mayaṅkāmai niṉṟa marattiṉ – mayaṅkāmē,muṟṟiya māmaran taṉṉai mutaṟaṭintu, kuṟṟamilō rāṇṭiṟ koḷal”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Itaṉ piṇṭiyilakkaṇam:——nīḷam Irupatuviral; cuṟṟaḷavunālarai viral. Itu tuḷaiyiṭumiṭattu nellariciyil Orupāti maraṉiṟuttik kaṭaintu veṇkalattālē Aṇaicupaṇṇi Iṭamukattaiyaṭaittu valamukam veḷiyākaviṭappaṭum; Eṉṉai? “collu mitaṟkaḷavu nālaintāñ cuṟṟaḷavu, nalviralka ṇālaraiyā naṉṉutalāy-mellat, tuḷaiyaḷavu nellarici |tūmpiṭa māya,tūmpiṭa māya, †tūpamiṭamāy vaḷaivalamēl vaṅkiyameṉ” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Iṉit tuḷaiyaḷavilakkaṇam:——Aḷavu Irupatu viral. Itilētūmpu mukattiṉ Iraṇṭu nīkki mutalvāyviṭṭu ImmutalvāykkuĒḻaṅkulam viṭṭu vaḷaivāyiṉumiraṇṭu nīkki naṭuvil niṉṟa Oṉpatuviraliṉum Eṭṭut tuḷai Iṭappaṭum. Ivaṟṟuḷ Oṉṟu muttiraiyeṉṟukaḻittu nīkki niṉṟa Ēḻiṉum Ēḻuviral vaittu Ūtappaṭum. tuḷaikaḷiṉ Iṭaipparappu Oru viralakalam koḷḷappaṭum; Eṉṉai? “Iruviralka ṇikki mutalvāyēḻ nīkki, maruvu tuḷaiyeṭṭu maṉṉum – peruviralkaḷ, nālañcu koḷka parappeṉpa naṉṉutalāy, kōlañceyvaṅkiyattiṉ kūṟu” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivvaṅkiyam Ūtumiṭattu vaḷaivāycērnta tuḷaiyai muttiraiyeṉṟu nīkki muṉṉiṉṟa Ēḻiṉaiyum Ēḻuviralpaṟṟi vācikka.

Ēḻuviralāvaṉa:——Iṭakkaiyiṟperuviralum ciṟuviralum nīkkimaṟṟai mūṉṟuviralum, valakkaiyiṟ peruviraloḻinta nāṉkuviralumĀka Ēḻu viralumeṉka. Eṉṉai? “vaḷaivā yarukoṉṟu muttiraiyāy nīkkit, tuḷaiyēḻi ṉiṉṟa viralkaḷ – viḷaiyāṭ, ṭiṭamūṉṟu nāṉkuvala meṉṟārkā ṇēkā, vaṭamāru meṉmulaiyāy vaittu” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivvaṅkiyattu Ēḻutuḷaikaḷil Icaipiṟakkumāṟu:——Aḵtu Eḻuttāṟ piṟakkum. Eḻuttu, carikamapatani Eṉpaṉa. Ivvēḻeḻuttiṉaiyum māttiraippaṭuttit toḻilceyya Ivaṟṟuḷḷē Ēḻicaiyumpiṟakkum.

Ēḻicaiyāvaṉa:——caṭcam, riṭapam, kāntāram, mattimam, pañcamam,taivatam, niṭātameṉpaṉa. Ivaipiṟantu Ivaṟṟuḷḷē paṇkaḷ piṟakkum; Eṉṉai? “carika mapataniyeṉ ṟēḻeḻuttāṟ ṟāṉam, variparantakaṇṇiṉāy vaittut – terivariya, Ēḻicaiyun tōṉṟu mivaṟṟuḷḷēpaṇpiṟakkum, cūḻmutalāñ cuttat tuḷai” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ittaṉmaittākiya kuḻalumeṉka.

26. cīrumeṉṟatu-“cemmuṟai yuṟaḻpē meynnilai koṭṭa,ṉīṭṭa ṉimirttal” Eṉṟu collappaṭāniṉṟa vaṇṇakkūṟupāṭṭaiyum Iruvakaittāḷak kūṟupāṭṭaiyum pālainilaiyiṉaiyum paṇṇunilaiyiṉaiyum nilaippaṭap paṭuttut tūytākak kāṭṭum taṉmaiyumeṉka.

Itaṉpakutiyellām Īṇṭuraippiṟperukum; vantavaḻikkaṇṭukoḷka. Aḵtaṉṟit tāḷavakaiyōttiṉuḷḷum kāṇalākum.

26. miṭaṟumeṉṟatu- cārīravīṇaiyumeṉṟavāṟu.cārīravīṇaiyumeṉṟavāṟu. ‡carīravīṇai

Ataṉai, “pūtamutaṟ cātaṉattām puṟkalattiṉ mattimattu, nātamuta lāmeḻuttu nālāki – vīti, varuvarattāṟ ṟāṉattāl vantu veḷippaṭ, ṭiruvarattāṟ ṟōṟṟa micaikku” Eṉpataṉāluṇarka.

puṟkalam – Uṭampu. Appuṟkalattukku mutalāyuḷḷa pūtamāvaṉa:maṇ nīr tī vaḷi vāṉ Eṉavivai; Eṉṉai? “maṇṇuṭa ṉīrneruppukkālvāṉa meṉṟivaitām, Eṇṇiya pūtaṅka ḷeṉṟaṟintu – naṇṇiya, maṉṉarkku maṇkoṭuttu māṟṟārkku viṇkoṭutta, teṉṉavarkō māṉē teḷi” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ippūtaṅkaḷaintāṉum puṟkalamām Eṉṟa Ācāṉai māṇākkaṉpaṇintu pūtaṅkaḷ tām Oṉṟōṭoṉṟu kūṭuvaṉavalla; maṇ ceṟitalaik kuṇamāka vuṭaittu; nīr nekiḻtalaik kuṇamākavuṭaittu; tītteṟutalaik kuṇamākavuṭaittu; kāṟṟu Ōriṭattum nilaipeṟṟu niṟpataṉṟu; Ākāya meṉpatu Ōruruvuṇṭillaiyaṉṟu; Aṉṟiyum, “ceppiya pūtaṅkaḷ cērntōr kuṟiyaṉṟē, Apparicu maṇṇaintu nīrnālām – Oppariya, tīyākiṉ mūṉṟiraṇṭu kāṟṟam paramoṉṟu,vēyārun tōḷi viḷampu” Eṉpataṉāl maṇ Aintu payaṉuṭaittu;nīrnāṉku payaṉuṭaittu; tī mūṉṟu payaṉuṭaittu; kāṟṟu Iraṇṭupayaṉuṭaittu; vāṉ Orupayaṉuṭaittu; Ātalāl Ivai Oṉṟōṭoṉṟu kūṭuvaṉa vallavākavum Ivaṟṟiṉ kūṭṭam Uṭampeṉṟīrātalāl Ivvaintiṉ kūṭṭam Uṭampāvatu Evvāṟōveṉiṉ,——Itaṟkuviṭai, “meyvāy kaṇ mūkkuc ceviyeṉap pērpeṟṟa, Aivāyumāyavaṟṟiṉ mītaṭuttut – tuyya, cuvaiyoḷi yūṟōcai nāṟṟameṉṟaintāl, Avaimutaṟ puṟkala mām” Eṉpatu. Itu pūtaṅkaḷpariṇamittu Uṭampāmāṟu kūṟukiṉṟatu:——

pūtaṅkaḷaintum tattam taṉmainīṅki maṇ Uṭampāyum, nīr vāyāyum, tīk kaṇṇāyum, kāṟṟu mūkkāyum, Ākāyam ceviyāyum niṉṟuUṭampām. poṟikaḷtōṟum viṉiyōkappaṭṭa pulaṉ cuvaimutalAintu vakaippaṭum. Ivvaintum poṟiyaintiṉumēṟi, maṇṇālUṭampu Ūṟāyum, nīrāl vāy cuvaiyāyum, tīyāṟ kaṇ Oḷiyāyum,kāṟṟāl mūkku nāṟṟamāyum, vāṉāṟ cevi Ōcaiyāyum vantu Uṭampām. Aṉṟiyum maṇṇiṉpakuti, narampu Iṟaicci Eṉpu mayirtōleṉa Aintu. nīriṉ pakuti, nīr mūḷai cukkilam niṇam Utirameṉavaintu.

“pacicōmpu maituṉaṅ kāṭcinīr vēṭkai, tecikiṉṟa tīkkuṇamōraintu – mocikiṉṟa, pōkku varavunōy kumpittaṉ meypparicam, vākkuṭaiya kāṟṟiṉ vakai” Eṉpatu tīyiṉ kuṇamum kāliṉkuṇamumuṇarttukiṉṟatu; Āvaṉa: paci cōmpu maituṉam kāṭci nīrvēṭkaiyeṉavivai tīkkuṇam. pōkku varavu nōy kumpittal paricameṉavivai kāṟṟiṉ kuṇam.

“Ōṅkum vekuḷi matamāṉa māṅkāram, nīṅkā vulōpamuṭa ṉivvaintum – pāṅkāya, vaṇṇa mulaimaṭavāy vāṉakattiṉ kūṟeṉṟār,Eṇṇimika nūluṇarntō reṇ.” Iḵtu Ākāyattiṉ kuṇamUṇarttukiṉṟatu; Āvaṉa: vekuḷi matam māṉam Āṅkāram Ulōpameṉavivai. Ippūtakuṇam Irupattaintum koṇṭu Uṭampām.

“Oppār pirāṇa ṉapāṉa ṉutāṉaṉuṭaṉ, tappā viyāṉaṉ camāṉaṉē – Ippālum, nākaṉ ṟaṉañcayaṉ kūrmaṉ kirukaraṉ, tītilāttēvatattaṉē” Eṉpatu taca vāyukkaḷaiyum Uṇarttukiṉṟatu;Āvaṉa:——pirāṇaṉ Apāṉaṉ Utāṉaṉ viyāṉaṉ camāṉaṉ nākaṉkūrmaṉ kirukaraṉ tēvatattaṉ taṉañcaya ṉeṉavivai.

“Iṭaipiṅ kalaicuḻuṉai kāntāri yatti, puṭainiṉṟa ciṅkuvaicaṅkiṉi pūṭāvō, ṭaṅkuku kaṉṉi yalampuṭaiyeṉṟuraittār, taṅkutaca nāṭika ṭām.” taca nāṭikaḷāvaṉa:——Iṭai, piṅkalai, cuḻumuṉai,kāntāri, Atti, ciṅkuvai, caṅkiṉi, pūṭā, kuku, kaṉṉi, AlampuṭaiEṉavivai.

“pūta vakaikaḷō raintāyp poṟiyaintāy, vātaṉaiyōraiyaintāy mārutamum – mētakucīrp, pattāku nāṭikaḷum pattākumpāriṭattē, muttikku vittā muṭampu” Eṉpatu pūtapariṇāmam Uṇarttukiṉṟatu:——pūtaṅkaḷ Aintāvaṉa:——maṇ mutalāyiṉa: poṟiyaintāvaṉa:——cevi mutalāyiṉa; pulaṉaintāvaṉa:——catta mutalāyiṉa;vātaṉai Aiyaintāvaṉa:——narampu mutaliya Aintum, nīr mutaliyaAintum, paci mutaliya Aintum, pōkku mutaliya Aintum, vekuḷi mutaliya Aintum; taca vāyukkaḷāvaṉa:——pirāṇaṉ mutaliya pattum; tacanāṭikaḷāvaṉa:——Iṭai piṅkalai mutaliya pattum; mūlātārattu Eḻupattīrāyira nāṭikaḷum pīrkkaṅkūṭṭiṉ mūṉṟu kaṇṇumpōla Iṭaipiṅkalai cuḻumuṉaiyeṉṉum mūṉṟu nāṭikaḷumāy naṭuvuniṉṟa cuḻumuṉaiyoḻiya Iraṇṭāṉum mēṉōkkiyēṟi Iraṇṭu mūkkāṉumŌrōr pāricattu Aintu nāḻikaiyākak koṇṭu Oru māttiraiyilnūṟṟirupattaintu cuvātamāy Orucuvātattilē paṉṉiraṇṭaṅkuliyaḷavu puṟappaṭṭu nālaṅkuli tēyntu Eṇ viralaṭaṅkukiṉṟatu pirāṇavāyuveṉak koḷka.

māttiraiyāvatu:——Iraṇṭarai nāḻikaiyai |EṭṭukkūṟiṭṭuOru kūṟeṉṟaṟika.EṭṭukkūṟiṭṭuOru kūṟeṉṟaṟika. †Irupatteṭṭuk

Apāṉavāyu mala mūttiraṅkaḷaip peyvikkum. Utāṉaṉ kaṇṭattāṉattil niṟkum. viyāṉavāyu pōkkuvaravu ceytu Iyaṅkap paṇṇum. camāṉavāyu Aṟuvakaic cuvaiyaiyum Aṉṉattaiyum pirittuEḻuvakait tātuviṉ kaṇṇum kalappikkum. kūrmaṉ Imaippumviḻippum Uṟakkamum Uṇarcciyum paṇṇum. nākaṉ vikkal Iṭuvikkum. kirukaraṉ kōpattaip paṇṇuvikkum. tēvatattaṉ Uṭamperippaip paṇṇuvikkum. taṉañcayaṉ pirāṇaṉ pōṉapiṉṉumUṭampai viṭātēniṉṟu mūṉṟānāḷ Utippittu Uccantalaiyiṟ piṟkūṟṟilē mūṉṟu neṟkiṭai veṭittup pōmeṉṟaṟika.

nāṭikaḷ Eḻupattīrāyirattilum tacanāṭikaḷ piratāṉameṉakkoḷka.

Eṉṉai? “Iṭaipiṅ kalaiyiraṇṭu mēṟum pirāṇaṉ, puṭainiṉṟapāṉaṉmalam pōkkum – taṭaiyiṉṟi, Uṇṭaṉakī ḻākku mutāṉaṉcamāṉaṉeṅkum, koṇṭeṟiyu māṟiratak kūṟu” Eṉavum, “kūrmaṉimaippuviḻi kōṇākaṉ vikkalām, pērvil viyāṉaṉ peritiyakkum-pōrmaliyum, kōpaṅ kirukaraṉāṅ kōppi ṉuṭamperipput, tēvatattaṉākumeṉṟu tēr” Eṉavum, “Oḻinta taṉañcayaṉpē rōti luyirpōyk, kaḻintālum piṉṉuṭalaik kaṭṭi – Aḻintaḻiya, munnā ḷutippittu muṉṉiyavāṉ māviṉṟip, piṉṉā veṭittuviṭum pērntu”Eṉavum Icai nuṇukkamuṭaiya cikaṇṭiyārum kūṟiṉārākaliṉ.

Iṅṅaṉam pūtaṅkaḷāṉum poṟi mutaliyavaṟṟāṉum vāyukkaḷāṉumnāṭikaḷāṉum pariṇamittuc cukkila curōṇitaṅkaḷālē Uṭampukoṇṭu Iruviṉaiyum taṉṉakattaṭakki Uyir piṟakkumeṉṟaṟika.

“tuyya vuṭampaḷavu toṇṇūṟṟā ṟaṅkuliyā, meyyeḻuttuniṉṟiyaṅku mellattāṉ – vaiyat, tirupālu nāṟpatō ṭēḻpātinīkkik, karuvāku mātāraṅ kāṇ” Eṉpatu Icaikkup piṟappiṭamāyuḷḷa Ātāram Uṇarttukiṉṟatu:——

carīrattaḷavu taṉ kaiyāl toṇṇūṟṟā ṟaṅkulam. Itaṉuḷmēlē nāṟpattēḻarai yaṅkulamum kīḻē nāṟpattēḻarai yaṅkulamumviṭṭu naṭuniṉṟa Ōraṅkulam mūlātāram. Itaṉ mēlē nālviralviṭṭup piṉṉātāram niṉṟiyaṅkumeṉak koḷka.

“Ātāram paṟṟi yacaiva mutaleḻuttu, mūtārnta meyyeḻuttumuṉkoṇṭu – pōtāru, munti yiṭaivaḷiyā yōṅkumiṭai piṅkalaiyāl, vantumē lōcaiyām vaippu”, |“Aivakaip pūtamu māya carīrattu, meypeṟa niṉṟiyaṅku meyyeḻuttāl – tuyya, Orunāṭi niṉṟiyaṅki yuntimē lōṅki, varumā leḻuttuṭampiṉ vantu.”

Iṉi Āḷattiyāmāṟuṇarttukiṉṟatu:——“makaratti ṉoṟṟāṟcuruti viravum, pakaruṅ kuṟiṉeṭilpārittu – nikarilāt, teṉṉā teṉāveṉṟu pāṭuvarē lāḷatti, maṉṉāvic colliṉ vakai.” mutaliṟpāṭumiṭattu makarattiṉoṟṟālē nātattai Uccarikkumarapu pakariṟpārittu muṟkūṟiya nātattiṉait toḻilceyyumiṭattuk kuṟṟeḻuttālum neṭṭeḻuttālum ceyyappaṭum.

Avai Accu pāraṇaiyeṉṟu peyarpeṟum. Accukku Eḻuvāykuṟṟeḻuttu. pāraṇaikku Eḻuvāy neṭṭeḻuttu. Accu tāḷattuṭaṉnikaḻum. pāraṇai kūttuṭaṉ nikaḻum.

Āḷatticeyyumiṭattut teṉṉāveṉṟum, teṉāveṉṟum Iraṇṭacaiyuṅkūṭṭit teṉṉāteṉāveṉṟum pāṭappaṭum. Ivaitām kāṭṭāḷatti, niṟavāḷatti, paṇṇāḷattiyeṉa mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum.

Ivaṟṟuṭ kāṭṭāḷatti Accuṭaṉikaḻum. niṟavāḷatti niṟam kulaiyāmaṟ pāraṇaiyuṭaṉikaḻum. paṇṇāḷatti paṇṇaiyē karuti vaikkappaṭum.

“kuṉṟāk kuṟilaintuṅ kōṭā neṭilaintum, niṉṟārnta mannakarantavvoṭu – naṉṟāka, nīḷattā lēḻu nitāṉattā ṉiṉṟiyaṅka, Āḷattiyāmeṉ ṟaṟi” Eṉpatu Āḷattikku Iṉṉum paṭuvatōrilakkaṇamUṇarttukiṉṟatu:——kuṉṟākkuṟilaintum kōṭāneṭilaintumeṉṟatu-kuṟṟeḻuttālum neṭṭeḻuttālum Āḷatti ceyyappaṭum E – ṟu.kuṟṟeḻuttaintāvaṉa:——A I U E O; neṭṭeḻuttaintāvaṉa:——Ā Ī Ū Ē Ō Eṉa Ivai. niṉṟārnta veṉṟatu – meyyeḻuttākiyapatiṉeṭṭeḻuttuḷḷum mavvum navvum tavvumeṉa mūṉṟeḻuttumallā maṟṟai yeḻuttukkaḷ Āḷattikku varappeṟā E – ṟu. Immūvakaimeyyiṉuḷḷum mavviṉam cuttattiṟkurittu: navviṉamcāḷarattiṟkurittu; tavviṉam tamiḻkkurittu; viravavum peṟum.

Iṅṅaṉam mūlātārantoṭaṅkiya Eḻuttiṉ nātam Āḷattiyāyppiṉ Icaiyeṉṟum paṇṇeṉṟum peyarām; Eṉṉai? “pāvōṭaṇaita licaiyeṉṟār paṇṇeṉṟār, mēvār peruntāṉa meṭṭāṉum – pāvāy, Eṭuttaṉ mutalā virunāṉkum paṇṇip, paṭuttamaiyāṟ paṇṇeṉṟu pār.” pala Iyaṟpākkaḷuṭaṉē niṟattai Icaittalāl Icaiyeṉṟu peyarām.

peruntāṉameṭṭiṉum kiriyaikaḷeṭṭālum paṇṇippaṭuttalāṟpaṇṇeṉṟu peyarāyiṟṟu.

peruntāṉameṭṭāvaṉa: neñcum miṭaṟum nākkum mūkkum Aṇṇākkum Utaṭum pallum talaiyumeṉa Ivai.

kiriyaikaḷeṭṭāvaṉa:——Eṭuttal paṭuttal nalital kampitam kuṭilam Oli Uruṭṭu tākku Eṉa Ivai.

Iṅṅaṉampiṟantu paṇṇappaṭum paṇṇum Icaiyumākiya Ivaṟṟaip payakkum miṭaṟu Ākupeyarāṉ miṭaṟṟuppāṭaṟkāyiṟṟu.

27. tāḻkuraṟ ṟaṇṇumaiyeṉṟatu – tāḻnta kuraliṉaiyuṭaiyataṇṇumaikkaruvi mutalāyiṉa vācittalumeṉka.

Avaiyāvaṉa:——pērikai, paṭakam, Iṭakkai, Uṭukkai, mattaḷam,callikai, karaṭikai, timilai, kuṭamuḻā, takkai, kaṇappaṟai, tamarukam,taṇṇumai, taṭāri, Antari, muḻavu, cantiravaḷaiyam, montai, muracu,kaṇviṭutūmpu, nicāḷam, tuṭumai, ciṟupaṟai, Aṭakkam, takuṇiccam,viralēṟu, pākam, Upāṅkam, nāḻikaippaṟai, tuṭi, perumpaṟaiyeṉattōlāṟ ceyyappaṭṭa karuvikaḷ.

Eṉṉai? “pērikai paṭaka miṭakkai yuṭukkai, cīrmiku mattaḷañcallikai karaṭikai, timilai kuṭamuḻāt takkai kaṇappaṟai, tamarukantaṇṇumai tāvi ṟaṭāri, Antari muḻavoṭu cantira vaḷaiyam, montaimuracē kaṇviṭu tūmpu, nicāḷan tuṭumai ciṟupaṟai yaṭakka, māciṟakuṇiccam viralēṟu pākam, tokka vupāṅkan |†1 muṉpukūṟiya nāḻikaippaṟai Ivviṭattukkūṟappaṭṭilatu.tuṭiperum paṟaiyeṉa,mikka nūlōr viritturait taṉarē” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ivai Akamuḻavu Akappuṟamuḻavu puṟamuḻavu puṟappuṟamuḻavu |paṇṇamaimuḻavupaṇṇamaimuḻavu †paṉmaimuḻavu nāṇmuḻavu kālaimuḻaveṉa Eḻuvakaippaṭum.

Avaṟṟuḷ Akamuḻavāvaṉa:——muṉcoṉṉa |†1 “taritta mataṅkamoṭu mattaḷañ calli, perutta karaṭikaiyēpēri – Uratta, paṭakaṅ kuṭamuḻavam pāṅkāya vēḻum, Aṭaivē mutaṟkaruvi yām” Eṉpatu cuttāṉantappirakācam.Uttamamāṉa mattaḷamcallikai Iṭakkai karaṭikai pērikai paṭakam kuṭamuḻā veṉavivai.

Akappuṟamuḻavāvaṉa:——muṉcoṉṉa mattimamāṉa taṇṇumaitakkai takuṇiccamutalāyiṉa.

puṟamuḻavāvaṉa:——muṉcoṉṉa Atamakkaruviyāṉa kaṇappaṟaimutalāyiṉa.

puṟappuṟamuḻavāvaṉa:——muṟkūṟappaṭāta neytaṟpaṟaimutalāyiṉa.

paṇṇamaimuḻavāvaṉa:——muṉcoṉṉa vīramuḻavu nāṉkum.Avaiyāvaṉa:——muracu nicāḷam tuṭumai timilaiyeṉavivai.

nāṇmuḻavāvaṉa:——nāṭpaṟai; Āvatu nāḻikaippaṟai.

kālaimuḻavāvaṉa:——muṉtuṭiyeṉṟatu.

Iṉi Ivaṟṟuḷ, mattaḷam:——mattu Ōcaippeyar; Icaiyiṭaṉākiyakaruvikaṭkellām taḷamātalāṉ mattaḷameṉṟu peyarāyiṟṟu.

Ikkaruvi palakūttukkaḷukku Urittākalāṉum pāṭaleḻuttāṉUḷḷē piṟattalāṉum muḻavukaḷellām Itaṉuḷḷē piṟattalāṉumItaṉai |nāṉmukaṉeṉpar.nāṉmukaṉeṉpar. ‡nāṉmukaṉāmeṉṟavāṟu

callikaiyeṉṟatu – calleṉṟa Ōcaiyaiyuṭaittātalāṟ peṟṟapeyar.

Āvañciyeṉiṉum kuṭukkaiyeṉiṉum Iṭakkaiyeṉiṉumokkum;Ataṟku Āviṉuṭaiya vañcittōlaip pōrttalāl Āvañciyeṉṟupeyarāyiṟṟu; kuṭukkaiyākavaṭaittalāṟ kuṭukkaiyeṉṟu peyarāyiṟṟu; viṉaikkiriyaikaḷ Iṭakkaiyāṟceytaliṉ Iṭakkaiyeṉṟupeyarāyiṟṟu.

karaṭi kattiṉāṟpōlum Ōcaiyaiyuṭaittātalāṟ karaṭikaiyeṉṟupeyarāyiṟṟu.

piṟavaṟṟaiyum Iṅṅaṉam Uyttuṇarntukoḷka.

Ivaṟṟuḷ mutaliṟ karaṅkoḷvatu mattaḷamātaliṉ mutaṟkaruviyāyiṟṟu.

Iṭaikkaruvi calli; Iṭaikoḷa vaittatākaliṉ.

kaṭaikkaruvi Uṭukkai; kaṭaikkaṭṭaṭṭukku Urittākaliṉ.

Iṅṅaṉamākiya karuvikaṭkellām mutalātal nōkkit taṇṇumaiyoṉṟaṉaiyumē kūṟiṉār.

27. Āṭaloṭeṉṟatu – Akakkūttup puṟakkūttup patiṉōrāṭaleṉṟu collappaṭāniṉṟa Āṭaluṭaṉē E – ṟu.

Oṭu: Uṭaṉikaḻcci; “Oṭuveṉ kiḷavi yuṭaṉikaḻ vākum” Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Iccollappaṭṭavaṟṟuṭaṉē yeṉṟavāṟu.

27 - 8. Ivaṟṟi ṉicainta......paṭutteṉṟatu——Iccollappaṭṭakūttukkaḷukkuccēracceyta Urukkaḷai Icaikoḷḷumpaṭiyum cuvaiporuntumpaṭiyum puṇarkkavallaṉāki E – ṟu.

29. varikkum Āṭaṟkum Uripporuḷiyakkiyeṉṟatu – centuṟaiveṇṭuṟai Eṉṉappaṭāniṉṟa Iruvakaippāṭalkaḷukkum Urimaipporuḷāyamainta Iyakkam nāṉkiṉaiyum Amaitteṉṟavāṟu.

30. tēcikattiruviṉ Ōcai kaṭaippiṭitteṉṟatu – Iyaṟcoltiricol ticaic col vaṭacol Eṉṟu collappaṭṭa coṟkaḷIcaipūṇumpaṭiyaik kaṭaippiṭittaṟinteṉṟavāṟu.

31 - 2. tēcikattiruviṉ......Aṟiviṉaṉākiyeṉṟatu – Iccoṟkaḷiṟ puṇarppuṇṭa Icaivēṟupāṭukaḷaiyellām kuṟṟantīra Uṇaravalla Aṟiviṉaiyuṭaiyaṉāki E – ṟu.

33. kaviyatu kuṟippumeṉṟatu – Iyaṟpulavaṉ niṉainta kōṭpāṭumeṉka.

Āṭaṟ ṟokutiyumeṉṟatu – Āṭalāciriyaṉ Īṭum mēlvaravukaḷiṉtokutiyum E – ṟu.

34. pakutippāṭalumeṉṟatu – Ivaṟṟiṉpakutikku Amainta pāṭalum Eṉṟavāṟu.

koḷuttuṅ kālaiyeṉṟatu – Ikkūttukkaḷai Āciriyaṉ kuṟippukkum pāṭaluḷḷiṭṭavaṟṟukkum cēraviyaṟṟumiṭatteṉṟavāṟu.

35 - 6. vacaiyaṟukēḷvi......Icaiyōṉṟāṉumeṉṟatu – Iccollappaṭṭavaṟṟaik kuṟṟantīrnta nūlvaḻakkālē vakukkavum virikkavumvalla pāṭalāciriyaṉumeṉka.

Icaiyuṭaṉpaṭuttu Iyakkik kaṭaippiṭittu Uṇarnta Aṟiviṉaṉāki virikkum Icaiyōṉeṉka.

[kaviñaṉ Amaiti]

37 - 44. Imiḻkaṭal......naṉṉūṟpulavaṉum

37 - 8. Imiḻkaṭal......taṉmaiyaṉākiyeṉṟatu – Āravārattaiyuṭaiya kaṭalcūḻnta nilattilē vaṭakkum teṟkum kuṭakkum kuṇakkumvēṅkaṭam kumari tīmpuṉaṟpauvameṉat tamiḻnāṭṭiṟku Ellaikūṟappaṭṭa tamiḻttēcattāraṟiya mūṉṟutamiḻum pōmeṉṉum taṉmaiyaiyuṭaiyaṉāki E – ṟu.

39 - 40. vēttiyal......piṭitteṉṟatu – vēttiyaleṉṟum potuviyaleṉṟum kūṟappaṭṭa Iraṇṭu kūṟupāṭṭiṉaiyuṭaiya nāṭakanūlainaṉṟākak kaṭaippiṭittu E – ṟu.

vēttiyal Akam, potuviyal puṟameṉpārum, piṟitukūṟuvārumuḷar. Avai muṭinta nūlkaḷiṟ kaṇṭukoḷka.

41 - 2. Icaiyōṉ......Atupaṭa vaitteṉṟatu – IcaippulavaṉĀḷattivaitta paṇṇīrmaiyai mutalum muṟaiyum muṭivum niṟaiyumkuṟaiyum kiḻamaiyum valivum melivum camaṉum varaiyaṟaiyum nīrmaiyumeṉṉum patiṉorupākupāṭṭiṉāṉum Aṟintu AṟintavaṇṇamAvaṉ tāḷa nilaiyil Eytavaitta niṟam taṉ kaviyiṉiṭattē tōṉṟavaikkavallaṉāy E – ṟu.

43 - 4. māṟṟōr ceyta......naṉṉūṟ pulavaṉumeṉṟatu – pakaivarāṟ ceyyappaṭṭa vacaiyiṉ Aḷavaṟintu Avai tōṟṟātapaṭiyilēvacaiyiṉmoḻikaḷāṉ nāṭakakkavi ceyyavalla nalla nūlaivalla pulavaṉum E – ṟu.

“Iṉṉa ṉallōṉ ceykuva ṉāyiṟ, ṟēṟṟā mānta rāriyampōlak, kēṭṭārk kellām perunakai tarumē” Eṉṟār.

taṉmaiyaṉākik kaṭaippiṭittu Uṇarntu vaittu Aṟintutolaivillāta pulavaṉumeṉka.

[taṇṇumaiyōṉ Amaiti]

45 - 55. Āṭal pāṭa licaiyē......mutalvaṉum

(I – ḷ.) Ellāk kūttukkaḷum Ellāppāṭṭukkaḷum EllāIcaikaḷum vaṭaveḻuttorīi vanta Eḻuttāṉē kaṭṭappaṭṭa vākkiyakkaṭṭaḷaik kūṟupāṭukaḷum Ellāppaṇkaḷum Iruvakaittāḷaṅkaḷum Eḻuvakait tūkkukkaḷum Ivaṟṟiṉ kuṟṟaṅkaḷum Iyaṟcolmutaliya nālvakaic coṟkaḷumeṉṟu collappaṭṭaṉavaṟṟai nuṇṇitāka Uṇarntu Ōrōr Uruvai Iraṭṭikkiraṭṭi cērttaviṭattunekiḻātapaṭi nirampa niṟuttavum Avviṭattup peṟum IraṭṭiyaippākavuruvāṉavaḻiIraṭṭiyaippākavuruvāṉavaḻi †Iraṭṭiyē yāyppākavuru, Iraṭṭiyai Oppāka niṟkumāṉam niṟuttik kaḻiyumāṉam kaḻikkavumvallaṉāy Ippaṭi nikaḻnta Urukkaḷil yāḻppāṭalum kuḻaliṉpāṭalumkaṇṭappāṭalum Iyaintu naṭakkiṉṟapaṭi kēṭpōr cevikkoḷḷaAmainta kāraṇattāṟ kuṟiyaṟintu cēravācittu maṟṟaik karuvikaḷiṟkuṟainirapputalum mikutiyaṭakkutalum Ākkumiṭattum AṭakkumiṭattumIcaiyil Irantirantōṉṟātapaṭiyē ceytalum ceyyumiṭattuk kaittoḻil Aḻakupeṟac ceytu kāṭṭalum vallaṉāy Aḻakutakka taṇṇumaik karuviyiṉaiyum Ariya toḻiliṉaiyumuṭaiya Āciriyaṉumeṉṟavāṟu.

Itu poḻippurai.

45. Āṭaleṉṟatu – Ellākkūttukkaḷum E – ṟu.

pāṭaleṉṟatu paṇṇal mutaliya Ellāp pāṭal Iyalpum E – ṟu.

Icaiyeṉṟatu – narappaṭaivāluraikkappaṭṭa patiṉōrāyirattuttoḷḷāyirattut toṇṇūṟṟoṉṟākiya Ātiyicaikaḷum E – ṟu.

Avaiyāvaṉa:——“Uyiruyir meyyaḷa vuraittavaim pāliṉum,Uṭaṟami ḻiyalicai yēḻuṭaṉ pakuttu, mūvēḻ peytan..........toṇṭumīṇṭa paṉṉī rāyiram, koṇṭaṉa riyaṟṟal koḷaivallōr kaṭaṉē”Eṉṉum cūttirattāl Uṟaḻntu kaṇṭukoḷka.

tamiḻeṉṟatu – vaṭaveḻuttorīi vanta Eḻuttāṉē Uṟaḻntukaṭṭappaṭṭa vākkiyakkūṟukaḷum, Iyalicaināṭakameṉṟu collappaṭṭa mūvakait tamiḻkaḷum E – ṟu.

46. paṇṇeṉṟatu – narappaṭaivāl niṟantōṉṟap paṇṇappaṭāniṉṟa paṇṇum paṇṇiyaṟṟiṟamum tiṟamum tiṟattiṟamum E – ṟu.

pāṇi yeṉṟatu – Iruvakaittāḷa vikaṟpaṅkaḷum E – ṟu.

tūkkeṉṟatu – centūkku mutalāya Ēḻu tūkkukkaḷum E – ṟu.

muṭameṉṟatu – Ivaṟṟiṉ kuṟṟaṅkaḷum E – ṟu.

47. tēcikameṉṟatu – Iyaṟcol mutaliya nāṉku coṟkūṟāyacoṟpirayōkamum E – ṟu.

Eṉṟivaiyāciṉuṇarnteṉṟatu – Eṉṟu collappaṭṭa OṉpatumIlakkaṇavaḻiyē nuṇṇitāka Aṟintu E – ṟu.

Ācu – ciṟumai.

Āciṉṟeṉpatu pāṭamāyiṟ kuṟṟamiṉṟiyuṇarnteṉka: Eṉṉai?“Ācē ciṟumaiyuṅ kuṟṟamu mākum” (tivākaram) Eṉṟārākaliṉ.Iṉṟiyeṉṟatu Iṉṟāyiṟṟu; ceyyuḷātaliṉ.

48 - 9. kūṭai nilattai......vāṅkiyeṉṟatu – Ōr UruvaiIraṭṭik kiraṭṭi cērttaviṭattu nekiḻātapaṭi nirampa niṟuttavum Avviṭattuppeṟum Iraṭṭiyaip pāka Uruvāṉavaḻi niṟkumāṉam niṟuttikkaḻiyumāṉam kaḻikkavum vallaṉāy E – ṟu.

50 - 52. vāṅkiya vārattu..........cērttiyeṉṟatu – Ippaṭinikaḻnta Urukkaḷil yāḻppāṭalum kuḻalicaiyum kaṇṭappāṭalumIyaintu naṭakkiṉṟapaṭi kēṭpōr cevikkoḷḷat taṇṇumaikkaruviyamainta karaṇattāṟ kuṟiyaṟintu cēravācittu E – ṟu.

53. Ākkalāvatu – maṟṟaikkaruvikaḷiṟ kuṟaiyai nirapputal.

Aṭakkalāvatu – maṟṟaikkaruvikaḷiṉ mikutiyai Aṭakkutal.

mīttiṟam paṭāmaiyāvatu – Ākkumiṭattum Aṭakkumiṭattum Irantiram teriyāmaṟ ceyvateṉka.

54. cittirak......celuttumeṉṟatu – Ivvaṉaittum ceyyumiṭattuk kaittoḻil Aḻakupeṟac ceytu kāṭṭum E – ṟu.

55. Attaku......mutalvaṉumeṉṟatu – Iccollappaṭṭa kūṟukaḷilOṉṟum kuṟaiviṉṟiyēyirukkum taṇṇumaikkaruviyāciriyaṉum E – ṟu.

Uṇarntu mikuttu vāṅkic cērttic celuttum taṇṇumaimutalvaṉumeṉka.

[kuḻalōṉ Amaiti]

56 - 69. colliyaviyalpiṟ..........kuḻalōṉṟāṉum

56. colliyaviyalpiṉeṉṟatu – nūlkaḷiṟcoṉṉa muṟaimaiyālēyeṉka.

56 - 7. cittira vañcaṉai......Aṟinteṉṟatu – cittirappuṇarppumvañcaṉaippuṇarppumeṉṟu collappaṭṭa Iraṇṭu kūṟṟiṉaiyum Aṟinteṉka.

Ivaṟṟuṭ cittirappuṇarppāvatu:——Icaikoḷḷum Eḻuttukkaḷiṉ mēlē valloṟṟu vantavaḻi melloṟṟuppōlap paṇṇīrmainiṟuttal.

vañcaṉaippuṇarppāvatu:——Icaikoḷḷā Eḻuttukkaḷiṉmēlēvalloṟṟu vantavaḻi melloṟṟuppōla nekiḻttuppuṇarttal.

57. puṇarppōṉpaṇpiṉeṉṟatu – pāṭalāciriyaṉaiyotta Aṟiviṉai yuṭaiyaṉākiyeṉka.

58. varttaṉai..........peytāṅkeṉṟatu – vaṅkiyattu viraluḷarntūtun tuḷaikaḷ tarccaṉi mutalāka viṭṭuppiṭippatu Ārōkaṇamātalāṉum kaṉiṭṭaṉ mutalāka viṭṭuppiṭippatu AvarōkaṇamātalāṉumIraṇṭukūṟum Ippaṭicceytal varttaṉaiyākalāṉ Ippaṭiyāl |†1 3: 72-8, Uraiyaip pārkka.nūṟṟumūṉṟu paṇṇīrmaikaḷaiyum tannilaikulaiyāmaṟ kāṭṭavallaṉāyeṉka.

[tarccaṉi – cuṭṭuviral. kaṉiṭṭaṉ – ciṟuviral] Āṅku – Avviṭattu.

59 - 60. Ēṟṟiya kuraliḷi..........Uṇarviṉa ṉākiyeṉṟatu-patiṉāṟkōvaiyiṉiṭattuk kuraṉarampu Iraṭṭikkavarum Arumpālaiyaiyum Iḷinarampu Iraṭṭikkavarum mēṟcempālaiyaiyum, IvaipōlaAllāta pālaikaḷaiyum Icainūlvaḻakkālē Iṇainaramputoṭuttuppāṭum Aṟiviṉaiyumuṭaiyaṉāyeṉka.

61. paṇṇamai..........Aṟinteṉṟatu – paṇṇutal Amaintamuḻaviṉ kaṇṇeṟiyiṉaiyaṟinteṉṟavāṟu.

62. taṇṇumai..........poruntiyeṉṟatu – taṇṇumai mutalvaṉuṭaṉ poruntiyeṉṟavāṟu.

taṉṉoṭumeṉṟa Ummaiyāṟ poruntumiṭamum poruntiyeṉka.

63. vaṇṇap paṭṭaṭai yāḻmēl vaittāṅkeṉṟatu..........

paṭṭaṭai – narampukaḷil Iḷikkup peyar; Eṉṉai? Ellāppaṇṇiṟkum Aṭimaṇaiyātaliṉ. vaṇṇam – niṟam. Itaṉai yāḻmēlvaitteṉka. Āṅku; Acai. Iḷikkiramattālē paṇkaḷai yāḻmēlvaitteṉakkūṭṭiṉum Amaiyum.

64. Icaiyōṉ..........Iyaṟkaiyeṉṟatu – AṅṅaṉamvaittuAtaṉvaḻiyē Icaikkāraṉ pāṭiya pāṭṭiṉiyalpaiyeṉka.

65. vantatu vaḷartteṉṟatu – pāṭukiṉṟa paṇvaravukaḷukkuc curamkuṟaivupaṭāmai niṟuttiyeṉka.

varuvatoṟṟiyeṉṟatu——Antap paṇṇukku Ayalviravāmalnōkki yeṉka.

Oṟṟal – niṉaital.

66. Iṉpuṟa viyakkiyeṉṟatu – vaṇṇam mutalākak kāṭṭappaṭṭapāṭalil Iyaṉṟa |AḻakellāmAḻakellām †vaḻakkellām nirampakkāṭṭiyeṉka.

Icaipaṭa vaitteṉṟatu – muṟkūṟiya mutalum muṟaiyumutalāyapaṇṇilakkaṇam patiṉoṉṟaiyum nirampavaitteṉka.

67. vāra......vaḷartteṉṟatu – mutaṉaṭaivāram kūṭai tiraḷeṉṟucollappaṭum Iyakkam nāṉkiṉum mutaṉaṭai mikavum tāḻnta celaviṉai Uṭaittākalāṉum, tiraḷ mika muṭukiya naṭaiyiṉai Uṭaittākalāṉum, Ivaitavirntu Iṭaippaṭṭa vārappāṭal colloḻukkamumIcaiyoḻukkamum Uṭaittākalāṉum, kūṭaippāṭal coṟceṟivumIcaicceṟivum Uṭaittākalāṉum ciṟappunōkki Avviraṇṭiṉuḷḷum vārappāṭalai Aḷavunirampa niṟutta vallaṉāyeṉka; Eṉavēkūṭaippāṭalum Amaivatāyiṟṟu.

nilam – Iṭam.

67 - 8. Āṅku..........Eḻuttākaveṉṟatu – pāṭaliṉiṭattuccolnīrmaikaḷiṉ Eḻuttukkaḷ citaiyāmalē EḻutteḻuttākaIcaikkum kuḻalōṉeṉka.

Aṉṟiyum ca ri ka ma pa ta ni yeṉpārumuḷar.

69. vaḻuviṉṟicaikkum kuḻalōṉṟāṉumeṉṟatu – Iccollappaṭṭa Iyalpukaḷai Ilakkaṇappaṭiyil vaḻuvāmal vācittukkāṭṭavallavaṅkiyattāṉumeṉka.

Aṟintu mayalaṟappeytuUṇarviṉaṉāki Aṟintu poruntivaittuvaḷarttu Oṟṟi Iyakki vaittup pārttu Icaikkum kuḻalōṉeṉka.

[yāḻāciriyaṉ Amaiti]

70 - 94. Īrēḻ toṭutta..........pulamaiyōṉuṭaṉ

70 - 71. Īrēḻ toṭutta..........vēṇṭiyeṉṟatu – Āyappālaiyāy niṉṟa patiṉāṟkōvai, kōliṉitu ceppamuṭaittāyppeṇṭirkkuriya tāṉamuṭaiya pāṭaliyalpottu Amainta ciṟappuṭaittākalāṉ Itilē cempālai paṭumalaippālai cevvaḻippālai Arumpālai |†1 Itaṉai Ikkālattukkoṭippālaiyeṉa vaḻaṅkukiṉṟaṉar.kōṭip pālai viḷarippālai mēṟcempālaiyeṉappaṭṭa Ēḻupālaiyiṉaiyum Iṇai naramputoṭuttu nirampa niṟuttikkāṭṭal kāraṇamākaveṉka.

72 - 8. vaṉmaiyiṟ kiṭanta..........cēraveṉṟatu.

“tāra pākamuṅ kuraliṉ pākamum, nērnaṭu vaṇkiḷai koḷḷa niṟpa,muṉṉarp pākamum piṉṉarp pākamum, viḷarikura lāku meṉmaṉārpulavar” Eṉṉuñcūttirattiṉ vitipaṟṟi vaṭṭappālaiyiṉmuṭivutāṉamāy valinta nilaimaiyiṉaiyuṭaiya tārampeṟṟa Iraṇṭalakil Ōralakaiyum Ippālaiyiṉ mutaltāṉamāy meliviṉiṟkum kuralnarampupeṟṟanālalakil Iraṇṭalakaiyum tāranarampil Antarakkōlilē kaikkiḷaiyāka niṟuttat tārantāṉ kaikkiḷaiyāyiṟṟu. Anta narampil Oḻinta ŌrAlakaiyum paṇṭai viḷariyilē kūṭṭa Avviḷari tutta narampāyiṟṟu.Ippaṭip paṉṉirukāl tirikkap paṉṉirupālaiyum piṟakkum.

paṉṉirupālaiyiṉuru toṇṇūṟṟoṉṟum paṉṉiraṇṭumāyppaṇkaḷ nūṟṟumūṉṟātaṟkuk kāraṇamāmeṉakkoḷka.

Ivviṭattut tāra narampiṉ Antarakkōlait tārameṉṟār; “taṉṉamun tāramun taṉvaḻip paṭā” Eṉṉuñcūttirattāleṉakkoḷka.

79. Ēṉai..........vaḻic cēraveṉṟatu – Itaṉaip peṇṭirkkuriyatāṉamākiya patiṉāṟkōvaiyilē poruntakkūṭṭavēṇṭumeṉṟavāṟu.

kūṭṭumpaṭi:——

80 - 81. mēlatu......cempālaiyāyateṉṟatu – Uḻaimutaṟ kaikkiḷai Iṟutiyāka melivunāṉkum camam Ēḻum valivu mūṉṟumāy Uḻaimutalākac cempālaiyāyateṉka.

82 - 3. Iṟuti yāti......nīṅkāteṉṟatu – tāramutalākap peṟumuṟaiyāy vantapaṭiyē nīṅkāmaleṉṟavāṟu.

84 - 5. paṭumalai......tirintapiṉeṉṟatu – kaikkiḷaikuralākap paṭumalaippālaiyum, tuttam kuralākaccevvaḻippālaiyum, kuralkuralākaArumpālaiyum taṟkiḻamai tirintapiṉ Eṉka.

Arumpālaikkuk kural narampu Iraṭṭitta peṟṟitteṉka.

86 - 9. muṉṉataṉ..........kiṭakkaiyiṉeṉṟatu – muṉpiṟpaṭiyētāram kuralākak kōṭippālaiyum, viḷari kuralāka viḷarippālaiyum, Iḷikuralāka mēṟcempālaiyumāy mēṟcempālai Iḷinarampu Iraṭṭittanilaimaiyiṉaiyuṭaittāy Ippaṭiccamainta patiṉāṟkōvaippālainilaiyileṉṟavāṟu.

90. Iṇainarampu......koṇṭāṅkeṉṟatu – Ippatiṉāṟkōvaippālainilaiyiṉum paṇṇiṉṟanilaiyiṉum Iraṭṭitta kuralkuralākiyaArumpālaiyum Iḷikuralākiya mēṟcempālaiyumpōl AllātaṉaAintu pālaiyum Uḻaikuralākac cempālaikku Uḻaipeytum kaikkiḷaikuralākap paṭumalaikkuk kaikkiḷaipeytum tuttam kuralākac cevvaḻikkut tuttampeytum tāram kuralākak kōṭippālaikkut tārampeytumviḷarikuralāka viḷarippālaikku viḷaripeytum pāṭappaṭumeṉṟavāṟu.

91 - 2. yāḻmēṟ pālai......muṟai meliyaveṉṟatu – yāḻiṉiṭattuArumpālaimutalāyiṉa Iṭamuṟaimeliyavum kuḻaliṉiṭattuk kōṭippālai mutalāyiṉa valamuṟaimeliyavum pāṭappaṭumeṉṟavāṟu.

93 - 4. valivu melivum......Uṭaṉeṉṟatu – Ippaṭiyāl valivummelivum camaṉumeṉappaṭāniṉṟa tāṉanilaiyiṉaiyuṭaiya Icaikkūṟupāṭukaḷukkellām narappaṭaivu keṭāmalum paṇṇīrmai mutalāyiṉakuṉṟāmalum puṇarkkavallaṉāy Appuṇarppiṟku Amainta Eḻuttukkaḷāl Icaiceyyavalla yāḻāciriyaṉumeṉṟavāṟu.

(71) niṟuttalvēṇṭip (94) poliyakkōtta pulamaiyōṉeṉka.

[Araṅkiṉ Amaiti]

95 - 113. Eṇṇiya nūlōr......Araṅkattu

95 - 6. Eṇṇiya nūlōr......koṇṭeṉṟatu – Eṇṇappaṭṭaciṟpanūlāciriyar vakutta Iyalpukaḷiṉ vaḻuvāta vakai Araṅkuceytaṟku nilak kuṟṟaṅkaḷ nīṅkiṉaviṭattilē nilam vakuttukkoṇṭeṉka.

maṇṇakanilamāvatu:——“tantirat taraṅkiṅ kiyaṟṟuṅ kālai, Aṟaṉaḻittiyaṟṟā vaḻakuṭait tāki, niṟaikuḻip pūḻi kuḻiniṟai vāṟṟi,nāṟṟamuñ cuvaiyu maturamu māykkaṉam, tōṟṟiya tiṇmaic cuvaṭatuṭaittāy, Eṉpumi kūrṅkal kaḷiyuva rīḷai, tuṉpa nīṟu tukaḷivaiyiṉṟi, Ūrakat tākiyuḷaimāṉ pūṇṭa, tērakat tōṭun teruvumukanōkkik, kōṭal vēṇṭu māṭaraṅ katuvē” Eṉpatu; tantiravaḻiAraṅku Ivvulakattuc ceyyumiṭattut |†1 “Āṭalum pāṭaluṅ koṭṭum pāṇiyum, nāṭiya varaṅku camaikkuṅ kālait, tēvar kuḻāmuñ cepitta paḷḷiyum, puḷḷiṉ cēkkaiyumpuṟṟu nīṅkip, pōrkkaḷi yāṉaip puraicā rātu, māviṉ pantiyoṭumayaṅkal ceyyātu, ceruppuku miṭamuñ cēriyu nīṅki, nuṇmaiyuṇarnta tiṇmait tāki, maturac cuvaimikūu matura nāṟit, tīrāmāṭci nilattoṭu poruttiya, Ittiṟat tāku maraṅkiṉuk kiṭamē.”teyvattāṉamum paḷḷiyumAntaṇarirukkaiyum kūpamum kuḷaṉum kāvumutalākavuṭaiyaṉa nīṅkiAḻiyāta Iyalpiṉaiyuṭaittāy niṟukkappaṭṭa kuḻippūḻi kuḻikkottukkallappaṭṭa maṇ nāṟṟamum matura nāṟi Iratamum maturamākit tāṉumtiṇṇitāy Eṉpum Umiyum paralum cērnta nilam kaḷittarai Uvarttarai Īḷaittarai pollāccāmpaltarai poṭittarai Eṉṟu collappaṭṭaṉa Oḻintu Ūriṉ naṭuvaṇatākit tērōṭum vītikaḷetirmukamākkik koḷḷalvēṇṭumeṉka.

nilantāṉ vaṉpāl meṉpāl Iṭaippāleṉṟu mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum. Avaṟṟuḷ,

vaṉpālāvatu kuḻiyiṉmaṇ mikuvatu;
meṉpālāvatu kuṟaivatu;
Iṭaippālāvatu Oppu;
Īṇṭu Ivai perumpāṉmaiyāṟ koḷḷappaṭum.

Atuvēyeṉṟa Ilēciṉāṉē tuvarppup payamum, puḷippu nōyum,kāḻppup pacinīṭutalum, kaippuk kēṭum, Uvarppuk kalakkamum paṇṇumātalāṉ nīkkappaṭṭaṉa.

Eṉṉai? “Uvarppiṟ kalakkamāṅ kaippiṉvaruṅ kēṭu, tuvarppiṟpayamāñ cuvaikaḷ – Avaṟṟiṟ, puḷinōy pacikāḻppup pūṅkoṭiyētittip, paḷiperuku māva taraṅku” Eṉṟār paratacēṉāpatiyār.

Itaṉuḷ nāṟṟameṉpaṉa koḷḷilaiyum cennellum caṇpakamumcurapuṉṉaiyumeṉavivai. Oḻintaṉa tīmaippāla.

Iṅṅaṉam Oru vakaiyāṉ Araṅkiṟku nilam vakuttukkoṇṭeṉka.

97-100. |†1 “Araṅki ṉuyaramu makalamu nīḷamum, porunta nāṭi yuraikkuṅkālaip, peruntaṇ mālvaraic ciṟukaḻai kaṇṇil, kaṇṇiṭai yorucāṇ vaḷarntatu koṇṭē, Irupattu nālviraṟ kōlaḷa vataṉāl,Eḻukō lakalat teṇkō ṉīḷat, torukō luyarat tuṟuppiṉa tāki,Uttarap palakaiyō ṭaraṅkiṉ palakai, vaitta viṭainila nāṟkōlākap, pūtarai yeḻuti mēṉilai vaittu, nanti yeṉṉun teyvamumamaittut, tūṇiḻaṟ puṟappaṭa māṇviḷak keṭuttu..........kōvumyāṉaiyuṅ kuraṅkum piccaṉum, pāvaiyum pāṅkuṭaip puruṭā mirukamum,yāvaiyu meḻuti yinnilam viḷaṅkap, pāvaiyark kiyaṟṟuva taraṅkeṉappaṭumē” Eṉṟār cuttāṉantap pirakācattilum.puṇṇiya......viralākaveṉṟatu – potiyiṉmalaimutalāya puṇṇiyavaraippakkaṅkaḷilē neṭitāki Uyara vaḷarnta mūṅkiliṟkaṇṇoṭu kaṇṇiṭai Orucāṇāka vaḷarntatu koṇṭu nūlkaḷiṟcollukiṉṟapaṭiyē Araṅkañceyya Aḷakkuṅkōl Uttamaṉkaipperuviralil Irupattunālukoṇṭatu Oru kōlāka naṟukkiyeṉka.

Eṉṉai? “Otta vaṇumuta luyarntuvaru kaṇakkiṉ, Uttamaṉperuvira lirupattu nāluḷa, kōlē kōṭal kuṟiyaṟin tōrē”Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Itaṉuḷ Aṇumutaṟ peruvira laḷavu Uyarntuvarumāṟu: AṇuEṭṭukkoṇṭatu tērttukaḷ; tērttukaḷ Eṭṭukkoṇṭatu Immi;Immi Eṭṭukkoṇṭatu Eḷḷu; Eḷḷu Eṭṭukkoṇṭatu nellu;nellu Eṭṭukkoṇṭatu peruviraleṉakkoḷka.

Uttamarāvār kaḻiya neṭumaiyum kaḻiyak kuṟumaiyumillōr.

101 - 2. Eḻukōl..........Uṟuppiṉatākiyeṉṟatu – IkkōlālEḻukōl Akalamum Eṇkōl nīḷamum Orukōṟ kuṟaṭṭuyaramumUṭaiyatāyeṉka.

Eṉṉai? “Akkō lēḻakaṉ ṟeṭṭu nīṇṭum, Oppā luyarvu morukō lākum, naṟkōl vēnta ṉayakkuṟu vāyil, mukkō ṟāṉu muyaravumurittē” Eṉṟār ceyiṟṟiyaṉār; |“Akkō lorukō laḷavuṟakkalvi, mikka kammiyar vaṭakalai vitimuṟaik, kūṟiṉa raṉṟiyuṅ kuṟivakaikkēṟṟaṉa, Ēṟkac ceyka viyalpuṇarn tōrē” Eṉakkūṟiṉārumuḷar.

103 - 6. Uttarap palakai..........Araṅkileṉṟatu – tūṇattukkumītu vaitta Uttarappalakaikkum Araṅkiṉiṭattu Akalattukkiṭṭapalakaikkum Iṭainiṉṟa nilam nāṉku kōlāka Uyaraṅkoṇṭu Ittaṉmaiya vāya Aḷavukkup porunta vakutta vāyil Iraṇṭiṉaiyuṭaittākac ceyyappaṭṭa Araṅkiṉiṭatteṉka.

105. vāyiliraṇṭeṉṟatu – Araṅkiṟku Uṭpukavum puṟappaṭavumcamaitta vāyileṉakkoḷka.

Ēṟṟa Eṉṟataṉāl karantupōkkiṭaṉum, kaṇṇuḷar kuṭiñaippaḷḷiyum, Araṅkamum, Ataṉetir maṉṉar māntarōṭirukkum Avaiyaraṅkamum, Ivaṟṟiṉaiccūḻnta puviniṟaimāntar poruntiya kōṭṭiyum mutalāyiṉa koḷka.

106. tōṟṟiyavaraṅkeṉṟatu – Ippaṭiyākac camaikkappaṭṭu nūlcollukiṉṟapaṭiyellām tōṟṟiyavaraṅkeṉka.

106 - 7. toḻutaṉarētta..........mēṉilaivait teṉṟatu——Antaṇar Aracar vaṇikar cūttirareṉṟu collappaṭṭa |†1 nālvakaivaruṇappūtaṅkaḷ: 1. vacciratēkaṉ, 2. vacciratantaṉ,3. varuṇaṉ, 4. Irattakēcuvaraṉ.nālvakaivaruṇappūtaraiyum Eḻuti mēṉilattē yāvarum pukaḻntu vaṇaṅka vaitteṉka.

Eṉṉai? “kūṟiya vuṟuppiṟvuṟuppiṟ †varaṅkiṟ kuṟiyoṭu puṇarntāṅ, kāṭunarkkiyaṟṟu maraṅki ṉeṟṟimicai, vaḻuvil pūta nāṉku muṟaippaṭa, Eḻutiṉariyaṟṟa liyalpuṇarn tōrē” (cīvaka. 672, na. mēṟ.) Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

Ippūtanāṉkiṉ Uṇṭiyum Aṇiyum Āṭaiyum mālaiyum cāntamum poḻutum ceyalumutaliyavellām Aḻaṟpaṭukātaikkaṇṇēvirittukkūṟutum.

108. tūṇiḻaṟ......Eṭuttāṅkeṉṟatu – tūṇkaḷiṉ niḻal nāyakappattiyiṉkaṇṇum Avaiyiṉkaṇṇum paṭātapaṭi māṭcimaippaṭṭanilaiviḷakku niṟuttiyeṉka.

Eṉṉai? “viḷakkiyal vaṉappum” Eṉṟā rākaliṉ.

109 - 10. Orumukaveḻiṉiyum..........vakuttāṅkeṉṟatu-Iṭattūṇilaiyiṭattē Uruvutiraiyāka Orumukaveḻiṉiyum Iraṇṭuvalattūṇiṭattum Uruvutiraiyākap porumukaveḻiṉiyum, mēṟkaṭṭuttiraiyākak karantuvaraleḻiṉiyum ceyaṟpāṭṭuṭaṉē vakutteṉka.

mēṟkaṭṭuttiraiyāyniṟpatu Ākāyacārikaḷāyt tōṉṟuvārkkeṉak koḷka; Eṉṉai? |“muṉṉiya veḻiṉitāṉ mūṉṟu vakaippaṭum” Eṉṟār mativāṇaṉār; |“Aritaraṅkiṟ, ceyteḻiṉi mūṉṟamaittuc cittirattāṟ pūtaraiyum, Eyta veḻuti yiyaṟṟu” Eṉṟārparatacēṉāpatiyārum.

111. Ōviya vitāṉatteṉṟatu – cittiravitāṉattaiyumuṭaittāyeṉka.

111 - 2. Uraipeṟu..........nāṟṟiyeṉṟatu – cantiraṉ kuruAṅkārakaṉeṉṉum veṇṇīrmai poṉṉīrmai cennīrmaiyeṉṉum pukaḻmaiyait tamakkurimaiyākappeṟṟa muttumālaikaḷāṟ |cariyumcariyum †calliyum tūkkum tāmamumāka nāṟṟiyeṉka.

113. viruntupaṭa..........Araṅkatteṉṟatu – putumaiyuṭaittākaccamaitta Ariya toḻilaiyuṭaiya Araṅkiṉkaṇ Eṉka.

vakuttaṉarkoṇṭu vaittu Eṭuttu vakuttu nāṟṟikkiṭantaAraṅkameṉka.

[talaikkōl Amaiti]

114 - 28. pēricai maṉṉar..........vaittāṅku

114 - 5. pēricai maṉṉar..........koṇṭeṉṟatu – periya pukaḻaiyuṭaiya Aracarporutuṭaintu puṟaṅkoṭuttavaḻippeṟṟa Aḻakiya Iyalpiṉaiyuṭaiya veṇkoṟṟak kuṭaikkāmpait talaikkōlākakkoṇṭeṉka.

Iṉi māṟṟār Eyiṟpuṟattu miḷaikkaṇ veṭṭikkoṇṭa mūṅkileṉṟumām.

Itu kūṟiṟṟu, vēttiyalum potuviyalumākalāṉ.

Ivaṟṟuṭ potuviyaṟku malaiyiṉ mūṅkilumām.

116 - 7. kaṇṇiṭai..........pōkkiyeṉṟatu – kaṇ tōṟumnavamaṇikaḷāṟkaṭṭi Iṭainilaṅkaḷaic cāmpūnatameṉṉum poṟṟakaṭṭāṟ ceṟiya malakkamākak kaṭṭiyeṉka.

malakkam – māṟu.

Eṉṉai? “puṇṇiyamāl veṟpiṟ poruntuṅ kaḻaikoṇṭu,kaṇṇiṭaik kaṇcāṇ kaṉañcārum – Eṇṇiya, nīḷameḻu cāṇkoṇṭu nīrāṭṭi naṉmaipuṉai, nāḷiṟ ṟalaikkōlai nāṭṭu”, |“Āvatakattiyaṉār cāpattā ṉāṉmūṅkil” Eṉṟār paratacēṉāpatiyār.

118 - 20. kāval veṇkuṭai..........talaikkōleṉṟatu – Aracaṉkōyililē kāppamaittirutti Intiraṉmakaṉ cayantaṉāka niṉaittumantira vitiyālē pūcittu vaḻipaṭum Ittalaikkōlaiyeṉka.

cayantaṉātal muṉṉar (3: 1-7, Urai)k kūṟippōntām.

121 - 2. puṇṇiya naṉṉīr..........mālaiyaṇinteṉṟatu – nāṭakakkaṇikai talaikkōl koḷḷum ñāṉṟu puṇṇiya natikaḷiṉ nīraippoṟkuṭattilē mukantuvantu Ittalaikkōlai nīrāṭṭip piṉpu mālaikaḷuñ cūṭṭiyeṉka.

muṉkūṟippōnta Āṭalāciriyaṉ mutalāyiṉōr Araṅkattiṉkaṇṇē Ittalaikkōlai vaittup poṟkuṭattāl nīrāṭṭiyapiṉmālaicūṭṭiyeṉa Iyaikka.

123. nalantarunāḷāleṉṟatu – Itaṟkup poruntiya nallanāḷiṉāleṉka.

Avaiyāvaṉa:——pūrāṭam kārttikai pūram paraṇi Irēvati tiruvātirai Aviṭṭam cittirai vicākam makam Eṉavivai.

nāḷeṉṉātu nalantarunāḷ Eṉṟa Ilēciṉāl Irāci mutaliyaṉavum koḷka.

Irācikaḷāvaṉa:——Iṭapam ciṅkam tulām kaṟkaṭakam viruccikammituṉam Eṉavivai.

Eṉṉai? “pūrāṭaṅ kārttikai pūram paraṇikalam, cīrā tiraiyaviṭṭañ cittiraiyō – ṭārumuṟa, māci yiṭapa maritulai vāṉkaṭakam, pēciyatēṇ mituṉam pēcu” Eṉṟār mativāṇaṉārum.

nāḷāl nīrāṭṭiyeṉa muṉṉuñcērkka.

123 - 4. polampūṇ..........koṇṭeṉṟatu – poṉṉāṟceyta pūṇaiyum paṭṭattiṉaiyumuṭaiya paṭṭavaruttaṉattiṉ kaiyilēvāḻttuṭaṉē koṭutteṉka.

125 - 8. muraceḻun tiyampa..........vaittāṅkeṉṟatu – vīramuracumutalāya mummuracukaḷum Eḻuntu muḻaṅka Avaiyēyaṉṟip palavācciyaṅkaḷum muḻaṅka Aracaṉum Amāttiyar purōkitar cēṉāpatittoṭakkattāruṅkūṭa vītiyiṉkaṇ niṉṟa tēriṉai Inta yāṉaiyōṭumUṭaṉkoṇṭu valañceytu tērmicainiṉṟa kaviyiṉ kaiyilē Ittalaikkōlaikkoṭuppa Ūrai valamāka vantu Araṅkattiṉkaṭpukuntutalaikkōlai Etirmukamāka vaittapiṉ Eṉṟavāṟu.

Eṉṉai? “piṇiyuṅ kōḷu nīṅkiya nāḷāl, Aṇiyuṅ kaviṉumācaṟa viyaṟṟit, tītutīr marapiṟ ṟīrtta nīrāṉ, mācatu tīra maṇṇunīrāṭṭit, toṭalaiyu mālaiyum paṭalaiyuñ cūṭṭip, piṇṭa muṇṇumperuṅkaḷiṟṟut taṭakkaimicaik, koṇṭu ceṉṟuṟīik koṭiyeṭuttārttu, muracu muruṭu muṉmuṉ muḻaṅka, Aracu mutalāṉa vaimperuṅkuḻuvum, tērvalañ ceytu kavikaik koṭuppa, Ūrvalañceytu pukuntapiṉṟait, talaikkōl kōṭa ṟakka teṉpa” Eṉṟār ceyiṟṟiyaṉār.

[Araṅkiṟpukuntu Āṭukiṉṟaviyalpu]

129 - 75. Iyalpiṉaṉ vaḻāa......maṉaiyakamaṟanteṉ.

129. Iyalpiṉaṉ..........muṟaimaiyiṉeṉṟatu – Aracaṉ mutaliyōryāvarum varicaikkēṟṟa Irukkaimuṟaimaikaḷilē Irunta piṉṉareṉka.

130. kuyiluva..........niṟpaveṉṟatu – kuyiluvakkaruviyāḷar tāmniṟkakkaṭava muṟaimaikaḷilē niṟkaveṉka.
