10.144

144. (pā) vāṉavaruṇā – cōṟṟāvi; Aviyiṭukiṟa Āvi.

10.145

145. Iṟai – Iṟappu.

10.148

148. kāvirippāvaitaṉputalvar – vēḷāḷar.

(150) viḷaippōrāṉa (148) putalvar (150) paḻaviṟalūrkaḷum.

10.149

149. purappōr – kākkum Aracar.

10.151

151. poṅkaḻi – tūṟṟāp poli. parantu – parakka.

10.152

152. maṅkul – Iruṭci.

(147) maṟaiyōrirukkaiyum (150) paḻaviṟalūrkaḷum (152) malaiyiṟṟōṉṟum (153) nāṭeṉka.

(101) vaḻippaṭarpurintōr (155) cellunāḷuḷ Orunāḷeṉka.

10.156

156. Āṟṟuvīyaraṅkam – Āṟṟai maṟaikkum Araṅkam: Āvatukuṟai; Atu cīraṅkam; Āṟṟuviyeṉpārumuḷar.

kuraṅkamai yuṭutta marampayi laṭukkattu
vāṉava ruṟaiyum pūnā ṟoruciṟaip
†Aṭi, 158: maṇi. 4: 95.
paṭṭiṉap pākkam viṭṭaṉar nīṅkāp
perumpeya raiya roruṅkuṭa ṉiṭṭa
vilaṅkoḷic cilātala mēlirun taruḷip
perumaka ṉaticayam piṟaḻā vāymait
†Aṭi, 162-3: cīvaka. 2746.
tarumañ cāṟṟuñ cāraṇar tōṉṟap
paṇṭait tolviṉai pāṟuka veṉṟē
kaṇṭaṟi kavuntiyoṭu kāluṟa vīḻntōr
vanta kāraṇam vayaṅkiya koḷkaic
†Aṭi, 166:maṇi. 16: 72.
cintai viḷakkiṟ ṟerintō ṉāyiṉum
Ārvamuñ ceṟṟamu makala nīkkiya
vīra ṉākaliṉ viḻumaṅ koḷḷāṉ
kaḻiperuñ ciṟappiṟ kavunti kāṇāy
Oḻikeṉa voḻiyā tūṭṭum valviṉai
†Aṭi, 171: cilap. pati. 57.
Iṭṭa vitti ṉetirntuvan teyti
Oṭṭuṅ kālai yoḻikkavu moṇṇā
kaṭuṅkā ṉeṭuveḷi yiṭuñcuṭa reṉṉa
Oruṅkuṭa ṉillā vuṭampiṭai yuyirkaḷ
Aṟiva ṉaṟavō ṉaṟivuvaram pikantōṉ
ceṟivaṉ ciṉēntiraṉ cittaṉ pakavaṉ
taruma mutalvaṉ ṟalaivaṉ ṟarumaṉ
poruḷaṉ puṉitaṉ purāṇaṉ pulavaṉ
ciṉavaraṉ ṟēvaṉ civakati nāyakaṉ
paramaṉ kuṇavataṉ paratti loḷiyōṉ

10.157

157. marampayil Aṭukkam – maracceṟivu; Aṭukkam – AraṅkattukkuAṭuttaviṭamumām.

10.158

158. Oru ciṟai – Oru pakkattilē.

10.160

160. Aiyar – muṉcoṉṉa Ulaka nōṉpikaḷ.

10.163

163. muṉpu coṉṉa cāraṇar tōṉṟa.

Aiyar |†1 Ikkātai 24 -Ām Aṭi mutaliyavaṟṟaip pārkka.paṭṭiṉappākkattiliṭṭa cilātalattiṉiṉṟu tarumañcāṟṟutal cāraṇarkku Aṭaiyākki Avar Iṅkē tōṉṟaveṉka.

10.167

167. cintaiviḷakku – Avatiñāṉam; Eṉṟatu tirikāla ñāṉattai.

10.172

172. vittiṉ – vittuppōla.

tattuvaṉ cātuvaṉ cāraṇaṉ kāraṇaṉ
cittaṉ periyavaṉ cemma ṟikaḻoḷi
Iṟaivaṉ kurava ṉiyalkuṇa ṉeṅkōṉ
†Aṭi, 184: maṇi. 5: 71.
kuṟaivil pukaḻōṉ kuṇapperuṅ kōmāṉkuṇapperuṅ kōmāṉ †kuṇapporuṭ
caṅkara ṉīcaṉ cayampu catumukaṉ
Aṅkam payantō ṉaruka ṉaruṇmuṉi
paṇṇava ṉeṇkuṇaṉ pāttil paḻamporuḷ
viṇṇavaṉ vēta mutalvaṉ viḷaṅkoḷi
Ōtiya vētat toḷiyuṟi ṉallatu
pōtār piṟavip potiyaṟai yōreṉac
†Aṭi, 191: maṇi: 4: 105, 19: 8.
cāraṇar vāymoḻi kēṭṭut tavamutaṟ
kāvunti kaitaṉ kaitalai mēṟkoṇ
ṭorumūṉ ṟavittō ṉōtiya ñāṉat
tirumoḻik kallateṉ ceviyakan tiṟavā
kāmaṉai veṉṟō ṉāyirat teṭṭu
†Aṭi, 196-7: maṇi. 5. 77-9.
nāma mallatu navilā teṉṉā
Aivarai veṉṟō ṉaṭiyiṇai yallatu
kaivaraik kāṇiṉuṅ kāṇā veṉkaṇ
Aruḷaṟam pūṇṭōṉ ṟirumeyk kallateṉ
poruḷil yākkai pūmiyiṟ poruntā
taruka raṟava ṉaṟivōṟ kallateṉ
Irukaiyuṅ kūṭi yoruvaḻik kuviyā
malarmicai naṭantōṉ malaraṭi yallateṉ
talaimicai yucci tāṉaṇip poṟāa
tiṟutiyi liṉpat tiṟaimoḻik kallatu

10.188

188. Eṇkuṇameṉṟatu: Ananta ñāṉam, Ananta taricaṉam,Ananta vīriyam, Anantacukam, Anantanāmam, niṭkaḷam, nirāyuṣyam,caṟpāvaṉai yeṉa Ivai.

10.191

191. piṟavip potiyaṟai – piṟaviyākiya tuvāramillāta Aṟai.

10.194

194. Oru mūṉṟu – kāmam vekuḷi mayakkam.

10.198

198. Aivar – pañcēntiriyaṅkaḷ.

10.198-9

198-9. maṟṟait tēvar Iṇaiyaṭikaḷaik kaiyiṭattē kāṇiṉum;Anniyamākiya camaya tēvarkaḷaik kāṇiṉumeṉavumām.

10.200

200. tirumeykku – tirumeypporuṭṭu.

10.202

202. (pā) Arukaṉaṟavōr – Iruṭikaḷ.

10.205

205. talaiyiṭattu.

10.206

206. Iṟutiyiliṉpam – Anantacukam.

maṟutara vōtiyeṉ maṉampuṭai peyarā
teṉṟava ṉicaimoḻi yēttak kēṭṭataṟ
koṉṟiya mātava ruyarmicai yōṅki
nivantāṅ korumuḻa nīṇila nīṅkip
pavantaru pācaṅ kavunti keṭukeṉ
ṟantara māṟāp paṭarvōrt toḻutu
panta maṟukeṉap paṇintaṉar pōntu
kāraṇi pūmpoḻiṟ kāvirip pēryāṟṟu
nīraṇi māṭattu neṭuntuṟai pōki
†Aṭi, 215: nīraṇi kāṇpōr niraimāṭa mūrkuvōr (pari. 10:27); nīraṇimāṭattu nilāneṭu muṟṟattu (peruṅ. 1. 40: 17.)
mātaruṅ kaṇavaṉu mātavat tāṭṭiyum
tītutīr niyamat teṉkarai yeytip
pōtucūḻ kiṭakkaiyōr pūmpoḻi liruntuḻi
vampap parattai vaṟumoḻi yāḷaṉoṭu
†Aṭi, 219: cilap. 16: 63; kuṟaḷ. 1311; maṇi. 10: 22.
koṅkalar pūmpoḻiṟ kuṟukiṉar |ceṉṟōrceṉṟōr †ceṉṟuḻik
†Aṭi, 220: tol. mutaṟ cūttiravirutti, mēṟ.
kāmaṉun tēviyum pōlu mīṅkivar
Āreṉak kēṭṭīṅ kaṟikuva meṉṟē
nōṟṟuṇal yākkai nocitavat tīruṭaṉ
†Aṭi, 223: maṇi. 18: 122.
Āṟṟuvaḻip paṭṭō rāreṉa viṉavaveṉ
makkaḷ kāṇīr māṉiṭa yākkaiyar
pakka nīṅkumiṉ paripulam piṉareṉa
†Aṭi, 226: malaipaṭu. 497; maṇi. 16: 57.
Uṭaṉvayiṟ ṟōrka ḷoruṅkuṭaṉ vāḻkkai
kaṭavatu muṇṭō kaṟṟaṟin tīreṉat

10.209

209. Uyarmicai – cilāvaṭṭam. Ōṅki – Eḻuntiruntu.

10.213

213. pantam – samsāram.

10.215

215. nīraṇimāṭam – paḷḷiyōṭam; pōki – Ataṉālēpōntu.

10.219

219. vampapparattai; vampu – putumai; parattaittaṉmaikkupputiyavaḷ. vaṟumoḻiyāḷaṉ – payaṉila colluvāṉ.

10.221-2

221-2. kāmaṉum tēviyumpōlum Ivarāreṉakkaruti; pōlum:Oppilpōli.

10.223

223. nōṟṟuṇal – paṭṭiṉiviṭṭuṇal.

10.224

224. Āṟṟuvaḻi – neṟiyiṭattu.

10.225

225. māṉiṭayākkaiyareṉṟatu – nīṅkaḷ niṉaitta kāmaṉum tēviyumallareṉṟavāṟu.

10.226

226. paripulampiṉar – celavāl varuntiṉar.

tīmoḻi kēṭṭuc ceviyakam putaittuk
kātalaṉ muṉṉark kaṇṇaki naṭuṅka
Eḷḷunar pōlumiva reṉpūṅ kōtaiyai
muḷḷuṭaik kāṭṭiṉ mutunari yākeṉak
kavunti yiṭṭatu tavantaru cāpam
kaṭṭiya tātaliṟ paṭṭatai yaṟiyār
kuṟunari neṭuṅkuraṟ kūviḷi kēṭṭu
naṟumalark kōtaiyu nampiyu naṭuṅki
neṟiyi ṉīṅkiyōr nīrala kūṟiṉum
Aṟiyā maiyeṉ ṟaṟiyal vēṇṭum
ceytavat tīrnun tirumuṉ piḻaittōrk
kuytik kāla muraiyī rōveṉa
†Aṭi, 240: maṇi. 25: 5.
Aṟiyā maiyiṉiṉ ṟiḻipiṟap puṟṟōr
Uṟaiyūr nocci yorupuṭai yotuṅkip
†Aṭi, 242: “nocci vēlit tittaṉuṟantai” (Akanā. 122: 21.)
paṉṉiru matiyam paṭarnō yuḻantapiṉ
muṉṉai yuruvam peṟukavīṅ kivareṉac
cāpaviṭai ceytu tavapperuñ ciṟappiṟ
kāvunti yaiyaiyun tēviyuṅ kaṇavaṉum
muṟañcevi vāraṇa muṉcama murukkiya
†Aṭi, 247. muṟañcevi vāraṇam: kalit. 42: 2; puṟanā. 339:13; maṇi. 19: 121. (mēṟ.) 247-8: ciṟupāṇ. 83, na.
puṟañciṟai vāranam pukkaṉar purinteṉ.

10.229-30

229-30. putaittu naṭuṅkāniṟpa.

10.234

234. paṭṭataiyaṟiyār – maṉattil Ivar (kavuntiyaṭikaḷ) niṉaittatātalāl Aṟintilar.

10.235-40

235-40. piṉpu Aṟintapaṭi: Avar kaṇmuṉṉē nariyāṉapaṭiyālum, pollāṅku kūṟiṉamaiyālum, Avviṭattu Ivarallatu vēṟucāpamiṭa vallārillaiyākalāṉum, Iccāpam IvarālēvantateṉṟuIvar (kōvalaṉum kaṇṇakiyum) Aṟintār; Aṟintu UytikkālamUraiyīrōveṉṟār.

10.242

242. nocci – matil; pataṇamumām; Eṉṟatu kāvalvēṇṭātaAraṇeṉṟavāṟu.

10.243

243. paṭarnōy – Uṟaḻcciyāluṇṭāṉa nōy.

10.247-8

247-8. muṟam – cuḷaku. vāraṇam – yāṉai, kōḻi; puṟattēciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻi – Uṟaiyūr; vāraṇam: Ākupeyar. yāṉaiyaik kōḻimurukkalāl kōḻiyeṉṟu peyarāyiṟṟu. yāṉaiyaiccayitta kōḻi tōṉṟiṉaviṭam valiyuṭaitteṉṟu karuti AvviṭattuAtaṉpeyarālē cōḻaṉ Ūrkāṇkiṉṟapoḻutu ciṟaiyum kaḻuttumāka Ākkiyavataṉāl puṟampē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyeṉṟāyiṟṟu.

kaṭṭurai

muṭiyuṭai vēntar mūva ruḷḷum
†Aṭi, 1: cilap. 23: kaṭṭurai, 1.
toṭiviḷaṅku taṭakkaic cōḻarkulat tutittōr
Aṟaṉu maṟaṉu māṟṟalu mavartam
paḻaviṟaṉ mūtūrp paṇpumēm paṭutalum
viḻavumali ciṟappum viṇṇavar varavum
Oṭiyā viṉpat tavaruṟai nāṭṭukOṭiyā viṉpat tavaruṟai nāṭṭuk †Oḻiyā viṉpat tavaruṭai
kuṭiyuṅ kūḻiṉ perukkamu mavartan
teyvak kāvirit tītutīr ciṟappum
poyyā vāṉam putuppuṉal poḻitalum
Araṅku māṭalun tūkkum variyum
paranticai yeytiya pārati viruttiyumyeytiya pārati viruttiyum ‡yēttiya
tiṇainilai variyu miṇainilai variyummiṇainilai variyum ¶kiṇaivariyuṅ
Aṇaivuṟak kiṭanta yāḻiṉ ṟokutiyum
Īrēḻ cakōṭamu miṭanilaip pālaiyum

10.3

3. Aṟaṉ – tarumācaṉam. maṟaṉ – Imayattuppulipoṟittatu;cilap. 5: 97-8; Āṟṟal – Amarāpatikāttatu; 6: 14.

10.4

4. mūtūrppaṇpu – kāvirippūmpaṭṭiṉattuppaṇpu.

10.5

5. viḻavu – Intiraviḻavu. viṇṇavar varavu – tēvarkaḷ varavu.

10.7

7. kūḻiṉ perukkam – kavariccenneṟkāyttalaiyiṟ kūṭṭiṉ neṟcorital: cilap. 10: 123-4.

10.6-7

6-7. nāṭṭukkuṭi – Uḻaviṭaiviḷaippōr; cilap. 10: 150.

10.8

8. kāviricciṟappu – Āṟṟuvari; 7: 2-4; 25-7.

10.9

9. poyyā vāṉam putuppuṉal poḻital – maḻaikkaruvuyirttal;10: 143.

10.10

10. Araṅku māṭalum – Araṅkēṟṟukātaiyiṟ kūṟiṉa.

(pā) talaivariyiyalpu: “tiṅkaṇmālai” mutalāṉa mukamuṭaivarikaḷ; 7: 2-4.

10.11

11. pārativirutti – kaṭalāṭukātaiyiṟkūṟiṟṟu (patiṉōrāṭal.)

10.12

12. tiṇainilaivari-“puṇartuṇaiyōṭāṭum” Eṉṟaṉ mutalāyiṉa; cilap. 7: 3, Iṇainilaivari – Allāta......nilaivari mutalāyiṉa.

10.13

13. (pā) yāḻiṉ pakuti – vēṉiṟkātaiyiṟcoṉṉa “Uḻaimutaṟ kaikkiḷai” (32) mutalāyiṉa.

10.14

14. (pā) Iṭainilaippālai: “kōṭiviḷari mēṟcem pālai”mutalāyiṉa; 3: 88.

tārat tākkamun tāṉṟeri paṇṇum
Ūrakat tēru moḷiyuṭaip pāṇiyum
Eṉṟivai yaṉaittum piṟaporuḷ vaippō
ṭoṉṟit tōṉṟun taṉikkō ṇilaimaiyumtaṉikkō ṇilaimaiyum †taṉkō ṇilaimaiyum.
Oru paricā nōkkik kiṭanta
pukārkkāṇṭam muṟṟiṟṟu.

veṇpā

kālai yarumpi malaruṅ katiravaṉum
mālai matiyamumpōl vāḻiyarō——vēlai
Akaḻā lamainta vavaṉikku mālaip
|†1 maṇi. 1: 2.pukaḻā lamainta pukār.

10.15

15. tārat tākkamun tāṉṟeri paṇṇum: “puṟattoru pāṇiyiṟ pūṅkoṭi mayaṅki” Eṉṟatu mutalāyiṉa; 8: 44.

10.16

16. Ūrakattēr: Intiraviḻavūreṭutta kātaiyiṟ coṉṉaŪriṉ vaṇṇam.

Oḷiyuṭaippāṇi. “veṅkaṭ ṭolaicciya viruntiṟ pāṇi”mutalāyiṉa; 10: 131.

10.17

17. piṟaporuḷvaippu..........mutalāyiṉa.

mutalāvatupukārkkāṇṭam Arumpatavuraiyuṭaṉ muṟṟiṟṟu.

1 - 3. vāṉkaṇ viḻiyā......kaṭaināṭ kaṅkul

(I – ḷ.) Ulakiṟkuk kaṇṇākiya Ātittaṉ tōṉṟi viḷaṅkātavaikaṟaiyeṉṉum yāmattiṭattu mīṉōṭu Aḻakupeṟṟoḻukum veṇmatiyāṉatu vicumpiṉiṉṟum nīṅkiṟṟākak kariya Iruḷ kaṭaikkaṇiṉṟakaṅkuṟpoḻutileṉka.

Eṉpatu Antac cittirait tiṅkaṭ pukutināḷ – cōti, titi-mūṉṟām pakkam, vāram – ñāyiṟu. Ittiṅkaḷirupatteṭṭiṟ cittiraiyum pūraṇaiyuṅkūṭiya caṉi vārattiṟ koṭiyēṟṟi “nālēḻ nāḷiṉum” (maṇi. 1: 8) Eṉpataṉāṉ Irupatteṭṭu nāḷum viḻā naṭantukoṭiyiṟakki vaikāci Irupatteṭṭiṉiṟ pūruva pakkattiṉ patiṉmūṉṟām pakkamum cōma vāramum peṟṟa Aṉuṭattil nāṭkaṭalāṭi Ūṭutaliṉ vaikāci Irupattoṉpatiṟ cevvāykkiḻamaiyum kēṭṭaiyumpeṟṟa nācayōkattu niṟaimatip patiṉālām pakkattu vaikaṟaippoḻutiṉiṭattu nilavupaṭṭa Antarattiruḷilēyeṉṟavāṟu. Atupūruva pakkameṉpatu tōṉṟak kāriru ṇiṉṟa kaṭaināṭ kaṅkulEṉṟār; “kuṇamutaṟ ṟōṉṟiya vāriruṇ matiyiṟ, ṟēyvaṉa keṭukaniṉ ṟevva rākkam” (195-6) Eṉa Iruṇmatiyeṉṟār maturaikkāñciyuḷḷum. kaṇ – Iṟaivaṉkaṇ Eṉpārumuḷar. viḻittal-viḷaṅkutal; Atu ceyyāta vaikaṟai, Ākupeyar; vaikal – tuyiṟal;Aṟal – Aṟaiyāyiṟṟu; |“poṟiyaṟai” (tiri. 15) pōla.

|†1 Ivvicēṭavuraiyiluḷḷa kālavaraiyaṟai poruntātatupōltōṟṟiṉum piratikaḷiluḷḷavāṟē patippikkappaṭṭatu.

4. Ūḻviṉai kaṭaiI yuḷḷan turappa:——

(I – ḷ.) muṉ ceyta tīviṉai muṟaiyāṉē vantu Ivaṉuḷḷattaic celuttutalāṉē yeṉka.

kaṭaiI – celutti yeṉṟumām.

5 - 8. Ēḻakat takarum......neṭuṅkaṭai kaḻintu

(I – ḷ.) Ēḻakamākiya takarum Ekiṉamākiya kavariyum tūya mayiriṉaiyuṭaiya Aṉṉamumākiya Ivai Oṉṟōṭoṉṟu IṉamallavāyiṉumIṉampōlē viṭātu tiriyum tāḷōṭukūṭappaṇṇappaṭṭa perumaiporuntiya ciṟappiṉaiyuṭaiya mikavum periya katavaiyuṭaiya Iṭaikaḻiyaik kaḻinteṉka.

neṭuvāyiṟkaṭai – periya katavaiyuṭaiya talaikkaṭai. takar mutaliyaṉa Ivaḷ vaḷarttaṉavākaliṉ, Ivaḷait tammiṉameṉṟu karutit tiriyumeṉavumām; vāyiṟkaṇeḻutiṉavaṟṟai Iṉameṉakkarutit tiriyumeṉavumamaiyum. tāḷoṭu kuyiṉṟaveṉṟār, pōrkkatavākaliṉIṉiyiḷakāmaṟ paṇṇukiṉṟapōtē kūṭappaṇṇutalāṉ. Ēḻakattakarmutaliyaṉa Irupeyaroṭṭup paṇputtokai. vāyil – katavu. kaṭaikaḻinteṉṟār, maṉaiyiṉ perumaiyum kāvaṉmikutiyum tōṉṟa. Iṉi,Ivaṉ Aṉṟu kaḻintāṉeṉiṉum Amaiyum.

8 - 10. Āṅku......valañceyākkaḻintu

(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam vāyil kaḻintapoḻutē AravaṇaiyiṉmītēAṟivōṭu tuyilkoḷḷum maṇivaṇṇaṉeṉṉum tirunāmattaiyuṭaiya tirumāl kōyilai valañceytu kaḻinteṉka;

Āvatu valattiṭṭēkutal. Aṇi – Aḻaku. Aṟituyil – yōkanittirai. maṇivaṇṇaṉ: peyar.

11 - 4. paṇaiyain tōṅkiya......Ēḻuṭaṉ pōki

(I – ḷ.) Ōṅkiya Aintu paṇaiyiṉaiyum paciya Ilaiyiṉaiyumuṭaiya |†1 māpōti = mahāpōti; kautama puttarukku ñāṉōtayamāṉaIṭattuḷḷa Aracamaram: |“pōtimūlam” (maṇi. 30: 10) Eṉpataṉkuṟippaip pārkka.māpōti niḻalileḻuntaruḷiya Aṟavōṉākiya puttaṉ AruḷicceytaĀkamattai Ākāyacārikaḷ maṟaiyaviruntōti yāvarkkum viḷaṅkapporuḷuṇarttappaṭum |†2 cilap. 27: 92.Intiraṉāl nirumikkappaṭṭa vikāraṅkaḷēḻiṉaiyum Aṭaivēkaṇṭu Avaṟṟaik kaḻintupōyeṉka.

Avai Avvūrp |†3 puttacaittiyam – pautta vittiyācālai; puttaṉālayamumām.puttacaittiyattu Intiraṉ nirumittaṉavākiyaĒḻaraṅku. māpōti Aintupaṇaiyatu......Iyalpu. tirumoḻi – Ākamam.Aṟaintu cāṟṟutal - |†4 pāṭa mōtal – mūlattai viḷaṅkac collutal.pāṭamōtip poruḷuraittal. vikāram-kaiyāṟ karuviyāṟ paṇṇātu maṉattāl nirumittal.

15 - 25. pulavūṇṭuṟantu...toḻutu valaṅkoṇṭu

(I – ḷ.) pulālākiya Ūṉait tuṟantu poy kūṟāmaiyākiya viratattōṭu porunti |†5 “Aḻukkā ṟavāvekuḷi yiṉṉācco ṉāṉkum, Iḻukkā viyaṉṟataṟam” (kuṟaḷ. 35.)Aḻukkāṟu Avā mutaliyavaṟṟaik kaiviṭṭu Aṟanūl mutaliyavaṟṟaiyaṟintu Aimpulaṉaiyumaṭakkiya kōṭpāṭṭaiyuṭaiyarāy Uṇmai vakaiyuṇarnta cīriyōr tiraṇṭa ṣrīkōyilil pañcaparamēṭṭikaḷ nilaipeṟṟa Aintu cantiyuṅ kūṭi vantu, talaimayaṅki yirukkiṉṟa mikka periya maṉṟiṟ pūvaiyuṭaiya piṇṭiyiṉatu Aḻakukiḷarumniḻaṟkaṇṇē viḻu Ayaṉātikaḷilum viḻavukaḷilum Ākāyacārikaḷvarattakumeṉṟu cāvakarellām kūṭiyiṭappaṭṭa viḷaṅkāniṉṟa Oḷiyaiyuṭaiya cilāvaṭṭattai Ivarkaḷ toḻutu valaṅkoṇṭeṉka.

pulavūṇ – pulālōṭē Uṇṇum Ūṇumām.

“pulaiyūṇ” pāṭamāyiṟ pulaiyaruṇṇum Ūṇeṉka. viratattu-viratattōṭē. Avalam – Aḻukkāṟu Avar mutaliyaṉa. Aṟintu-Aṟiyappaṭum Aṟa nūlkaḷai Aṟintu. pañcaparamēṭṭikaḷāvār:——Arukar, cittar, Upāttiyāyar, Āciriyar, cātukkaḷeṉavivar.

Iṉi, Aivakainiṉṟa Arukattāṉattuc cantimaṉṟeṉpataṟku Aintuṣrīkōyiṟcanti kūṭiya maṉṟeṉpārumuḷar. poṉ polivātalaṉṟip

polam polivākāmaiyiṉ Arukaṉāṇaiyāṉ Eppoḻutum poṟpūvaip pūkkum piṇṭiyeṉka. cilātalam – cantirakāntakkallāṟ paṭuttatu. nīraṇi viḻavu – Apiṭēka viḻaveṉiṉum Amaiyum.

26 - 7. malaitalaik koṇṭa......Oruṅkuṭa ṉīṅki

(I – ḷ.) malaiyiṭattē talaiyaiyuṭaiyatōr periya yāṟupōlumUlakiluḷḷōrāyavar pōkkuvaravu ceytaṟku Amainta ŪrvāyilaiAkkālattup pōvārōṭu kalantupōy Ataṉaiviṭṭu nīṅkiyeṉka.

Ulakaviṭaikaḻi – Ūrvāyil. Iṭaiyē kaḻitaliṉ, AvvāyilIṭaikaḻiyāyiṟṟu. kōyiṟkōpurattai malaiyākavum Ataṉōṭumaṇantu kiṭanta teruvai Āṟākavum Uvamittār.

28 - 31. kalaiyi lāḷaṉ......Eyiṟpuṟam pōki

(I – ḷ.) maṉṉavarkkuk kāmaṉ vēṉilōṭu teṉṟalaiyum tiṟaiyāka Iṭutaṟkup poruntiya pala malarkaḷai niraitta nalla mara niḻalaiyuṭaiya Ilavantikaiyiṉatu Eyiṟkup puṟattilē pōyeṉka.

kalaiyilāḷaṉ – Anaṅkaṉ; kalai – carīram. kāmar – Aḻaku. pantar-nīḻal. Ilavantikai – nīrāviyaic cūḻnta vayantaccōlai; AḵtuAracaṉum Urimaiyumāṭuṅ kāvaṟcōlai; |“Ilavan tikaiyi ṉeyiṟpuṟam pōkiṉ, Ulaka maṉṉava ṉuḻaiyō rāṅkuḷar” (3: 45-6)Eṉṟār maṇimēkalaiyilum.

32 - 3. tāḻpoḻi luṭutta......kaṭaimukaṅ kaḻittu

(I – ḷ.) Irumaruṅkum cōlai cūḻnta putuppuṉalāṭappōmperiya vītiyaiyuṭaiya kāvirikkaraiyil tirumukattuṟai kaḻikiṉṟavāyilaiyum kaḻinteṉka.

kaṭaimukaṅkaḻinteṉṟār; kālaiyil nāṇīrāṭuvōr piṟarmukamnōkkātu pōtaṟku maṟaintu kaḻivar; Ivarum Avvāṟu kaḻintāreṉṟaṟku.

34. kuṭaticaikkoṇṭu:——(I – ḷ.) mēṟṟicaiyai nōkkik koṇṭu,

34 - 5. koḻumpuṉaṟ kāviri......poḻiṉuḻaintu

(I – ḷ.) vaḷaviya puṉalaiyuṭaiya kāviriyiṉatu periya vaṭakaraiyiṟpoḻilaik kaḻinteṉka.

kōṭu – karai. nuḻaital – kaḻital; Aṉṟi Iḷamarakkāvātalāltāḻnta kōṭṭiṭai nuḻaintupōyeṉavumām.

36 - 41. kāvataṅ kaṭantu......viṉava

(I – ḷ.) naṟiya Aivakaik kūntalaiyuṭaiyāḷ Aṅṅaṉam kātameṉṟu collappaṭum Ellaiyaik kaṭantu ceṉṟu kavuntiyaṭikaḷ Irukkiṉṟa paḷḷikku Ayalatōr poliviṉaiyuṭaiya ceṟinta Iḷamaraccōlaiyaḷavuñ ceṉṟu porunti Avviṭattē Iṉi Iḵtu Iṟumeṉattakka koṭipōlum Iṭaiyum Aṭiyum mikavum varunti mēl Iḷaippāṟ

kuṟuka vuyirttu muṟṟāta maḻalai moḻiyālē kūrtta Eyiṟilaṅkamaturaiyeṉṉu mūtūr yātutāṉeṉṟu kēṭpaveṉka.

kāvatam – kātam; pakutipporuḷ vikuti. potumpar – maracceṟivu; kōṭarameṉṟumām.

42 - 3. Āṟaiṅ kātam......nakku

(I – ḷ.) nī kūṟiya maturai nam Akaṉṟa nāṭṭiṟkumēl Āṟaiṅkāvataṅkāṇ, Iṉi Aṇṇiteṉṟu kūṟi nakkeṉka.

yāteṉṟavaṭku muppateṉṉum poruḷ maṟaintu kātam Āṟukātam Ainteṉṟāṟpōliruttaṟku Āṟaiṅkātameṉṟāṉ. |†1 “Iṭukkaṇ varuṅkā ṉakuka” kuṟaḷ. 621.nakutal-tuṉpa nakai. kūntal: viḷi.

44 - 5. tēmoḻi......toḻalum

(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam viṉaviṉa tēmoḻitaṉṉōṭu ceṉṟu tavavēlikkaṇ Irunta kavuntiyaṭikaḷaik kaṇṭu Aṭitoḻutalumeṉka.

ciṟai – paḷḷiyeṉṟumām; ṣrīkōyiliṉ Oru pakkamumām.

8 - 45. kaḻintu kaḻintu pōkikkoṇṭu nīṅkip pōkik kaḻintunuḻaintu kaṭantu porunti nakkuk kaṇṭu Aṭitoḻalumeṉka.

46 - 9. Uruvuṅ kulaṉum......karutiya vāṟeṉa

(I – ḷ.) Ivarkaḷ toḻutārkaḷāka, Aḻakum kuṭippiṟappumOḻukkamum Iṟaivaṉūliṟ kūṟiya viratan tappāmaiyumeṉṉumIvaṟṟaiyellām Orutalaiyākavuṭaiya nīṅkaḷ tīviṉaiyāḷaraippōlanumatiṭattaik kaḻintu varuvataṟkuk karutiyateṉṉōveṉṟu kēṭpaveṉka.

perumakaṉ – Arukatēvaṉ. tirumoḻi – Avaṉaruḷic ceytaĀkamam. Uṟukaṇāḷar – miṭiyāḷareṉpārumuḷar; kaṭaikaḻitalIvarkku marapaṉmaiyiṟ kaḻinteṉṟār.

Ivvummaikaḷ Eṇṇukkuṟittaṉaveṉiṉum ciṟappupporuṇmaitōṉṟa niṉṟaṉa.

50 - 51. Uraiyāṭṭillai......vēṭkaiyāṉ

(I – ḷ.) mikka tavattiṉaiyuṭaiyīr, Ivviṉāviṟku Ōr Uttaramillai; Āyiṉum yāṉ karutiyatoṉṟuṇṭu; Atu yāteṉiṉ,maturaiyākiya mūtūriṟ ceṉṟu nirumitta poruḷait tēṭakkaṭavōmeṉṉum vēṭkaiyai yuṭaiyēṉāyiṉēṉeṉṟu collaveṉka.

muṉṉark kātaiyil “ceṉṟa kalaṉō, ṭulantaporu ḷīṭṭutaluṟṟēṉ” (9: 74-5) Eṉṟāṉākaliṉ, Ataṉai varaiporuḷeṉṟāṉ.Iṉi niyāyattiṟṟōṭum poruḷeṉiṉum Amaiyum; Aṉṟi ItaṟkuIttuṇaipporuṭku mēṟpaṭṭatē tāṉampaṇṇak kaṭavēṉeṉavarainta poruḷeṉpārumuḷar. Eṉaveṉa Orucol varuvikka.

Iṉik kavuntiyaṭikaḷ kūṟuvār:——

52 - 4. pāṭakac cīṟaṭi......Aṟikunar yārō

(I – ḷ.) Iṉi Aṅṅaṉamkaruttāyiṉ, Ivaḷcīṟaṭikaḷ parukkaiyākiya pakaiyai vellamāṭṭā; Ātalāl nīr kāṭunāṭumeṉṉum Ivvaḻiyaik kaṭattaṟku Ivaḷ cevvi Ēṟṟataṉṟu; Iṉiūḻ Eṉceytumuṭikkumō? Ataṉai Aṟivārāreṉṟāreṉka.

Eṉṟakaruttu: Aṭi paraṟpakaiyuḻavā; vaḻi kāṭiṭaiyiṭṭanāṭu;Ivaḷ Ataṟkēṟṟa taṉmaiyaḷallaḷ: Iṉi Ūḻeṉceyyumō; Itaṉaiyār Aṟiyavallāreṉap parivuṟaltōṉṟa niṉṟatu.

55. Uriya taṉṟīṅ koḻikeṉa voḻiyīr

(I – ḷ.) Ivaiyē yaṉṟiyum kuṭippiṟappiṟkum Ivaḷai Oruṅkukoṇṭu cēṟal Ēlātākaliṉ Iṉiccelavai Oḻimiṉeṉṟu yāmoḻippavum Oḻikiṉṟilīrāyiṉīreṉṟā reṉka.

Oḻikeṉavoḻiyīreṉpataṟku Ivarkku Etirvataṟintu kūṟiṉāreṉiṉ, “tavantaru ciṟappiṟ kavunti......Uṇṇā nōṉpō ṭuyirpatippeyarttatum” (27: 79-83) Eṉa nīrppaṭaiyuḷ māṭalaṉ kūṟutalāṉum, Aṭaikkalakkātaiyil, “taṉkula vāṇar, Arumporuḷpeṟunariṉ viruntetir koṇṭu, karuntaṭaṅ kaṇṇiyoṭu kaṭimaṉaippaṭuttuvar, Uṭaip peruñ celvar maṉaippuku maḷavum, Iṭaikkulamaṭantaik kaṭaikkalan tantēṉ” (15: 126-30) Eṉavum, “tāyu nīyēyākit tāṅku” (15: 136) Eṉavum, “mikappē riṉpantaruvatu kēḷāy”(15: 150) Eṉavum Oru poḻutiṟku Ittuṇai Ōmpaṭaiyellām kūṟavēṇṭāvākalāṉum Ivarkkut tavappayaṉālē capitta laṉṟik kālavuṇarcciyiṉmaiyuṇarka.

56 - 63. maṟavurai nītta......tīrttēṉeṉa

(I – ḷ.) maṟavuraikaḷai nīttirukkum kuṟṟamaṟṟa poruṭpayaṉaiyuṭaiyavartam nūlaikkēṭṭu Anta Ākamappaṭiyē Aṟivaṉaiyēttutaṟkut teṟkiṉkaṇ Uḷḷa tamiḻnāṭṭiṉkaṇṇatākiya kuṟṟantīrntamaturaikkup pōtaṟku muṉṉē Oruppaṭṭa Uḷḷamuṭaiyēṉātaliṉ,yāṉpōtuvēṉ; nīrum pōtumiṉeṉṟa kavuntiyaṭikaḷaik kaiyāltoḻutu nāvāṉētti, Aṭikaḷē! nīrē Iṅṅaṉam AruḷceyvīrāyiṉIv vaḷaiporuntiya tōḷiṉaiyuṭaiyāḷuṭaiya tuyarellām Ippoḻutē pōkkiṉēṉaṉṟōveṉṟu collaveṉka.

nīyirē Ituceyvīrāyiṉeṉṟatu Oru vaḻakku. Ēkārattai Icainiṟaiyākkalumoṉṟu. toṭi – vaḷaivu; |“toṭikkaṭ pūvai” (cīvaka.932) Eṉṟārākaliṉ.

nītteṉṟum pāṭam.

64 - 5. kōlaṉ kāṇāy......palakēṇmō

(I – ḷ.) kōvalaṉē! nām pōvatākavuṭkoṇṭa Inneṟiyiṭattu varuttattait taruvaṉa Evviṭattum palavuḷa; Avaṟṟainīyaṟiyāy; Ātalāl, yāṉ collak kēṭpāyākaveṉṟāreṉka.

kāṇāy – nī muṉpu Aṟiyāy. Inneṟi – vaṭakaraivaḻi. mō: muṉṉilai yacai.

66 - 71. veyiṉiṟam poṟāa...kāṭṭiṉuṅ kāṭṭum

(I – ḷ.) veyiliṉatu niṟattaik kaṇṇāṟpārkkavum poṟāta Immelliya Iyalpiṉaiyuṭaiyāḷaik koṇṭu nām pūppayilum taṇṭalaiyūṭu pōkakkaṭavēmeṉpēmāyiṉ; Avviṭattu nilampiḷakkumpaṭiIṭaṅkoṇṭu kīḻ vīḻnta vaḷḷikkiḻaṅkai Akaḻntukoṇṭa kuḻikaḷaic caṇpaka maraṅkaḷ niṟaitta pūntātucērnta poṅkar poykkuḻippaṭuvittu Avviṭaṅkaḷai Aṟintu pātukāttuc cellāta mākkaṭkuc ceyalaṟutiyākiya tuṉpattaik kāṭṭutalaic ceyyiṉuñ ceyyumeṉṟāreṉka.

poṅkar – Īṇṭu vāṭaṟpū. Atupōrttalāṟ poyyaṟaip paṭutteṉṟār; “poṅkar veṇpori cintiṉa puṉku” (12: cempoṉvēṅkai) Eṉpa mēlum. kaiyaṟutuṉpam – mīḷāttuṉpamumām.kāṭṭal – tarutal. poṅkar paṭuttuk kāṭṭumeṉka.

72 - 3. Utirpūñ cemmaliṉ......muṭṭiṉu muṭṭum

(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉamutirnta cemmaṟpū maṟaitta kuḻiyuḷḷavaḻi nāṭutaṟku nilaṉōkki Otuṅkic celvōrai muṟṟip paḻuttu viṇṭutēṉoḻukum palāppaḻaṅkaḷ tāḻnta kōṭṭiṉkaṇ Iruntu pakaipōla muṭṭutalaic ceyyiṉuñ ceyyumeṉṟāreṉka.

Iṉit tēmeṉpataṉai Iṉimaiyākkit teṅkampaḻam muṭṭumeṉiṉum Amaiyum; paḻampakaiyāyeṉap paṇpoṭṭu virikka.

muṭṭiṉumuṭṭuvareṉṟatu pāṭamāyiṉ, kaḻivōr ceyyiṉuñceyvāreṉka; Ummaiyai Aiyavummaiyākkip poruḷuraikka. paṭarkuvameṉiṉēyeṉak kaḻivōrkaruttaik koṇṭu kūṟiṉār, Ulakiyalākalāṉ.

74 - 5. mañcaḷumiñciyum......pakaiyuṟukkum

(I – ḷ.) Avvāṟaṉṟi veḷḷiṭaip pōvōmeṉiṉ, Āṇṭumañcaḷ mutaliyaṉa tammil talaimayaṅkiya piṇakkattaiyuṭaiya tōṭṭaṅkaḷiṟ pāttitōṟum palaviṉ ceñcuḷaikaḷiṉuḷḷa veṇkāḻākiyaparukkaikaḷ Ivaḷ mellaṭikkup pakaiyāy Uṟuttalaic ceyyumeṉṟāreṉka.

valayam – pātti. valayattōṭu paralum pakaiyāyuṟukkumeṉiṉumAmaiyum: Uṟukkum – Uṟuttum.

Eṉṟa karuttu: mañcaḷ mutaliyaṉa nilavaṇmaiyāṉ muṟṟip paruvañ ceytamuḷai carukiṉmaṟaintu kiṭantavaṟṟōṭu paralum Uṟuttumeṉṟatām.

76 - 7. kayaṉeṭuṅ kaṇṇi......paṭarkuva meṉiṉē

(I – ḷ.) kayalpōlum kaṇṇiṉaiyuṭaiyāḷ kātalikkappaṭṭakēḷvaṉē! Aṅṅaṉam cōlaiyum tōṭṭamumākiya karaivaḻiyaṉṟivayalvaḻiyē pōkakkaṭavēmeṉpēmāyiṉ,

77 - 81. Āṅku............kārikai

(I – ḷ.) tammiṭattumalarnta pūkkaḷiṉmaṇam kamaḻāniṉṟa kuḷaṅkaḷil nīrnāy porukiṉṟa kayalkaḷ veruviyōṭavōṭṭik kauvappaṭṭa nīṇṭa mutukaiyuṭaiya vāḷai malaṅkukaḷ neḷiyuñceṟuviṟkuṟukkiṭap pāyumāyiṉ, Ikkārikai kalaṅkutalai Aṭaiyavuṅ kūṭumeṉṟāreṉka.

nīrnāy kauviya vāḷai porukayalōṭṭip pāyiṉeṉiṉum Amaiyum. Itaṉāṟcolliyatu: mīṉiraitērum nīrnāykāṇiṉum, Iṭaiyēporukayalkaḷ Ukaḷakkāṇiṉum, vāḷai pāyakkāṇiṉum, malaṅkumiḷirak kāṇiṉum maṉattiṟ kalaṅkalumuṇṭu Ikkārikaiyeṉṟatām.

81 - 5. Āṅkaṇ..........koḷḷavuṅ kūṭum

(I – ḷ.) Aḵtaṉṟiyum, |†1 “karumpalāṟ kāṭoṉ ṟillāk kaḻaṉicūḻ paḻaṉa nāṭum” (cīvaka.2902.)karumpallatu kāṭiṉmaiyāṉ Avviṭattu Uḷatāya |†2 peruṅ. 1. 48: 146-7.karumpiṉvaitta peruntēṉaṭaikaḷ muṟṟi neruṅkutalāṉē tēṉ Aḻintoḻukic curumpucūḻappaṭṭa poykaiyiṉnallanīrōṭu ceṉṟu kalantuviṭum; Ātalāṉ Ataṉai Aṟiyāmal taṇiyāta nīrvēṭkaiyāṉ Ivaḷ taṉkuṭaṅkaiyāl mukantukoṇṭuparukavuṅ kūṭumeṉṟā reṉka.

kuṭaṅkaiyāvatu Aintuviraluṅkūṭṭi Uṭkuḻippatu; Eṉṉai ?“kuṭaṅkai......Uṭkuḻippatuvē” (2: 17, Aṭiyār.) Eṉṟārākaliṉ.Itaṉāṟcolliyatu: namatu |†3 taricaṉam – cāstiram.taricaṉattuk kaṭiyappaṭṭavāṟṟāl tēṉuṇṭalaip parikarikkaveṉṟatām. Eṉavē Ūṉaiyum Uṭaṉ kūṟiṟṟām.mēlum Ivvāṟu varuvaṉakoḷka.

86 - 9. kuṟuna riṭṭa..........Iṭutaluṅ kūṭum

(I – ḷ.) kaḷaipaṟippār paṟittu varampiliṭṭa kuvaḷaippūvuṭaṉētam meyyiṟ poṟiyaiyum variyaiyumuṭaiya vaṇṭiṉam matumayakkattāṟ pōka Aṟiyātu Uḷḷoṭuṅkikkiṭappaṉavaṟṟai vaḻiccelvaruttattālē nīr Uṇarvumayaṅki vaṟumpūveṉakkaruti AvaṟṟiṉmēlAṭiyiṭavuṅ kūṭumeṉṟāreṉka.

Itaṉāṟcolliyatu Uyirkkolaipukāmaṟ parikarikkaveṉpatām.

90 - 93. Eṟinī raṭaikarai..........Oṇṇā

(I – ḷ.) Eṟiyunīraiyuṭaiya peruvāykkāliṉatu Aṭaikaraivaḻiyē pōkakkaṭavēmeṉpēmāyiṉ, Avvaṭaikarai nīriluḷḷaṉavākiya poṟikaḷiṉ Aḻakaiyuṭaiya Alavaṉum nantum Uḷḷavaḻiyaṟintu pātukāvātu muṉpu naṭakku muṟaimaiyāṉ Aṭiyiṭṭu naṭakkumnaṭaiyiṉ Avaitām Uṟakkaṭavanōyai nammāluṟumāyiṉ Ataṉālnamakku varum kolaippāvam nammāl tāṅkavumoṇṇātu.

Eṟinīr – vāyttalaiyiṉiṉṟum kutittuvarum vāykkālnīr. Iyakkam – vaḻi. nantu – Īṇṭu nattai. Ūḻ – muṟaimai. Otukkam – naṭai.nōyeṉṟār; kolaiyeṉṟu vākkāṟkūṟavumākāmaiyiṉ. Ikkolaippāvam Oṉṟāṉum kaḻuvappaṭātu; Atuvēyumaṉṟi maṟumaikkaṇnarakattiluṟum tuṉpamum nammāl tāṅkalāmaḷaviṟṟaṉṟeṉpataṉāṉ,Ummai Eccavummaiyāyiṟṟu. Aṭaikarai – kaṭaṟkaraiyeṉpārumuḷar.

94 - 7. vayaluñ cōlaiyum......kuṟukā tōmpeṉa

cōlaiyumeṉavē Orucārvupaṟṟit tōṭṭamum Aṭaṅkiṟṟu.vayalum cōlaiyumeṉpaṉavaṟṟaik kūṟiya muṟaiyāṉē Etirniraṉiṟaiyākak koḷḷuvārumuḷar.

(I – ḷ.) Īṇṭukkūṟiya vayalum Āṇṭuk kūṟiya cōlaiyumallatuvēṟupaṭakkiṭakkuneṟi mēl nāmcellukiṉṟa Iṭattil Illai; Ātalāṉ, neṟitta kuñciyaiyuṭaiyāy! nī niṉṉaivirumpiya maṉaiviyōṭē Avvavviṭaṅkaḷaik kuṟippāṉaṟintu Avai |ApakāraṅkaApakāraṅka †Apacāraṅkaḷ ḷuṟāmaṟ pātukāppāyākaveṉṟāreṉka.

veyyōḷukkuk kuṟukāmaleṉiṉum Amaiyum.

kāṭṭiṉuṅkāṭṭum; muṭṭiṉumuṭṭum; paraṟpakaiyuṟukkum; kalaṅkalumuṇṭu; koḷḷavuṅkūṭum; Iṭutaluṅkūṭum; tāṅkavumoṇṇā;Ākalāṟ kuṟiyaṟintu Avaiyavai kuṟukātōmpeṉṟāreṉka.

Iṅṅaṉam meṉmaittaṉmaikūṟuvār, varuṇaṉaikaḷaiyum Uṭaṉkūṟiṉāreṉka. Ittuṇaiyum kavuntiyaṭikaḷ tamatu paḷḷikkaṇ Iruntukūṟiṉāreṉavuṇarka. vayalumeṉavē vāykkālumaṭaṅkiṟṟu.

98 - 101. tōmaṟu kaṭiñaiyum...vaḻippaṭar purintōr

(I – ḷ.) kavuntiyaṭikaḷ kaṭiñaimutaliyavaṟṟaikkoṇṭu pañcamantiramē namakku vaḻittuṇaiyākaveṉaccolliccella, Avarōṭupaḻittalariya Oḻukkattōṭu vaḻiccelavaippurintavareṉka.

tōm – kuṟṟam. kaṭiñai - |†1 “Aiyam pukūun tavaci kaṭiñai” (nālaṭi. 9.)Aiyakkaṭiñai. Aṟuvai – tōḷiliṭumuṟi. moḻipporuṭṭeyvam – poruṇmoḻiyākiyateyvam; Āvatu |†2 Intap pañcamantirattaip pañcanamaskārameṉpar caiṉar.pañcamantiram; A si Ā U sā = A ci Ā U cā.

Iṉik koṇṭeṉṟataṉaik koḷḷaveṉattirittu Aṭikaḷituceyya Ivarkaḷ tuṇaiyākaveṉṟāreṉiṉum Amaiyum.

102 - 11. kariyavaṉ pukaiyiṉum...Olittal cellā

(I – ḷ.) kōḷkaḷiṟ caṉikkōḷ Iṭapam ciṅkam mīṉameṉṉumivaṟṟiṉōṭu māṟupaṭiṉum, Ākāyattē tūmakkōḷ Eḻiṉum, virintakatiraiyuṭaiya veḷḷikkōḷ teṉṟicaikkaṇṇē peyariṉum kāṟṟupporum kuṭakavaraiyiṉatu Uccikkaṇṇē kaṭiya kuralaiyuṭaiya Urumēṟ

ṟōṭu cūṉmutirnta paruvappuyal taṉpeyalākiya vaḷattaic curattalāṉē Avvaraiyiṟpiṟanta pala paṇṭattōṭu kaṭukivarutalaiyuṭaiyakāviriyiṉīr, mukattaik kuttiyiṭikkuṅ kaṭal taṉ vaḷattaikkoṇṭuEtirtalāṉē tēṅki, vāyttalaikkiṭṭa kataviṉmīteḻuntu kutikkiṉṟaApputuppuṉa loliyallatu Āmpimutalāyiṉa Olittalcellāveṉka.

kariyavaṉ – caṉi. pukaikkoṭi – vaṭṭam, cilai, nuṭpam, tūmameṉṉum |†1 Ivaṟṟaik karantuṟaikōṭkaḷeṉpar.kōṭkaḷ nāṉkiṉum tūmakkōḷ; |“maimmīṉ pukaiyiṉuntūman tōṉṟiṉum, teṉṟicai maruṅkiṉ veḷḷi yōṭiṉum”(puṟanā. 117: 1-2) Eṉṟār piṟarum. kālporunivappu – kuṭakiṉ Ucci.Ēṟu – Iṭiyēṟu. paḵṟāram – paltāram; palapaṇṭam. Eṉavē malaivaḷaṉāyiṟṟu; Āvaṉa |“takkōlan......cātiyō ṭaintu” (5: 26, Aṭiyār.)

kaṭalvaḷaṉāvaṉa: “Ōrkkōlai caṅka moḷirpavaḷam veṇmuttam, nīrppaṭu muppiṉō ṭaintu.”

kaṭuvaral – muṭukivarumvaravu. Ō – tūmpiṟkatavu; Iṉi Ōvutal,vikārattāl Ōveṉa niṉṟateṉavumām; Itaṟku Iṟattal Īṇṭuttavirtaṉ mēṟṟu. Āmpi – paṉṟippattar. kiḻār – pūṭṭaippoṟi.piḻā - |†2 Iṭā – Iṟaikūṭai.Iṭā. “nīrttevvu niraittoḻuvar, pāṭucilampu micaiyēṟṟat, tōṭuvaḻaṅku makalāmpiyiṟ, kayamakaiya vayaṉiṟaikku, meṉṟoṭai vaṉkiḻāar” (maturaik. 89-93) Eṉṟār piṟarum.

Iṉik kariyavaṉ pukaiyiṉumeṉpataṟkuc caṉivāram pukaiyiṉumeṉavumām. Iṉip pukaiyiṉum tōṉṟiṉum paṭariṉum curappa Etiranīr vāyttalai Ōviṟantolikkumoliyallatu Āmpimutaliya Olittalcellāmaikkuk kāraṇamākiya kāviriyeṉa muṭippiṉum Amaiyum.pukaiyiṉum tōṉṟiṉum paṭariṉumeṉṟa Ummaikaḷ, maḻai peytoḻil māṟa Ivaṟṟil Oṉṟē Amaiyumākavum Ivaiyellām cēriṉum kaṭalvaḷaṉetira nerikkumeṉak kāviriyiṉciṟappai viḷakkiniṟṟaliṟ ciṟappummaikaḷ.

112 - 3. kaḻaṉi......kāṉattu

(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam Olittalcellāk kaḻaṉiyiṟ cennelumkarumpuñ cūḻnta Iṭattaiyuṭaiya nīrnilaicceṟuviluṇṭākiya tāmaraik kāṭṭileṉka.

114 - 9. kampuṭkōḻiyum...paranta vōtaiyum

(I – ḷ.) kampuṭkōḻi mutaliyaṉa vellumpōraivalla Aracariruvar porumiṭampōlap palavēṟuvakaippaṭṭa tiṟattaiyum Oliyaiyumuṭaiyaṉavāy Olikkum mikka Ōcaiyumeṉka.

kūkkuralum pāṭam. kampuḷ – campaṅkōḻi. kāṉakkōḻi – kāṉāṅkōḻi; nilavaṇmaiyākkik kāṭṭukkōḻiyeṉpārumuḷar. nīrniṟakkākkai – nīrkkākkai. Uḷḷu – Uḷḷāṉ. Ūral – kuḷuvai; nīrmēlūrtaliṉāl, Ākupeyar. puḷḷu – kaṇantuṭpuḷ. pōtā – perunārai,

marakkāṉārai; putā: vikāram. velpōrum, muṉaiyiṭamum viṉaittokai. kuḻūukkural – palavāyoṉṟāṉa Ōcaiyumām.

120 - 24. Uḻāa nuṇṭoḷi...kāyttalaiccoriya

(I – ḷ.) Uḻavarāluḻappaṭāta cēṭṭukkuḻiyiṟ cēṟṟiṉuṭpukkuAḻuntiya kaḻuvāta mayiraiyuṭaiya yākkaiyum civanta kaṇṇaiyumuṭaiya Erumai taṉtiṉavaiyuṭaiya mutukai Uriñcutalālē puritēyntu Aṟṟuccaritaluṟṟa Aḻivaṟṟa purikkūṭṭiṉiṉṟa vaḷaviya palavarukkattu nelluk kavarittoṅkalpōla viḷaintukiṭakkiṉṟa cenneṟkatirttalai yiṭattē coriyaveṉka.

toḷi – cēṟu.

125 - 6. karuṅkai...Oliyē yaṉṟiyum

(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam neṟcoritalāṉē viṉaiñarum kaḷamaruṅkūṭi Oṉṟupaṭa niṉṟolikkum Oliyum; Atuvēyaṉṟiyumeṉka.

karuṅkai – valiyakai. viṉaiñar – paṟaiyar, paḷḷar mutalāyiṉār.kaḷamar – Uḻavar kīḻkkuṭimakkaḷ. karuṅkai Iruvarkkum potu.

127 - 31. kaṭimalar kaḷaintu...viruntiṟ pāṇiyum

(I – ḷ.) kālaiyiṉmuṭitta pūkkaḷaintu muṭitta muṭiyilē muṭiyiṉāṟṟai naṟukkic cūṭikkoṇṭu vaḷaintavaḷaiyaiyuṭaiya tōḷum mulaiyākamuntōyntu cēṟāṭukōlattoṭu Aḻakupeṟattōṉṟic civantakayalpōlum periya kaṇṇaiyum ciṟiyamoḻiyaiyumuṭaiya kaṭaiciyarkaṭuka mayakkum kaḷḷai Uṇṭu tolaittataṉāluṇṭāṉa paṇ niṟattiṟcērntu paḻakippōtāta pāṭṭumeṉka.

Eṉṟatu, matumayakkattāṟ patañcalittu mayaṅkap pāṭiṉāreṉṟapaṭi.Iṉik kaṭimalar kaḷaintu muṭināṟaḻuttiyeṉpataṟkup pōkāppullākiyakaḻunīrmutalaippaṟittu maṟittu Ataṉmītē muṭiyiṉāṟṟaip pakuntunaṭṭeṉiṉum Amaiyum. tōḷum Ākamum tōyntucēṟāṭutal-kaḷittu Oruvarmēl Oruvar cēṟṟai Iṟaittukkōṭal. vīṟupeṟattōṉṟalāvatu – mulaimēṟ ṟeṟittacēṟu kōṭṭumaṇ koṇṭāṟpōṉṟiruttal; “vāriya peṇṇai varukurumpai vāyttaṉapōl,Ēriya vāyiṉu meṉceyyum——kūriya, kōṭṭāṉaik teṉṉaṉ kuḷircān taṇiyakalam, kōṭṭumaṇ koḷḷā mulai” (muttoḷḷāyiram) Eṉṟāṟpōla. ciṉmoḻi – Iḻintamoḻi; cilavāṉamoḻiyumām. viruntiṟpāṇi – tam Icaiyiṟ putumaiyuṇṭākap pāṭum pāṭṭeṉiṉum Amaiyum; Itaṉaip perumuḷaiyeṉpārumuḷar.

132 - 5. koḻuṅkoṭi......Ērmaṅkalamum

(I – ḷ.) cenneṟkatirōṭē Aṟukaiyum kuvaḷaiyaiyum kalantutoṭutta mālaiyai mēḻiyilē cūṭṭip pārai Iraṇṭākap piḷappāraippōlap pōṟṟuvārtoḻap poṉṉērpūṭṭi niṉṟōr Ēraippāṭum Ēr maṅkalappāṭṭumeṉka.

cūṭṭit toḻaniṉṟōr pāṭum Ērmaṅkalamumeṉka.

136 - 7. Arintukāl......mukavaippāṭṭum

(I – ḷ.) nellaiyarintu pōriṭṭār cūṭṭaikkaṭāviṭutalāṉuṇṭāṉa mukavaippāṭṭum,

Āvatu polipāṭutal. mukakkak koṭuttaliṉ, mukavaiyāyiṟṟu.

138 - 9. teṇkiṇaipporunar...makiḻicaiyōtaiyum

Itu kaḷavaḻi vāḻttu; Eṉṉai? “taṇpaṇaivayaluḻavaṉait, teṇkiṇaivaṉ ṟiruntupukaḻ kiḷantaṉṟu”; varalāṟu: “pakaṭuvāḻ keṉṟupaṉivayalu ḷāmai, Akaṭupō laṅkaṭ ṭaṭārit——tukaṭuṭaittuk,kuṉṟupōṟ pōrviṟ kurucil vaḷampāṭa, Iṉṟupō meṅkaṭ kiṭar”(pu. ve. 186) Eṉavarum. kiṇai – taṭāri; puṭpaṟai yeṉpatuṅkoḷka.

(I – ḷ.) teḷinta Ōcaiyaiyuṭaiya kiṇaipporunar cerukkutalōṭeṭutta mārccaṉaiyaiyuṭaiya tiraṇṭa muḻaviṉatu kēṭṭōr makiḻumIcaiyiṉatu Oliyum,

140 - 41. pēryāṟṟu......Avalaṅ koḷḷār

(I – ḷ.) periya yāṟṟaṭaikaraiyilē Ivvōcaikaḷai muṟaiyiṟkēṭṭu neñcam virumputalālē vaḻi naṭattaliṉ Uṇṭāṉa varuttattai neñciṟ koḷḷārāyeṉka.

parantavōtaiyum Ārkkumoliyum viruntiṟpāṇiyum Ērmaṅkalamum mukavaippāṭṭum makiḻicaiyōtaiyum Eṉṉumivaṟṟaip pēryāṟṟaṭai karaikkaṇṇē nīrmaipeṟak kēṭṭalāl Uṇṭāṉa viruppattāṉē neñcil Avalaṅ koḷḷārāyeṉka.

142 - 7. Uḻaippulikkoṭi......Irukkai yaṉṟiyum

(I – ḷ.) puliyait taṉṉiṭattēyuṭaiya koṭiyaiyuyartta tēraiyuṭaiya Uravōṉākiya karikālaṉatu koṟṟattuṭaṉē maḻaikkum karuppattait tōṟṟuvikkum Aḻalai viḷakkukiṉṟa cālaiyiṉuṇṭāṉa maṟaiyōrāṉ Ākkappaṭṭa tēvaruṇāviṉ Āvi Iṟaiyuyarnta māṭamākiyaAkaṅkaḷeṅkum pōrttalāṉē mañcu cūḻnta malaipōla māṭcimaippaṭat tōṉṟum maṅkala maṟaiyōriruppiṭaṅkaḷum; Avaiyaṉṟiyum,

148 - 55. parappunīr......ceṉṉā ḷorunāḷ

(I – ḷ.) Irappavar cuṟṟattaiyum purappavar koṟṟattaiyum tamUḻaviṉiṭattē viḷaippōruṭaiya paḻaiya vali poruntiya Ūrkaḷumākiya Ivviruvakaiyūrkaḷaiyum Iṭaiyiṭṭa nāṭellāṅkaṇṭu naṭakkunāṭ kātameṉṉum Ellaiyallatu naṭantu tolaikka māṭṭārāyp palanāḷ taṅki naṭakkiṉṟa nāḷilē Orunāḷeṉka.

tūṟṟāppoli Ālaiyiṟ pāku kāykiṉṟa pukaiyāṟ parakkappaṭṭuIruṭciyaiyuṭaiya mukil tavaḻnta malaipōlat tōṉṟum paḻaviṟalūrkaḷum Eṉka.

†1 kaṅkaiyāruḻaicceṉṟu kāviriyārai vāṅki Eṉṟu kūṟiṉarnacciṉārkkiṉiyarum; tolkāppiyap pāyiravuraiyiṟ kāṇka.kāvirinīr kaṅkainīrātaliṟ kaṅkaiyiṉ putalvaraik kāviriyiṉputalvareṉṟār; Aṉṟiyum |“makavāy vaḷarkkun tāyāki” (7: 27) Eṉpataṉāṉuṅkoḷka. tōṉṟumirukkaiyum tōṉṟumūrkaḷumeṉaviyaiyum. Avvūrkaḷai Iṭaiyiṭṭa nāṭeṉka. Uṭaṉkaṇṭeṉṟār, Innāṭṭuc ciṟappellām kaṇṭu tolaittuk kaḻitalarumaiyiṉ. putalvarāki Uḻaviṭai viḷaippōreṉka.

156 - 63. Āṟṟuvī yaraṅkattu......cāraṇar tōṉṟa

(I – ḷ.) Āṟṟai maṟaikkum Araṅkattil vēṟiṭattillāta taṉmaittāy vaḷainta mūṅkiṉ muḷḷāl vaḷaikkappaṭṭa vēliyaiyuṭaiyamarampayiṉṟa ceṟinta cōlaiyil tēvaruṟaitaṟkotta pūpporuntiyatorupakkattē paṭṭiṉappākkattu |†2 vāṉperumaṉṟameṉpatu mutalāka Iṅkē tanturaittavaṟṟai,Ikkātai, 20 -Ām Aṭi mutaliyavaṟṟiṟ kāṇka.vāṉperu maṉṟattup piṇṭinīḻaṟkaṇṇē Ulaka nōṉpikaḷ Iṭappaṭṭa cilātalattiṉ mēliruntaruḷipperumakaṉāṟ ceyyappaṭṭa Aticayaṅkaḷ mūṉṟun tappāta Ākamanūliṉuṇmait taṉmaiyaiyuṭaiya tarumavoḻukkattai yāvaruṅ kēṭkumpaṭi Aruḷicceyyum |†3 cāraṇar – camaṇa muṉivar. Avar: tala cāraṇar, cala cāraṇar,pala cāraṇar, puṭpa cāraṇar, tantucāraṇar, caturaṅkula cāraṇar, caṅkacāraṇar, Ākāca cāraṇareṉa Eṇvakaiyar; Ivviruvarākac ceṉṟutarumōpatēcañ ceytal Avarkaṭku Iyalpeṉpar.cāraṇar Appaṭṭiṉappākkattaiviṭṭu nīṅkivantu tōṉṟa veṉka;

Aticaya mūṉṟāvaṉa: cakacāticayam, karmakṣayāticayam, teyvīkāticayameṉmaṉa.

vīṟṟuvīṟṟāki Uṭutta Oruciṟaic cāraṇar tōṉṟaveṉka.

164 - 9. paṇṭait tolviṉai......koḷḷāṉ

(I – ḷ.) muṉceyta paḻaviṉaiyellām keṭṭōṭukaveṉṟu Uṭkoṇṭu Avar vantamaiyaik kaṇṭaṟinta kavuntiyaṭikaḷuṭaṉē ceṉṟuAvaraṭiyilē talaiyuṟa vīḻntār; Aṅṅaṉam vīḻntavar Īṇṭuvantatutaṉatu viḷaṅkiya kōṭpāṭṭaiyuṭaiya |†4 Avati ñāṉam – Atītakamāṉa pariññāṉam; Aḵtāvatu taṉṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappai yaṟiyumaṟivu.Avati ñāṉattāl terintavaṉāyiṉum Ārvamum ceṟṟamum taṉṉaiviṭṭup pōmpaṭi nīkkiya |†5 vanta cāraṇa riruvaruḷ, Upatēcippōr mūttōrē yātaliṉ,vīraṉeṉa Orumaiyāṟ kūṟiṉār.vīraṉākalālē Ivarkku varuntuṉpattiṟkut tāṉ varuntāṉākiyeṉka.

†1 Iḵtu, Uriya taṉṟīṅ koḻikeṉa voḻiyīr (10: 55) EṉpataṉUraiyiṟ kūṟiyatai vaṟpuṟuttaṟku.kaṇṭaṟivukavuntiyeṉpataṉālum kālavuṇarcciyiṉmai yuṇarka.

Oṭu: Oruviṉaiyoṭu.

170 - 71. kaḻiperu......valviṉai

(I – ḷ.) mikka periya tavac ciṟappaiyuṭaiya kavunti, yāvarāṉumOḻikka Oḻiyātatāy nukarvikka vantuniṟkiṉṟa tīviṉaiyaik kāṇāyeṉṟāreṉka.

kāṇāy – pārāy. Oḻikeṉa voḻiyāteṉpataṟku, nī Uriyataṉṟīṅ koḻika (10: 55) Eṉavum Oḻiyātu Ūṭṭun tīviṉaiyaiyeṉiṉum Amaiyum.

172 - 3. Iṭṭa vittiṉ......Oṇṇā

(I – ḷ.) viḷainilattiṭṭa vittuppōlap payaṉetirntu kaṇkūṭāka nalviṉaivantu nukarvikkuṅ kālattum Oḻikkavoṇṇā;Atupōla Ituvum Oḻikka Oḻiyāteṉṟāreṉka.

“Uṟaṟpāla......taṇippārumil” (nālaṭi. 104) Eṉṟārākaliṉ,tīviṉai taṉṉaiyē kūṟiṉum Amaiyum. Ummai: Eccavummai.

174 - 5. kaṭuṅkāl......Uṭampiṭai yuyirkaḷ

(I – ḷ.) kaṭiya kāṟṟaiyuṭaiya neṭiya veḷiyiliṭappaṭṭa viḷakkeṉṉumpaṭi māyiṉallatu kūṭi Uṭaṉillā, Uṭampiṉiṉṟa Uyirkaḷumeṉṟāreṉka.

nalviṉai tīviṉaippayaṉākiya Iṉpamum tuṉpamum varuṅkāl yāvarāṉum Oḻikkavoṇṇā veṉpatūum, yākkai nilaiyāmaiyum Ivartampāl Uṟuvatu kaṇṭu kavuntiyaṭikaṭkuc cāraṇar kūṟiṉāreṉavuṇarka. viḷakku Uvamittār; niṉaivaṟa Aḻivataṟkum, pukkuḻip pulappaṭāmaikkum.

176 - 91. Aṟivaṉaṟavōṉ...potiyaṟai yōreṉa

176. Aṟivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāp poruḷaiyumaṟiyumAṟivaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

Aṟavōṉ——(I – ḷ.) Aṟañceytalaiyē toḻilākavuṭaiyōṉ,

Aṟivu varampikantōṉ——(I – ḷ.) yāvarumaṟiyappaṭum Aṟivellaiyaik kaṭantōṉ,

177. ceṟivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāvuyirkaṭkum Itaṉāyuḷḷavaṉ; caliyātavaṉeṉṟumām.

ciṉēntiraṉ——(I – ḷ.) Eṇvakaik kaṉmaṅkaḷaiyumcayittavaṉ,

Avaiyāvaṉa: |†1 ñāṉāvaraṇīya mutaliya veṭṭum kāti Akātiyeṉa Iruvakaippaṭṭu, nūṟṟu nāṟpatteṭṭāka viriyumeṉpar.ñāṉāvaraṇīyam, taricaṉāvaraṇīyam, vētanīyam,mōkanīyam, Āyuṣyam, nāmam, kōttiram, Antarāyam Eṉavivai.

cittaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kirutakiruttiyaṉ = ceyyavēṇṭuvaṉavaṟṟaic ceytumuṭittavaṉ; kaṉmaṅkaḷaik kaḻuviṉavaṉumeṉpa.

pakavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) |†2 kēvala ñāṉam – Aintu ñāṉattuḷḷum ciṟantatu. Aintuñāṉaṅkaḷāvaṉa:——(1) mati ñāṉam – cupāva putti; (2) curuta ñāṉam-nūl Uṇarcci; (3) Avati ñāṉam – taṉṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappai yaṟiyumaṟivu; (4) maṉappariyaya ñāṉam – taṉṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappaiyum, piṟaruṭaiya muṟpiṟappaiyum Aṟiyumaṟivu; (5) kēvala ñāṉam – tirikālaUṇarcci.kēvala ñāṉi.

178. taruma mutalvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tarumaṅkaḷukku Aṭiyāyuḷḷavaṉ,

talaivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāt tēvarkkum talaivaṉākaEṇṇappaṭṭavaṉ,

tarumaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tarumam tāṉāyuḷḷavaṉ,

179. poruḷaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ākamattiṉ poruḷāyuḷḷavaṉ; Uṇmaip poruḷāyuḷḷavaṉeṉavumām.

puṉitaṉ——(I – ḷ.) cuttaṉ; putiyavaṉumeṉpa.

purāṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) paḻaiyavaṉ,

pulavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellārkkum Aṟivāyuḷḷavaṉ,

180. ciṉavaraṉ——(I – ḷ.) ciṉattaik kīḻppaṭuttiyavaṉ,

tēvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tēvarkaḷukku Ātiyākiya tēvaṉ,

civakati nāyakaṉ——(I – ḷ.) vīṭṭulakiṟku nāyakaṉāyuḷḷavaṉ,

181. paramaṉ——mēlāṉavaṉ,

kuṇavataṉ

(I – ḷ.) kuṇattaiyuṭaiyavaṉ; vatam - |†3 viratam – Aṉuviratam, kuṇaviratam, cikṣāviratameṉa mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum; Avaṟṟuḷ kuṇaviratam——tikkuviratam, tēcaviratam,Anarttataṇṭa viratameṉa mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum.viratamumām.

paratti loḷiyōṉ——

(I – ḷ.) mēlāya Ulakiṟku viḷakkāyuḷḷavaṉ,

182. tattuvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tattuvaṅkaḷaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

cātuvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Oṭuṅkiṉavaṉ,

cāraṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ākācavāci.

kāraṇaṉ

(I – ḷ.) Ellāvaṟṟiṟkum kāraṇamāyuḷḷavaṉ = kāraṇapūtaṉ,

183. cittaṉ

(I – ḷ.) Eṇvakaic cittikaḷaiyu muṇṭākkiṉavaṉ.

periyavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāvaṟṟāṉum periyavaṉ,

cemmal——(I – ḷ.) nāyakamūrtti,

tikaḻoḷi——(I – ḷ.) viḷaṅkum Oḷiyāyuḷḷavaṉ

184. Iṟaivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Epporuḷiṉum taṅkukiṉṟavaṉ,

kuravaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kurumūrttiyāyuḷḷavaṉ,

Iyalkuṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Iyalpaiyē kuṇamāka Uṭaiyavaṉ,

Eṅkōṉ——(I – ḷ.) Emmuṭaiya cuvāmi,

185. kuṟaivil pukaḻōṉ

(I – ḷ.) niṟainta pukaḻaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

kuṇapporuṭ kōmāṉ——

(I – ḷ.) kuṇaṅkaḷaic campattāka vuṭaiyavaṉ,

186. caṅkaraṉ——(I – ḷ.) cukattaippaṇṇukiṉṟavaṉ,

Īcaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Aicuvariyavāṉ,

cayampu——(I – ḷ.) tāṉētōṉṟiṉavaṉ,

catumukaṉ——(I – ḷ.) nāṉmukaṉ = Aticayattōṭu nāṉmukaṉ,

187. Aṅkam payantōṉ

(I – ḷ.) |†1 Aṅkākamam, 12 pakuppuṭaittu. Avai varumāṟu: (1) Ācārāṅkam (2) cūttirakirutāṅkam, (3) stāṉāṅkam, (4) samavāyāṅkam,(5) viyākkiyāp pirajñaptyaṅkam, (6) ñātrukatāṅkam, (7) Upāsakāttiyayaṉāṅkam (8) Antakkirutatacāṅkam, (9) Anuttarōpapātikatacāṅkam, (10) piraccina viyākaraṇāṅkam, (11) vipākacūttirāṅkam,(12) tiruṣṭivātāṅkam.Aṅkākamattai yuṇṭākkiṉavaṉ,

Arukaṉ——(I – ḷ.) pūcciyaṉ,

Aruṇmuṉi——(I – ḷ.) civapara mūrtti,

188. paṇṇavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kaṭavuḷ,

Eṇkuṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Eṭṭukkuṇaṅkaḷaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

Eṇkuṇamāvaṉa:——Anantañāṉam, Anantavīriyam, Anantataricaṉam, Anantacukam, nirnnāmam, nirkkōttiram, nirāyuṣyam, Aḻiyāviyalpeṉa vivai.

pāttil paḻamporuḷ——(I – ḷ.) pakuttaṟkariya purāṇapporuḷāyuḷḷavaṉ; Ōṭṭamaṟṟa poṉṉaiyoppāṉeṉṟumām.

189. viṇṇavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) cuvarkkavāci,

vēta mutalvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) |†1 Ākama mūṉṟāvaṉa: Aṅkākamam, pūrvākamam, pahucurutiyākamameṉpaṉa.Ākamamūṉṟiṟkum mutalāyuḷḷavaṉ.

viḷaṅkoḷi——(I – ḷ.) Aññāṉaviruḷ nīṅka viḷaṅkumoḷi.

190 - 91. Ōtiya vētattu......potiyaṟai yōreṉa

(I – ḷ.) Innāmaṅkaḷai yuṭaiyōṉāl Ōtappaṭṭa Ākamamākiyaviḷakkoḷiyaip peṟṟāṟpōntēṟuvatallatu yāvarum piṟaviyākiyaciṟaiyiṉiṉṟum pōkamāṭṭāreṉṟāreṉka.

†2 Itu puḻukkaṟaiyeṉavum vaḻaṅkum; maṇi. 3: 95; 23: 60.potiyaṟai – tuvāramillāta kīḻaṟai.

192 - 3. cāraṇar mēṟkoṇṭu

(I – ḷ.) Iṅṅaṉam cāraṇar Aruḷicceyta Uṇmaimoḻiyaikkēṭṭut tavattiṟku mutalviyākiya kavuntiyaṭikaḷum tamatu kaikaḷaittalaimēl vaittukkoṇṭu niṉṟukūṟuvār:——

194 - 5. Orumūṉṟu......ceviyakan tiṟavā

(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu cevikaḷ kāmavekuḷi mayakkaṅkaḷaik keṭuttavaṉāl Ōtappaṭṭa ñāṉapātamākiya tirumoḻiyaik kēṭṭaṟkut tiṟappiṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṟkut tiṟappaṉavallaveṉṟāreṉka.

Avittal Aṭakkutalumām.

196 - 7. kāmaṉai......navilā teṉṉā

(I – ḷ.) Eṉnāvum kāmaṉceyalai veṉṟavaṉuṭaiya Āyiratteṭṭu vakaippaṭṭa nāmam naviliṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṉai navilāteṉṟāreṉka.

198 - 9. Aivarai veṉṟōṉ......kāṇā veṉkaṇ

(I – ḷ.) Eṉatukaṇkaḷum Aivakaippaṭṭa Intiriyaṅkaḷaiyum veṉṟavaṉuṭaiya Aṭiyiṇaikaḷaik kāṇiṉallatu piṟitoru tēvaraṭiyiṇaikaḷaik kaiyakattē kāṇiṉum kāṇāveṉṟāreṉka.

Aivar, ceṟaliṉkaṇ tiṇaimayakkam. Iṉik kaivaraikāṇiṉumpāṭamāyiṉ, kaivaraikāṇal kaṇviḻittalākki viḻittiruppiṉumkāṇāveṉka.

200 - 201. Aruḷaṟam pūṇṭōṉ......poruntātu

(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu payaṉaṟṟayākkai Aruḷāl Aṟattaippūṇṭōṉuṭaiya tirumēṉipporuṭṭup pūmiyiṟporuntiṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṟkup poruntāteṉṟāreṉka.

Aruḷaṟam: Ummaittokaiyumām.

202 - 3. Aruka raṟavaṉ..........kuviyā

(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu Irukaiyum Arukarkku AṟattaikkūṟuvōṉākiyaAṟivaṉporuṭṭu Eṉcirattiṉmicaiyē kuviyiṉallatu piṟitorutēvar poruṭṭuk kuviyāveṉṟāreṉka.

Arukar – Iruṭikaḷ.

204 - 5. malarmicai......poṟāatu

(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu talaiyiṉucciyum pūviṉmītē naṭantōṉuṭaiyamalaraṭiyākiya Aṇiyai Aṇiyap poṟuppiṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṉaiyumAṇiyappoṟāteṉṟāreṉka.

206 - 7. Iṟutiyi liṉpattu......peyarātu

(I – ḷ.) Eṉmaṉamum Īṟiliṉpamākiya AnantacukattaiyuṭaiyaIṟaivaṉaruḷicceyta Ākamamākiyamoḻiyai Uruvēṟa Ōtippuṭaipeyariṉallatu piṟitorumoḻiyaiyōtip puṭaipeyarāteṉṟāreṉka.

maṟutara – mīḷavum.

208 - 13. Eṉṟava ṉicaimoḻi......paṇintaṉarpōntu

(I – ḷ.) tamkaiyait talaimēṟkoṇṭuniṉṟu, kavuntiyaṭikaḷ,tiṟavā; navilātu; kāṇā; poruntātu; kuviyā; poṟātu; peyarāteṉṟukoṇṭu Avaṉ pukaḻmoḻikaḷai Ēttakkēṭṭu Ataṟkupporuntiya cāraṇar Avviṭattiṭappaṭṭa cilāvaṭṭattiṉiṉṟumeḻuntu Ataṟku Oru muḻavuyaram mēlāniṉṟu piṟappaittarumpācamkavuntikkuk keṭuvatāka veṉṟukūṟi Antaravaḻiyāka viraintucelkiṉṟavarainōkkit toḻutu pācaṅkaḷ Aṟukaveṉṟu paṇintaṉarāyppōnteṉka.

214 - 8. kāraṇi pūmpoḻil...pūmpoḻi liruntuḻi

(I – ḷ.) mukilaiyaṇinta poḻilaiyuṭaiya kāviriyākiya periyayāṟṟiṟku mātarum kaṇavaṉum kavuntiyaṭikaḷum paḷḷiyōṭattēṟippōyt teṉkaraiyaicceṉṟeytip pōtukaḷ cūḻntukiṭakkiṉṟatōr poliviṉaiyuṭaiya poḻiliṭattē ceṉṟiruntapoḻutileṉka.

219 - 20. vampap parattai......ceṉṟōr

(I – ḷ.) |†1 Iṭaṅkaḻikāmam – mikka kāmam; maṇi. 10: 22; 18: 119.Iṭaṅkaḻikāmattaḷākiya kuṇṭakkaṇikaiyoruttiyumOruvaṉuṅkūṭi Ivarkaḷ Irukkiṉṟa maṇamparantatōr poḻiliṭattēAṇukiṉarāyc ceṉṟavareṉka.

vampapparattai – putiya parattaittaṉmaiyaiyuṭaiyāḷ; kuṇṭameṉṟapaṭi. Iṉi, maṉaveḻucciyāl tōṉṟiṉapaṭi collittiriyumparattaiyeṉṟumām. vaṟumoḻiyāḷaṉ – payaṉilcollāḷaṉ; viṭaṉeṉṟapaṭi.

221 - 2. kāmaṉun tēviyum......Aṟikuva meṉṟē

(I – ḷ.) Ivviṭattuvantirukkiṉṟa kāmaṉaiyum Iratiyaiyumokkum Ivarkaḷai yāreṉṟukēṭṭu Aṟiyakkaṭavōmeṉṟu colliyeṉka.

Iṉi, Ivviṭattuvantavivar kāmaṉum tēviyumē; Allarāyiṉ,yāreṉak kēṭṭaṟikuvameṉṟāreṉiṉum Amaiyum. Ipporuṭkuppōli Oppil pōli. Īṅkivar: Īṅku – Ivviṭattu. kēṭṭīṅku:Īṅku – Ippoḻutu.

223 - 4. nōṟṟuṇal yākkai......viṉava

(I – ḷ.) |†1 “Ōvā tiraṇṭuvavu maṭṭamiyum paṭṭiṉiviṭṭu” (cīvaka. 1547)Uvāmutaliya viratanāṭkaḷiṟ paṭṭiṉiviṭṭuṇṭalāṉmelintayākkaiyaiyum nuṇṇiya tavattaiyumuṭaiyīr! nummoṭukūṭi vaḻivanta Ivar yāreṉṟu viṉavaveṉka.

Āṟṟuvaḻippaṭṭōr – vaḻiyiṟ kūṭivantōr.

224 - 6. Eṉmakkaḷ......paripulam piṉareṉa

(I – ḷ.) Avviruvarum Ivviruvaraiyum viṉavutalkaṇṭa kavuntiyaṭikaḷ Ivar Eṉmakkaḷkāṇum; nīrcoṉṉa kāmaṉum tēviyumallar;māṉiṭayākkaiyar; vaḻivarum varuttattāl mikavum varuntiṉar; Avaruḻaiccellātē viṭappōmiṉeṉṟāreṉka.

pari – mikuti; paripulampiṉar: Oru collumām.

227 - 8. Uṭaṉvayiṟṟōrkaḷ......kaṟṟaṟin tīreṉa

(I – ḷ.) nūlkaḷaiyuṅkaṟṟu Ataṉpayaṉaiyumaṟintavarē! Oruvayiṟṟu Uṭaṉpiṟantōr koḻunaṉum maṉaiviyumāyk kūṭivāḻakkaṭavateṉṟu nīr kaṟṟanūlkaḷiṟ collikkiṭappatumuṇṭō? Uṇṭākiṟcollumeṉṟāreṉka.

kaṟṟaṟintīreṉṟatu Ikaḻcci; Ivvāṟō nīr kaṟṟaṉavumeṉpatām.

229 - 40. tīmoḻi kēṭṭu......Uraiyīrōveṉa

(I – ḷ.) Iṅṅaṉam Ivar Ikaḻntamoḻiyaik kēṭṭalāṟ ceviyaip putaittuk kaṇṇaki naṭuṅka, Eṉ pūṅkōtaipōlvāḷai IvarIkaḻkiṉṟaṉar; Ivvikaḻcciyāl tuṭakkumuṭkaḷaiyuṭaiya kāṭṭilnuḻaintutiriyum mutunariyākakkaṭavareṉak kavuntiyaṭikaḷ Iṭṭa cāpamtavattiṉ viḷaivākiya cāpamātalāl Avaraic ceṉṟu pūṇṭatātaliṉ,Aṅṅaṉam viḷainta paṭiyaiyaṟiyārākiya kōtaiyum nampiyum kuṟiyanariyiṉatu neṭiya kuralākak kūvum viḷiyaikkēṭṭu naṭuṅkicceṉṟuOḻukka neṟiyiṉiṉṟum nīṅkiyōr nīrmaiyallātaṉavaṟṟaic colliṉum Iḵtu Avar Aṟiviṉmaiyāṟ kūṟiyataṉṟōveṉṟu Uyarntōrtamataṟivāṉ Uṇaravēṇṭum; ceytavattīr, Ummuṭaiya tirumuṉpiḻaitta Ivarkku Iṉic cāpanīṅki Uytal UṭaittāṅkālattaiUraittaruḷīreṉṟu kūṟaveṉka.

pōlum: Oppilpōli. mutunari – Ōri. naṭuṅkiyeṉṟār, tamporuṭṭākaviḷaitaliṉ. Ōkāram: Icainiṟai. Aṭikaḷ maṉattālniṉaittiṭṭa cāpamātalāṟ paṭṭataiyaṟiyāreṉṟār. Iṅṅaṉam Aṟiyātavarkaḷ Avar coṉṉa Ikaḻcciyālum Itaṟku Ivarallatu vēṟucapikkavuriyāriṉmaiyāṉum Uytikkālamuraiyīreṉṟār. viḷi – Ōrikkural. neṟiyi ṉīṅkiyōr nīrala kūṟiṉum, Aṟiyā maiyeṉ ṟaṟiyalvēṇṭum Eṉṉuntuṇaiyum Avaruṭkōḷ. piṉṉatai Aṭikaṭkukkūṟiṉār.

241 - 5. Aṟiyāmaiyiṉiṉṟu...cāpaviṭai ceytu

(I – ḷ.) tamatu muppoṟikaḷāṉvarum tuṉpameṉpataṉai Aṟintukūṟāmaiyāṉē Iṉṟu Iḻipiṟappaiyuṟṟa Ivar Uṟaiyūr matiṟpuṟamākiya kāvaṟkāṭṭiṟṟirintu paṉṉiraṇṭu tiṅkaḷ Iṅṅaṉam tuṉpamuḻanta piṉṉar muṉṉaippiṟappaip peṟuvārākaveṉac cāpaviṭaiceyteṉka.

Iṉṟu Iḻipiṟappuṟṟōreṉṟatu neṭuṅkālam tavañceytu peṟṟamakkaṭpiṟappai Oruvārttaiyiṉiḻantu Iḻipiṟappuṟṟāreṉṟavāṟu;Eṉavē |†1 kuṟaḷ. 127.yākāvārāyiṉum nākāttal vēṇṭumeṉpatāyiṟṟu; |“Ākkap paṭukku maruntaḷaivāyp peyvikkum, pōkkappaṭukkum pulainarakattuyppikkum, kākkap paṭuvaṉa vintiya maintiṉum, nākkalla tillainaṉivellu māṟē” (vaḷaiyāpati) Eṉpatūumāyiṟṟu; nocciyorupuṭai yeṉṟatu vēṟu Araṇvēṇṭāmai viḷakkiṟṟu; |“noccivēlit titta ṉuṟantai” (Akanā. 122: 21) Eṉṟatumatu. Iḻipiṟappu-vilaṅkiṉ piṟappu. muṉṉaiyuruvam – vampapparattaiyum vaṟumoḻiyāḷaṉumeṉavumām.

245 - 8. tavapperuñ ciṟappiṉ......pukkaṉar purinteṉ.

(I – ḷ.) tavattāṉmikka ciṟappaiyuṭaiya kavuntiyaṭikaḷum tēviyum kaṇavaṉum muṟampōluñceviyaiyuṭaiya yāṉaiyaic camariṭattukkeṭutta puṟattē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyeṉṉunakariṉkaṇṇēviruppattōṭu pukkāreṉka.

vāraṇam – kōḻi; Āvatu Uṟaiyūr. muṟkālattu Orukōḻiyāṉaiyaip pōrtolaittalāṉ Annilattiṟceyta nakarkkuk kōḻiyeṉpatu peyarāyiṟṟu. Annakar kāṇkiṉṟapoḻutu ciṟaiyum kaḻuttumāka Ākkiyavataṉāṟ puṟampē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyeṉṟāyiṟṟeṉpārumuḷar; Aṟṟaṉṟu; puṟañciṟaivāraṇameṉpatu cilēṭai:puṟattē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyum, puṟañcēriyaiyuṭaiya Uṟaiyūrum;“puṟañciṟaip poḻilum” (14: 1) Eṉpa mēlumākaliṉ.

paṇintaṉarpōntu Eyti Iruntuḻic ceṉṟōr viṉavap paripulampiṉareṉak kaṭavatumuṇṭō kaṟṟaṟintīreṉac ceviyakamputaittunaṭuṅka mutunariyākeṉak kaṭṭiyatātaliṉ Uraiyīrōveṉap peṟukaĪṅkivareṉac cāpaviṭaiceytu kavuntiyum tēviyum kaṇavaṉum purintupukkāreṉka.

Iḵtu Ellāvaṭiyun tammuḷottumuṭitaliṉ nilaimaṇṭilavāciriyappā.

(10) nāṭukāṇ kātai muṟṟiṟṟu.

kaṭṭurai

1 - 2. muṭiyuṭai...Utittōr——mūvēntaruḷḷum cōḻarkulattu Utittōruṭaiya; mūvar – cōḻar pāṇṭiyar cērar.

3. Aṟaṉ

“Aṟaṉōmpaṭai” (5: 179) Eṉṟatu tarumācaṉameṉpārumuḷar.

maṟaṉ——“Imaiyava ruṟaiyuñ cimaiyap piṭarttalaik, koṭuvariyoṟṟi” (5: 97-8) Eṉṟatu.

Āṟṟal——“kōnakar kātta” (6: 8) Eṉṟatu.

4. mūtūrppaṇpu mēmpaṭutal

“pukārēyāyiṉum” (1: 16) Eṉṟatu.

5. viḻavumaliciṟappu——

“viṇṇavar talaivaṉai viḻunī rāṭṭi” (5: 168) Eṉṟatu.

viṇṇavarvaravu——“Antarat tuḷḷō raṟiyā marapiṉ, vantukāṇkuṟūum vāṉavaṉ viḻavu” (6: 72-3) Eṉṟatu.

7. kuṭi——“Irappōr cuṟṟamum purappōr koṟṟamum, Uḻaviṭai viḷaippōr” (10: 149-50) Eṉṟatu.

kūḻiṉ perukkam——“kumarik kūṭṭiṟ koḻumpal luṇavu,kavaric cenneṟ kāyttalaic coriya” (10: 123-4) Eṉṟatu.

7 - 8. Avar tam teyvakkāvirit tītutīr ciṟappu——

“kariyavaṉ......Olikkum” (10: 102-9) Eṉṟatu.

9. poyyā vāṉam putuppuṉal poḻital——“maḻaikkaruvuyirkku maḻaṟṟika ḻaṭṭiṉ maṟaiyōr” (10: 143-4) Eṉṟatu.

10. Araṅku——“nūṉeṟi marapi ṉaraṅkam” (3: 99) Eṉṟatum,“tōṟṟiya varaṅkil” (3: 106) Eṉṟatum.

Āṭal——“Āṭalum” (3: 16) Eṉṟatu

tūkku——“tūkkum” (3: 16) Eṉṟatu

vari——kaṇkūṭu vari mutal Eṭuttukkōḷvari yiṟutiyākavuḷḷaEṭṭu variyum (8: 74-108)

11. pārati virutti——nāṭakavuṟuppākiya pārativirutti; Atukaṭalāṭukātaiyiṟ kūṟappaṭṭuḷḷa patiṉōrāṭalum (39-63)

12. tiṇainilaivari——“kaṭalpukku” (17) Eṉṉuṅ kavimutal“cēraṉ maṭavaṉṉam” (23) Eṉpatiṟutiyākavuḷḷa Ēḻum.

Iṇai nilaivari——cārttuvari mutalākiya pala varikaḷāl varuvaṉa(kāṉalvariyiṟkāṇka)

13. yāḻiṉṟokuti——“cittirappaṭam” mutal, |“paṭṭaṭai”Īṟākavuḷḷaṉa (7: 1)

14. Īrēḻcakōṭam——“Īrēḻ toṭutta cemmuṟaikkēḷvi” (3: 70) Eṉṟatu.

Iṭanilaippālai——“kuralvā yiḷivāyk kēṭṭaṉaḷ”(8: 35) Eṉṟatu.

15. tārattākkam——“kuralīṟākavum” (8: 38) Eṉpataṉāl,tāram kuralākiya viḷarippālai piṟakkuṅkāl tāram Ākkam peṟutalkāṇka.

tāṉṟeripaṇ——Akanilaimarutam, puṟanilai marutam, Arukiyaṉ marutam, perukiyaṉmarutameṉṉum paṇ nāṉkum teriyuntiṟaṉ[8: 39-40]

16. Ūrakattēr——“makaravācikai..........vīti” (5: 151-6)Eṉṟatu.

Oḷiyuṭaippāṇi——“cīriyal poliya” (3: 135) Eṉṟatu

17. Eṉṟivaiyaṉaittum——Eṉṟu collappaṭṭa Ivaikaḷ yāvum,

17 - 8. piṟaporuḷ......nilaimaiyum

collātoḻinta piṟaporuḷkaḷ vaitta vaippōṭē poruntit tōṉṟum Oppaṟṟa muṟaimai nilaipeṟalum,

19 - 20. Oruparicā nōkkik kiṭanta pukārkkāṇṭammuṟṟiṟṟu – Orupaṭippaṭa nōkkikkiṭanta pukārkkāṇṭam muṟṟiyatu.

mutalāvatupukārkkāṇṭattiṉAṭiyārkkunallārurai muṟṟiṟṟu.

Iraṇṭāvatu

maturaikkāṇṭam

(11) kāṭukāṇ kātai

tiṅkaṇmūṉ ṟaṭukkiya tirumuk kuṭaikkīḻc
ceṅkatir ñāyiṟṟut tikaḻoḷi ciṟantu
kōtaitāḻ piṇṭik koḻuniḻa liruntakoḻuniḻa lirunta †kuḷirniḻa
†Aṭi, 3: cīvaka. 3012.
Ātiyi ṟōṟṟat taṟivaṉai vaṇaṅkik
kantaṉ paḷḷik kaṭavuḷark kellāmkantaṉ paḷḷik kaṭavuḷark kellām ‡kantampaḷḷik
Anti laraṅkat takaṉpoḻi lakavayiṟ
cāraṇar kūṟiya takaicā ṉaṉmoḻi
mātavat tāṭṭiyu māṇpuṟa moḻintāṅ
kaṉṟava ruṟaiviṭat talkiṉa raṭaṅkit
teṉṟicai maruṅkiṟ celavuvirup puṟṟu
vaikaṟai yāmattu vāraṇaṅ kaḻintuvāraṇaṅ kaḻintu ¶vāraṇaṅkāṭṭa,veyppavaṉ
veyyavaṉ kuṇaticai viḷaṅkit tōṉṟa

11.1

1. tiṅkaḷmūṉ ṟaṭukkiya – mūṉṟu tiṅkaḷai Aṭukkiṉālotta.

11.4

4. Aṟivaṉeṉṟatu Uṟaiyūr ṣrī kōyil nāyaṉārai.

11.2-4

2-4. (pā) ñāyiṟṟaippōla Oḷiciṟanta Aṟivaṉ; ciṟantakōtaiyeṉak kūṭṭiṉumām.

11.5

5. kantaṉpaḷḷi – Uṟaiyūr ṣrī kantaṉ paḷḷi.

11.6

6. Antil: Acainilai. Araṅkam – tiruvaraṅkam; Āṟṟiṉ kuṟaiyeṉpārumuḷar.

11.9

9. Alkiṉaraṭaṅki – viṭṭu Aṅkut taṅki.

(6) Araṅkattiṟkaṇṭa (7) cāraṇar coṉṉa tarumavuraiyaik (5)kaṭavuḷarkku (8) moḻintu (11) vāraṇaṅ kaḻintu vaḻikkoṇṭu (14)Iḷamarakkāṉattup pukkuḻiyeṉka.

vaḷanīrp paṇṇaiyum vāviyum polintatōr

†Aṭi, 16: maṇi. 15: 34.

tiṅkaṭ celvaṉ ṟirukkulam viḷaṅkac

poṅkoḷi mārpiṟ pūṇṭōṉ vāḻi

kōvalaṉ kēṭpak kuṉṟāc ciṟappiṉ
māmaṟai yāḷaṉ varuporu ḷuraippōṉ

(4) vaṇaṅki (8) moḻintu (14) kāṉattirukkai pukkuḻiyeṉka.

14 Irukkai – Iruppiṭam.

11.17

17. Aṭiyil taṉṉaḷavu Aracarkku Uṇartti – kaṭaliṉaḷavai Aṭiyālē Iṉṉa Aḷaviṉatu Ituveṉṟu Aracarkkuk kāṭṭi; AṉṟiAṭiyiṉālē taṉperumaiyai Aracarkku Aṟivitteṉpārumuḷar.

11.18

18. vēlāṉum Eṟinta pakai.

11.19

19. paḵṟuḷiyāṟu – kumarippakkattatōr yāṟu.

11.20

20. kōṭu – karai. koṭuṅkaṭal koḷḷa – vaḷainta kaṭal koḷḷukaiyiṉālē.

11.26

26. mutalvaṉ – Intiraṉ; Intiraṉ ceṉṉimuṭiyilē vaḷaiyuṭaittōṉeṉka.

nīla mēka neṭumpoṟ kuṉṟattup
pālvirin takalātu paṭintatu pōla
Āyiram viritteḻu talaiyuṭai yaruntiṟaṟviritteḻu talaiyuṭai yaruntiṟaṟ †virintatalai
†Aṭi, 37-8. “miṉṉavir cuṭarmaṇi yāyiram viritta, kavaināvaruntalaik kāṇpiṉ cēkkait, tuḷavañ cūṭiya vaṟituyi lōṉum”(pari. 13: 27-9.)
pāyaṟ paḷḷip palartoḻu tētta
viritiraik kāviri viyaṉperun turuttitturuttit ‡turuttiyuṭ ṭiruvamar
tiruvamar mārpaṉ kiṭanta vaṇṇamum
vīṅkunī raruvi vēṅkaṭa meṉṉum
Ōṅkuyar malaiyat tucci mīmicai
virikatir ñāyiṟun tiṅkaḷum viḷaṅki
Irumaruṅ kōṅkiya viṭainilait tāṉattu
miṉṉukkōṭi yuṭuttu viḷaṅkuviṟ pūṇṭu
naṉṉiṟa mēka niṉṟatu pōlap
pakaiyaṇaṅ kāḻiyum pālveṇ caṅkamum
takaipeṟu tāmaraik kaiyi ṉēnti
nalaṅkiḷa rāra mārpiṟ pūṇṭu
polampū vāṭaiyiṟ polintu tōṉṟiyavāṭaiyiṟ polintu tōṉṟiya ¶vāṭaipolintu tōṉṟic
ceṅka ṇeṭiyō ṉiṉṟa vaṇṇamum
†Aṭi, 43-51. “paruvam vāyttali ṉiruvicum paṇinta, Iruvēṟu maṇṭilat tilakkam pōla, nēmiyum vaḷaiyu mēntiya kaiyāṟ,karuvi miṉṉavi rilaṅkum polampūṇ, Aruvi yuruvi ṉāramo ṭaṇintaniṉ, tiruvarai yakalam” (pari. 13: 7-12.)
Eṉkaṇ kāṭṭeṉ ṟeṉṉuḷaṅ kavaṟṟa
vantēṉ kuṭamalai māṅkāṭ ṭuḷḷēṉ
teṉṉava ṉāṭṭuc ciṟappuñ ceykaiyum
kaṇmaṇi kuḷirppak kaṇṭē ṉātaliṉ
vāḻttivan tiruntē ṉituveṉ varaveṉat
tīttiṟam purintōṉ ceppak kēṭṭu
māmaṟai mutalva maturaic cenneṟimutalva maturaic cenneṟi §mutalvaṉ
kūṟu nīyeṉak kōvalaṟ kuraikkum
kōttoḻi lāḷaroṭu koṟṟavaṉ kōṭi
vēttiya liḻanta viyaṉilam pōla
†Aṭi, 60-61: kalit. 10: 4-7.

11.52

52. (pā) kaṇkaḷ Eṉṉuḷḷattaik kalakkutalālē; kaṇ: Eḻuvāy.

vēṉalaṅ kiḻavaṉoṭu veṅkatir vēntaṉ

11.71

11.75

11.80

80. Aṟuttalaiyuṭaiya kaṇṇaiyuṭaiya karumpu.

kāyamu mañcaḷu māykoṭik kavalaiyum
vāḻaiyuṅ kamukun tāḻkulait teṅkumkamukun tāḻkulait teṅkum †kamukuñcūḻ
māvum palāvuñ cūḻaṭut tōṅkiyacūḻaṭut tōṅkiya ‡cūḻaṭut tōṅkit
teṉṉavaṉ ciṟumalai tikaḻntu tōṉṟumtikaḻntu tōṉṟum ¶tikaḻat
Ammalai valaṅkoṇ ṭakaṉpatic cellumiṉ
Avvaḻip paṭarī rāyi ṉiṭattucpaṭarī rāyi ṉiṭattuc §paṭīi rāyi ṉiṭattatu
cevvaḻip paṇṇiṟ ciṟaivaṇ ṭaraṟṟum
taṭantāḻ vayaloṭu taṇpūṅ kāvoṭutaṇpūṅ kāvoṭu ¦¦taṇperuṅ
kaṭampala kiṭanta kāṭuṭaṉ kaḻintu
tirumāl kuṉṟattuc celkuvi rāyiṉ
perumāḷ keṭukkum pilamuṇ ṭāṅku
viṇṇō rēttum viyattaku marapiṟ
puṇṇiya caravaṇam pavakā raṇiyōpavakā raṇiyō $pavakā raṇiya, miṭṭa cittiyeṉappeyar
ṭiṭṭa citti yeṉumpeyar pōki
viṭṭu nīṅkā viḷaṅkiya poykai
muṭṭāc ciṟappiṉ mūṉṟuḷa vāṅkup
puṇṇiya caravaṇam poruntuvi rāyiṉ
viṇṇavar kōmāṉ viḻunū leytuvir
pavakā raṇipaṭin tāṭuvi rāyiṟpavakā raṇipaṭin tāṭuvi rāyiṟ ††pavakā raṇiyampaṭin tāṭuvi

11.82

82. kāyam – veḷḷuḷḷi.

11.85

11.86

11.87

11.91

11.92

11.96

11.97

97. ciṟappu – vicēṭam; Inta vicēṭam Ekkālattumuḷa. mūṉṟuḷa – mūṉṟu poykaiyuḷa.

11.98

98. poruntutal – Āṭutal.

11.99

99. viḻunūl – Aintiraviyākaraṇam. Eytuvir – Uṇarvir.

Iṭṭa citti yeytuvir nīrēnīrē †nīreṉa
Āṅkup pilampuka vēṇṭuti rāyiṉ
Ōṅkuyar malaiyat tuyarntōṟ ṟoḻutu
cintaiyi lavaṉṟavaṉ cēvaṭi vaittu
vantaṉai mummuṟai malaivalañ ceytāl
nilampaka vīḻnta cilampāṟ ṟakaṉ ṟalaip
polaṅkoṭi miṉṉiṟ puyalaiṅ kūntaṟ
kaṭimala raviḻnta kaṉṉikā rattut
toṭivaḷait tōḷi yorutti tōṉṟi
Immaik kiṉpamu maṟumaik kiṉpamum
Immaiyu maṟumaiyu miraṇṭu miṉṟiyōrmiṉṟiyōr ‡miṉṟic, cemmai
cemmaiyi ṉiṟpatuñ ceppumi |ṉīyirivṉīyiriv ¶ṉīvir
varaittāḷ vāḻvēṉ varōttamai yeṉpēṉvaraittāḷ vāḻvēṉ varōttamai yeṉpēṉ §varaittāḻ
Uraittārk kuriyē ṉuraittī rāyiṉ
tiruttak kīrkkut tiṟantēṉ kataveṉum
katavan tiṟantavaḷ kāṭṭiya naṉṉeṟipkāṭṭiya naṉṉeṟip ¦¦kāṭṭiya vanneṟip
putavam palavuḷa pōkiṭai kaḻiyaṉapōkiṭai kaḻiyaṉa $pōkiṭai kaḻiyiṉa
Oṭṭup putavamoṉ ṟuṇṭata ṉumpar
vaṭṭikaip pūṅkoṭi vantu tōṉṟi
Iṟutiyi liṉpa meṉakkīṅ |kuraittāṟkuraittāṟ ††kuraittīr

11.107

107. vantaṉai – vantaṉaiyōṭē.

11.108

108. cilampāṟeṉṟatu Ōrāṟu. Akaṉṟalai – Akaṉṟaviṭam.

11.109-11

109-11. poṟkoṭipōṉṟa Oḷiyiṉaiyum, puyalpōlum Aiṅkūntalaiyumuṭaiya toṭivaḷaittōḷāḷ Orutti kaṉṉikārampōlattōṉṟi; |kaṉṉikārampōla Eṉṟār, matāṇiyaṇintiruttaliṉ;kōṅkaṭiyilē tōṉṟiyeṉṟumām.

11.112

11.119

11.120

120. Oṭṭupputavam – Iraṭṭaikkatavam.

11.121

121. vaṭṭikaiyileḻutiya koṭipōlvāḷ.

11.122

122. Iṟutiyiliṉpam – vīṭu.

peṟutir pōlunīr pēṇiya poruḷeṉum
Uraiyī rāyiṉu muṟukaṇ ceyyēṉ
neṭuvaḻip puṟattu nīkkuva ṉummeṉum
Uraittā ruḷareṉi ṉuraitta mūṉṟiṉ
karaippaṭut tāṅkuk kāṭṭiṉaḷ peyarum
Arumaṟai maruṅki ṉaintiṉu meṭṭiṉum
varumaṟai yeḻuttiṉ mantira miraṇṭum
Orumuṟai yāka vuḷaṅkoṇ ṭōti
vēṇṭiya toṉṟiṉ virumpiṉi rāṭiṟvirumpiṉi rāṭiṟ †virumpiṉa rāyiṟ
kāṇṭaku marapiṉa valla maṟṟavai
maṟṟavai niṉaiyātu malaimicai niṉṟōṉmalaimicai niṉṟōṉ ‡malarmicai
poṟṟā maraittā ḷuḷḷam poruntumiṉ
Uḷḷam poruntuvi rāyiṉ maṟṟavaṉ
puḷḷaṇi nīḷkoṭi puṇarnilai tōṉṟumnīḷkoṭi puṇarnilai tōṉṟum ¶nīḷkoṭippuṇarnilai
†Aṭi, 136: muruku. 151.
tōṉṟiya piṉṉavaṉ ṟuṇaimalart tāḷiṇai
Ēṉṟutuyar keṭukku miṉpa meytimiṉpa meyti §miṉpumeytuvir
māṇpuṭai marapiṉ maturaik |kēkumiṉkēkumiṉ $keytumiṉ
kāṇṭaku pilattiṉ kāṭci yītāṅ
kanneṟip paṭarī rāyi ṉiṭaiyatu
cenneṟi yākun tēmpoḻi luṭutta

11.123

123. pēṇiyaporuḷ – mūṉṟiṉuḷoṉṟāy niṉaitta kāriyam.

11.125

125. neṭuvaḻippuṟam – nīṅkaḷ pōkiṉṟa peruvaḻiyiṭam.

11.128

128. Aintum Eṭṭumāvaṉa:——pañcākkaram, Aṭṭākkaram.

11.131-2

131-2. vēṇṭiyatorupoykaikkaṇ Āṭiṉāl Ēṉaiyaviraṇṭumtōṉṟum marapiṉavalla.

11.134

134. Uḷḷamporuntumiṉ – niṉaiyuṅkōḷ.

11.136

136. puḷḷaṇinīḷkoṭi niṉṟa nilaimaitōṉṟum; koṭipuṇarnilai – koṭimaram niṟkum tiruvācalumām.

11.137

137. (pā) tuṇaimalarttāmarai – tiruvaṭi.

11.138

138. keṭukkumeṉṟatu muṟṟu; keṭuttalāl IṉpameytiyeṉaOrucol varuvikka.

11.142

142. cenneṟi – cevviya vaḻi.

Ūriṭai yiṭṭa kāṭupala kaṭantāl
Āriṭai yuṇṭō rārañart teyvam
naṭukkañ cālā nayattiṟ ṟōṉṟicālā nayattiṟ ṟōṉṟi †cārā nalattiṟ
Iṭukkaṇ ceyyā tiyaṅkunart tāṅkum
maṭuttuṭaṉ kiṭakku maturaip peruvaḻi
nīṇilaṅ kaṭanta neṭumuṭi yaṇṇal
tāṭoḻu takaiyēṉ pōkuval yāṉeṉa
māmaṟai yōṉvāy vaḻittiṟaṅ kēṭṭa
kāvunti yaiyaiyōr kaṭṭurai collumkāvunti yaiyaiyōr kaṭṭurai collum ‡kāvuntikaiyōr
nalampuri koḷkai nāṉmaṟai yāḷa
pilampuka vēṇṭum peṟṟiyīṅ killai
kappat tintiraṉ kāṭṭiya nūliṉ
meyppāṭ ṭiyaṟkaiyiṉ viḷaṅkak kāṇāyṭiyaṟkaiyiṉ viḷaṅkak kāṇāy ¶ṭiyaṟkaiviḷaṅka
Iṟanta piṟappi ṉeytiya vellām
†Aṭi, 156-7: “Iṟanta piṟappiṟṟāñ ceyta viṉaiyaip, piṟantapiṟappā laṟika – piṟantiruntu, ceyyum viṉaiyā laṟika viṉippiṟan,teytum viṉaiyiṉ payaṉ” (Aṟaneṟi. 59.)
piṟanta piṟappiṟ kāṇā yōnī

kuṉṟāk koḷkaik kōvalaṉ ṟaṉṉuṭaṉ
Aṉṟaip pakalō rarumpatit taṅkip
piṉṟaiyu mavvaḻip peyarntucel |vaḻināḷvaḻināḷ $vuḻināḷ

vakuntucel varuttattu vaḻimaruṅ kiruppavakuntucel varuttattu vaḻimaruṅ kiruppa ††varuntucel

11.144

144. Ārañartteyvam – varuttum teyvam.

11.146

146. (pā) Iyaṅkunarttaṭukkum – vaḻipōvāraip pōkkuvilakkum.

11.147

147. Ivvakaicceṉṟu kiṭakkum.

11.154

154. kaṟpam kappameṉaniṉṟatu; pirākirutam.

11.155

155. meyppāṭṭiyaṟkai – paramākamam; paramākamattil Intiraṉnūliṉaik kāṇalām.

Iṭaineṟik kiṭanta viyavukoṇ maruṅkiṉviyavukoṇ maruṅkiṉ †viyavukkoṇ
puṭaineṟip pōyōr poykaiyiṟ |ceṉṟuceṉṟu ‡porunti
nīrnacaiI vēṭkaiyi ṉeṭuntuṟai niṟpak
kāṉuṟai teyvaṅ kātaliṟ ceṉṟu
nayanta kātali ṉalkuva ṉivaṉeṉa
vayanta mālai vātiviṟ ṟōṉṟivayanta mālai vātiviṟ ṟōṉṟi ¶vacanta
koṭinaṭuk kuṟṟatu pōla vāṅkavaṉ
Aṭimutal_vīḻntāṅ_karuṅkaṇī rukuttu
vāca mālaiyi ṉeḻutiya māṟṟam
tītilēṉ piḻaimoḻi ceppiṉai yātaliṉ
kōvalaṉ ceytāṉ koṭumaiyeṉ ṟeṉmuṉ
mātavi mayaṅki vāṉṟuya ruṟṟu
mēlō rāyiṉum nūlō rāyiṉum
pālvakai terinta pakutiyō rāyiṉum
piṇiyeṉak koṇṭu piṟakkiṭ ṭoḻiyum
kaṇikaiyar vāḻkkai kaṭaiyē pōṉmeṉac

cevvari yoḻukiya ceḻuṅkaṭai maḻaikkaṇ
veṇmut tutirttu veṇṇilāt tikaḻum
